167a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid nas zhag bcu ma ldan na zla ba bdun tshun chad/ nges pa skyed pa dus de la rtsa ba dang yan lag nyams pa// thabs des bcos pas thar pa thob ste/ sgrung gi dpes re re bstan pa'o// de yang srog bcad pa las thar pa/ dge
167b1(rgyud 'grel): slong zla ba'i 'od bya ba rigs bram ze yin pas/ lo nyi shu rtsa gcig nas bzhi bcu'i bar du nyi shur sdom pa bsrungs te/ bzhi bcu lon nas pa kun tu 'khor zhes bya bas snyan ngag yod pas rgyal po'i pho brang du snyan dag bton
167b2(rgyud 'grel): pas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po shin tu dga' nas// go la bdun dang bcas pa byon nas bram ze gzhan cig gis gcig lam du khyer bas khros nas 'thobs pas kun tu 'khor po gsad do// bu dge slong sems
167b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khrugs te sbyor ba gsang pas las kyi spu gri khyer te/ bram ze khrus byed sar bsgrags te spu gri me da nas bdar ba dang / bram me khrus lo byung ba dang spu gris ske bcad de bsad do// mjug 'gyod pa med par dga' bar
167b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur te/ ro yang gar dgar gzhago/ dar kun gyis ri mthong nas 'di su~Ms gsad snyam nas ngas pha'i mi shar gsad ces bsgragaso// der kun gyis kyang dpyas par gyur// rtags kyang gzhag pa las// yul der nad 'go ba
167b5(rgyud 'grel): byung ste// kun ka na pa dang / dka' thub med pa de yang na ba dang // nad drag pos gzir bas shin tu 'gyod pa'i sems skyes te// lung nas sangs rgyas 'od mo'i tshal ni bzhugs pa la gong gi nyes pa rnams zhus blangs pas
167b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyis gnang nas bslab pa bsgyur te/ dge slong dri ma dang bral bar gyur te ma lhung ngo // yul yangs pa can gyi grong na rje'u'i rigs dge slong rin chen srung zhes bya ba cig yod pa la bsod snyoms la phyin nas khyim
168a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi mdzod mthong ste/ lha khang gi logs su sbyor bas la dong brkos te gnas de nas ma ga d+har sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'gro zhes dge 'dun la bsgrags nas song ste/ de nub nam phyed na
168a2(rgyud 'grel): pabapang mdzod phug ste// bai DUr+ya dang / pad+ma rA ga dang // gser dngul rkus nas da ci'i dong du sbas te/ mjug 'gyod pa med par dga' bar gyur te// de longs spyod spyod pa las nub mo rkun 'phran gzhan dang phrad nis nor khyer ro// lus
168a3(rgyud 'grel): btags pa las shin tu 'gyod nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar phyin te// gong gi nyes pa bshags nas sdom pa blangs te sangs rgyas kyis gnang nas dge slong rin chen 'byung gnasu gyur te ltung ba med do// grong khyor ser skyar dge
168a4(rgyud 'grel): skyong shes grags kyis bsod snyoms byed pa las// re zhog na smad 'tshong ma 'byor pa rnyed bya ba'i sgor phyin te blangs nas yon byin pas/ smad 'tshong ma de shin tu legs par mthong ste/ chags pa'i sems kyis sbyor ba slar
168a5(rgyud 'grel): log nas ka bya ro'i ras g.yur nas gyo no te// 'gron bu ka ho na cig khyer nas srod la phyin te/ nga nyon byos pa las yar shog zer te phyin chags pa skye ba'i thabs sna tshogs byas dngosu nyon mongs pa la zhen nas bsrubs te/ khu ba
168a6(rgyud 'grel): phyung ngo // mjug bde bar tshor nas phyis kyang phrad ngo // ring zhig nar mdze byung ste sdug bsngal bar gyur nas 'gyod de sangs rgyas kyi skyon sngar phyin naso sa la 'gyel te nyes po rnams bshags nas bslab pa bsgyur te/ dge slong
168b1(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i ye shes su gyur te ltung ba med do// rgyal byed kyi tshal du dge slong byang chub 'byung gnas su grags pa rgyal rigs su gyur pa zhig byung bas dad pa shin tu che nas kha sur pa Nar phyin pas spyan ras gzigs mthong nas
168b2(rgyud 'grel): yul de la kha sar pa Na zhes btag so// slar log nas ma ga d+har phyin nas/ bstan bcos mang po byas nas de nas nga la sangs rgyas mang pos bstan zhes bsgrags pas// slob pa mdo po yod po las/ sangs rgyas kyis
168b3(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen nas mi btang ba las nor sa 'og tu sbas nas phyin pa dang / sgyu ma byas pa'i sbyor ba mang po byaso nas chos 'chad pa'i sbyor ba dang // dngosu kun bsrubs pa mang ba dang / mjug 'gyod pa med par dga' bar longs spyod spyod pa
168b4(rgyud 'grel): la rgyal po'i chad pa byung la khang pa dang tshor nas shin tu 'gyod pa skyes te// sangs rgyas kyi sngan stor phyin te nyes pa kun par shogs te/ slar bslab pa gsos nas dge slong rdo rje snying por gyur te ltung ba med do// gzhan yang 'dul ba
168b5(rgyud 'grel): dang mdo nas 'gyod de/ slar gsos pas thar pa mang po dang // gton gyi the tshom med par phyir bcos so// yan lag gi nyes pa tshe yang bcos pas yang bar shes par bya'o// chung rtsa ba ltar shes par bya'o// 'dir theg pa
168b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang yang sbyar bar bya'o// dus ma nges pa la nyin gcig gam zhag gcig gam zhag bdun nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung bar bya'o// yon tan la shes rab can gyis ra ra'i bye brag mdor blta'o// 'dir spyi tsom bstan pa ni
169a1(rgyud 'grel): dge bsnyen la sogs kyi gni mi las thob pa dang / lam rten dang ldan nas bsrung ba// 'bras bu dgra bcom pa thob pa'o// dge slong gi las la dge sbyong gi mdo dang 'dub bar blta'o// 'dung
169a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum ste// yon tan che ba dang / dus nges pa dang // yon tan nges pa'o// yon tan che ba la gnyis te/ bdud kyis bar mi chod cing lam nye ba dang // 'bras bu nye ba'o// lam nye ba la yang gsum ste// sangs rgyas la sgrubs
169a3(rgyud 'grel): pas 'jig rten pa'i lha sbyangs pas// phyi mar dga' ldan dang bstan pa la byams pa dang mjal lo// chos la skyabs pas srog gcod pa spangs pas byams pa la chos nyan pa dang // dge 'dun la skyabs te mu stegs dang ma 'grogs
169a4(rgyud 'grel): pas byams pa'i 'khor gyi dge 'dun dang 'grogs pa'o// 'bras bu la yong gsum ste// so sor thar pa'i bslob pa rigs bdun rdzogs pas bdag nyid sangs rgyas su gyur pa dang / lus ngag yod kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos spyad
169a5(rgyud 'grel): pas bdag nyid sangs rgyas pas ches ston pa'o// dben par gcig pu bstan pas bdag sangs rgyas nas dge 'dun gyi 'khor phyug pa'o// dus skye ba bdun na dgra bcom pa thob nges so// yon tan nges pa la gnyis te// rgyu dang/
169a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu'o// rgyu skye bo bdun du rten khyad par du 'phags pa drug dang ldan desal 'bras bu lhag bcas dang / ga seMd gnyis mthong nges pa'o// thob pa'i dus la gsum ste/ sbyor ba dang / blang ba dang / thob pa dngos lo//
169b1(rgyud 'grel): ba la gnyis te// gong go gau dbang po la sogs pa'i skyabasu 'gro ba'i sbyor ba bdun pa dang / skyabs dngos so// dngos la slob dpon dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas/ ji srid
169b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho'i bar du rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la skyabasu mchi'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog/ phyogs bcu'i chos la skyabasu mchi'o// tsho gas rnams kyi mchog/ phyogs
169b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// zhes lon gsum bsgyur ro// de la yang dbang po dang / bskyab par bya ba dang // dus dang skyob mkhan dang / grangs dang / dgos pa shugs kyis bstan pa ste drug go// blang ba
169b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos la bskyabs pa'i yon tan shes pas blang ba laso so sor thar pa'i bslab pa'i rigs bdun te/ bsnyen ga nas blang ba la rang bzo min pa dang / blang ba gnyis rang bzo min pa la yang dbang po la sogs drug ste/ slob dpo
169b5(rgyud 'grel): dgongasu gsol// blang ba dngos la bsgrubs pa'i yon tan shes pas blang ba las so sor thar pa'i rigs bdun te/ bsnyen gnas blang ba la rang bzo min pa dang // blang ba gnyis rang bzo min pa la yang dbang po la sogs drug ste/
169b6(rgyud 'grel): slob dngon dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di nas bzung nas/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sngon gyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bslab pa la rjes su slob po// rje su bsgrub bo// rjes su bgyid do zhes lan gsum
170a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur ro// blang ba la yang dbang po la sogs pa drug ste/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di nas gzung nas ji srid dam// lo 'am zla ba sngon du bstan
170a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ltar ro// zla ba byung ngo cag go ngo la stong ngam/ nya'am brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas srung bar rang 'tshal bas de'i nyin par dang mtshan mo rtsa ba'i dang po phrag gcod pa spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid do// zhes lani gsum
170a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod do// de bzhin du gcig gam gnyis sam gsum bsrung ba la rtsa ba nas re rer gsum mam yan lag tu bcas par/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid
170a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho'i bar du zla ba byung ngo cog gi ngo la// nya'i zhes bsnyen gnas bsrung bar 'tshal bas/ de'i nyin par dang mtshan mo rtsa ba'i dang po srog gcod pa dang / rtsa ba gnyis pa ma byin par len pa dang / rtsa ba gsum pa ma tshangs par skye
170a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / rtsa ba bzhi pa brdzun du smra ba dang / yan lag gi dang po 'bru'i chang dang / bcos pa'iching dang // myos par 'gyur ba'i chang dang / yan lag gnyis pa glu gar rtsed 'dzi rgyan kha dog 'chang ba dang / yan lag gsum pa mas
170a6(rgyud 'grel): stan dang / khri stan dang / yon lag bzhi pa phyi dro'i kha zas spangs nas slar ldog par bgying ngo // sngon gyi dgra bcom pa kun gyi bslab pa la rjes su slob bo// rje su bsgrub po/ rjesu bgyid ngo // thabs yin no/ lagaso zhes so//
170b1(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen gnas kyi bslab pa la 'thob po// slob dpon gyis bsnyen gnas su bzung du gsol lo zhes lan gsum brjod nas phyag lan gsum bya'o// thob pa dngos la drug ste/ skyabs 'gro sbyor ba sngon du song ba dang / blang ba dang /
170b2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon la the tshom ma zos pa dang / chos la the tshom ma zos pa dang / ma thob par the tshos ma zos pa dang / dus de nyid du thob pa'o/ dge bsnyen la sogs pa drug pa yang / don drug po de dang ldan nas thob ste 'dra bar shes
170b3(rgyud 'grel): par gyis shig/ dge bsnyen gyi skyabs 'gro yang gong ltar blang ba/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sngon gyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bslab pa la rjesu slob bo//
170b4(rgyud 'grel): rjes su sgrub po/ rjes su bgyid de zhes lan gsum brjod de/ dang po la sogs pa drug gong bzhin ldan no// slob dpon dgosu gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sna 'ga' bsrung ba
170b5(rgyud 'grel): dge bskon bgyid pas rtsa ba'i dang po srog gcod pa spangs nas srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyid do zhes lo zla ba'i grangs kyis gsum du brjod do// slob dpon dgongasu gsol/ bdag ming 'ong zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung
170b6(rgyud 'grel): nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sna 'ga' bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen bgyid pas rtsa ba gnyis ma byin par len pa spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid do// sngon gyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bslab pa la rjesu slob bo// rjes su bsgrub po/ rjesu bgyid do// /
171a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs yin no// leg so// sna 'ga' bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen du gyur/ slob dpon gyis sna 'ga' bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol zhes ldan gsum brjod do// phyag gsum bya'o//
171a2(rgyud 'grel): phal cher bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen du gyur pa skyabs 'gro gong bzhin song ba dang / rang bzo med pa'i bslang ba yang 'dra bas song nas slob dpon dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'od nas bzung nas ji
171a3(rgyud 'grel): srid 'tsho'i bar du phal cher bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen bgyid pas rtsa ba dang po srog gcod pa spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid do zhes lan gsum bzla'o// de bzhin du rtsa ba gnyis pa ma byin par len pa dang / gsum pa 'dod
171a4(rgyud 'grel): pas log par g.yem pa spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid do zhes lan gsum brjod nas sngon gyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bslab pa rjesu slob bo// rje su bsgrub po// rje su bgyid do// thobs yin no legs so// phal cher
171a5(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen du gyur to// slob dpon gyis phal cher bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol zhes brjod la phyag lan gsum bya'o// yong su rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen la gzhan sngon du song bas// slob dpon dgongs
171a6(rgyud 'grel): su gsol// bdag yang 'ong zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yongasu rdzogs pa'i ngag bsnyen la gnas pas rtsa ba'i dang po srog gcod pa dang / gnyis pa ma byin par len pa dang / gsum pa 'dod pas log
171b1(rgyud 'grel): pabar g.yem pa dang / bzhi pa brdzun du smra ba spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid do// ces re re la gsum gsum brjod la/ sngon gyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyi rjesu slob bo// rje su bsgrub bo// rjes su bgyid do// thabs
171b2(rgyud 'grel): yin no legs so// yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen du 'gyuraro// slob dpon gyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol zhes bya// tshangs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen gyis kyang gzhan sngon du song bas// slob dpon
171b3(rgyud 'grel): dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen la gnas pas rtsa ba'i dang po srog gcod pa dang / rtsa ba gnyis pa ma byin par len pa dang / gsum
171b4(rgyud 'grel): tshangs par spyod pa dang / bzhi pa brdzun du smra ba dang // yan lag gi dang myos pa'i chang dang / bcos pa'i tshad dang / 'bru'i chang dag spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid pa lagaso zhes re re la gsum gsum brjod nus/ sngon gyi
171b5(rgyud 'grel): dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bslab pa la rjesu slob bo/ rjes su bsgrub bo// rje su bgyid do/ thabs yin no// legs so// tshangs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen du 'gyuraro// slob dpon gyis tshungs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen du gzung du
171b6(rgyud 'grel): gsil// dge tshul gyis kyang gzhan gong ltar mkhan po slob dpon dad pa'o dge 'dun gyi sngar slob dpon dgongasu gsol// bdag ming 'do zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas gzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge tshul la gnas pas rtsa ba'i
172a1(rgyud 'grel): dang po srog gcod pa dang / gnyis pa ma byin par len pa dang / gsum pa mi tshangs par spyod pa dang bzhi pa brdzun du smra ba dang / yan lag dang po 'bru'i chang dang / bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur
172a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / yan lag gnyis pa glu gar rtse 'jo dang / yan lag gsum pa rgyan dang kha dog 'chang ba dang / bzhi pa mal stan mthon po dang // lnga po khri stan chen po dang / drug pa phyi dro'i kha zas dang // bdun pa gser da ngul 'chang
172a3(rgyud 'grel): ba spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid lagaso zhes re re la gsum gsum brjed do// sngon gyi zhes pa la sogs pa gong ltar brjod do// dge slong dngos kyi las kyi cho gas blang / 'dir skyabs dang legs par brjod pa gong ltar gsum
172a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa dang / gong gi rtsa bzhi dang / lhag ma dang ma nges pa gnyis dang / spang ba'i ltung byed la sogs pa las ldog par brjod do// gso sbyong zhes pa lo 'am zla ba 'am nye stong gso zhing sbyong ba'o// nyams pa yang bco su yod pas
172a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang gso sbyong do// dus ma nges pa zla ba 'am lo tsam srung ba la yang gso sbyong ba logaso// 'dir 'og gi theg pa gsum 'dod pas dus snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du brjod cing khas blang ngo // sems bskyed pa'i tshe 'og gi
172a6(rgyud 'grel): gdams dag gis byang chub snying por shes par bstan par bya'o// mdo nas kyang nyes pa skye bas blta'o// gsum pa chos la bslab pa la bzhi ste// spyod lam dang / lta ba dang / skyo bsgom pa dang // skyon spang ba'o// spyod lam la bani/
172b1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ bsnyen gnas pas spyad pa dang / dge bsnyen gyis spyad pa dang // dge tshul bas spyad pa dang / dge slong gis spyad pa'o// de la bsnyen gnas pas spyad pa ni kun tu bzang po'i mdo nas bsnyen gnas pa'i gang zag gis
172b2(rgyud 'grel): de dus lus ngag yid kyis bsgrim zhes pas lus kyis khros dang phyag bya ba dang / ngag gis 'don pa dang / snying po bzlas pa dang // yid kyis nyes pa shes pas bslab pa bsrung ba'i sems dang / yon tan shes pas yi
172b3(rgyud 'grel): dam gyi lha dran pa dang / lus ngag gi dbye ba byas pa dang // bsrung ba'i nyi ma yin yid la bya ba'o// dge bsnyen gyis spyad pa la byams pas zhus pa'i mdo nas/ dge bsnyen dang lnga dang ldan pa yis// las min spang zhing dge
172b4(rgyud 'grel): bcu bsnyen zhes pas ba lang dang / bya phag gso ba la sogs pa bcu mya ngan las 'das pa'i nang nas bstan pa ltar spang ba'o// dge ba bcu ni kun dga' bos zhus pa'i mdo nas bstan pa ltar spyad de// srog bskyab pa dang / 'byor pa
172b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin par btang ba dang // dkon mchog mchod pa dang / mchod rten dang / sku gzugs dang lha khang la sogs pa la na bza' dbul ba dang / bskor ba dang // phyag dang / kha ton klag pa dang / snying po dang / bstod pa bya ba dang / zhig
172b6(rgyud 'grel): po gso ba dang / sku dkar byug pa dang / nyal mo btsun pa'i dge ba bya ba dang / 'os pa'i pha mi dang drin can la rim gro bya ba'o// dge tshul gyis spyad pa la dge tshul dngos kyis 'dul bar blta'o 'di kA ri kA nas// nom gyi cha smang
173a1(rgyud 'grel): mal langs nas// nam ladas par du kha ton bya// gdong dang rtswa'o dra bkur la// de bzhin gshegs la gus phyag 'tshal// zhes pas lus ngag yid kyis bya ba sgra lus kyiHsa pa 'phel bar/
173a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la bzhi ste/ nyin par 'jig rten pa ma dad pa spang ba dang / mtshan mi phyi sgo phyin chad du mi nyal ba dang // 'gro ba'i tshe bslab pa dran pas bag ma ltar 'gro ba dang / za ba dang 'dug pa dag bog med par mi bya'o// dge ba
173a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phel bas tho rangs srod tsog tsog po dang / khrus dang lha phyag dus dang skrabo su bya'o// ngag gos mi smra ba drug ste// mi shes pa dang / mi khro ba dang / mtshang mi 'bru ba dang / phyir ka mi gtang ba dang // rta god mo bya ba dang
173a4(rgyud 'grel): gtsug lug khang dang // dge 'dun mang po'i gsab tu bcom bsrud ba'o// dag gis brjod par bya ba kha don dang klag pa dang // snying po brjod pa dang / bstod pas bstod pa dang // zhi bas blang ba dang / dang pos chos zhu ba
173a5(rgyud 'grel): dang drug go// yid la gnyis kyi nyes pa spang ba la yang gnyis te/ mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang dang / dge 'dun gyi dkor la gnod sems dang // rku sems spang ba dang / bslab pa nyams pa'i nyes pa dran par byas pa
173a6(rgyud 'grel): bslab pa bsrung ba'o// yon tan dran pas bsam pa lnga ste// lus ngag gi dge ba'i yon tan dran par bya ba dang / 'khor ba sdug bsngal bar shes par bya ba dang / byas pa mi rtag pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba dang / stong pa
173b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag med par shes par bya'o// dge slong gis spyad pa la dge slong dngos dang / shes rab can gyis 'dul bar yang blta'o// 'dir lha'i dbang pos zhus pa'i mdo nas// dge slong rnams kyis bya ba ni// mi dge bcu srung
173b2(rgyud 'grel): dge bcu bsgrub// de yang lus ngag yid kyis te// ma yengs spyod lam rnam bzhir spyad// ces pa dang / dgyes pa'i rdo rje nas// de nas bslab pa'i gnas bcu po zhes pas// dge pa bcu bsgrub ste de yang mi dge ba btsum
173b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ dga' bos zhus pa de nyid las// mi dge ba bcu 'phel bas dge slong rnams nyes byed bcu spongs shig/ bcu gang zhe na/ srog gcod pa'o nyes byed ma bsams par dge slong rnams lus kyi bya
173b4(rgyud 'grel): ba byed pa dang // ma byon par len pa'i nyes byed gzhan gyi gzugs kyi yul la reg pa dang / mtshangs par spyod pa'i nyes byed bud med kyi yul lnga la spyad pa dang / brdzun gyi nyes byed ma bsams par smra ba dang / phra ma'i nyes
173b5(rgyud 'grel): byed mang bar smra ba dang / ngag 'khyal ba'i nyes byed bri mor smra ba dang / tshig rtsub mo'i nyes byed mi dga' bar smra ba dang / brnob sems kyi nyes byed de dag la dgos sems 'chang ba dang // gnod sems kyi nyes byed gzhan gyis log
173b6(rgyud 'grel): pa la spyod pa'o// log par lta ba'i nyes byed dngos po la chags pa rnams spongs shig ces bka' stsal pa'o// mi dag bcu 'gags pas mi dge ba dang bral nas dge bcur 'gyur ba'o// de ni bslab pa'i gnos bcu zhes pa'o//
174a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas bye brag pa la bsgrub ces pa yang de nyid nas/ dge bcu rgyas phyir chos gnyis dang // spyod lam bzhi du dge slong spyod ces pas/ de yang chos gnyis pa nyes pa dang / myi dge ba spyod las rdum
174a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhis mi byed pa dang / yon tan dge ba 'phel ba spyod lam bzhis bya ba ste// de yang de nyid nas/ dge slong byang chub sems ldan pas// rtag tu dben par bsdad par bya// sems kyis bdag gzhan don byed lo// dge slong
174a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes ni ngas brjod do// zhes pas de yang sems gnyis bskyed nas theg pa gsum dang ldan zhing dben par gnas nas mi dge ba mi 'byung zhing dge pa 'phel te/ gal te gzhan don sems kyis byed kyang dngos su mi nus pa dang
174a4(rgyud 'grel): dben par mi gnas pas pa di ltar bya ste/ spyod lam bzhis mi bya ba la gnyis te/ yid kyis dran pa lus kyis mi bya ba dang / ngag gis mi bya ba dang / lus kyis gzha la sdod pa dang 'gro ba dang / zas za ba'i tshe dang / nyal ba'i dus
174a5(rgyud 'grel): so// sdong pa la nyes pa 'byung ba dang / nyes pa chen po 'byung nas mi bsdad pa gnyis kyi nyes pa 'byung bas mi bsdad pa la bcu gnyis te/ 'greng ba dang / lho rgyal dang / skyes pa dang / khyi tshugs dang / sa rko ba dang / rtsa gcod pa
174a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / chu dang / me dang / khyi dang / bu chung la rtse ba dang / 'jig rten dang bud med kyi nang du sdod pa spang ba'o// nyes pa chen po 'byung bas ma bsdad pa la gnyis te// bsdangs min pa dang / rten no// rten la dgu/ mchod rten dang /
174b1(rgyud 'grel): lha khang dang / sku gzugs dang / glegs bam dang // mkhan po slob dpon dang / dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / rgyal po dang // rgan pa'o// bsdang sa min pa la gnyis te/ g.yas dang mdun du mi bsdad pa'o// 'gro ba la
174b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi nyes pa 'byung bas mi 'gro ba la bcu bdun te/ mu stegs dang 'gro ba la bcu bdun te/ mu stegs dang 'grogs te mi 'gro/ rgyug cing rgyug cing mi 'gro/ mu stegs kyi nang du mi 'gro/ sgyu ma mkhan dang mi 'grogs nang du mi
174b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro/ de bzhin du chod pa dang mi 'grogs nang du mi 'gro/ dmag dang mi 'grogs nang du mo 'gro/ bshan pa dang smad 'tshong ma dang mi 'grogs nang du mi 'gro/ bud med dang mi 'grogs nang du mi 'gro// phyogs su lta ba dang yul yengs pas
174b4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gro/ gos med pa dang / stod gos med pa dang // gzhan dang rtsod pa'i sar mo 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / don med pa dang / yang ba dang mi 'grogs// yang ba'i sar mi 'gro ba'o// nyes pa chen po 'byung bas mi bya ba gnyis te/ rten
174b5(rgyud 'grel): gong ltar dgu/ mi 'gro ba la lnga/ dngos sam grob ma la mi 'gom/ g.yon bsten la mi 'gro/ steng nas mi 'gro/ mdun nas mi 'gro/ rjes non pas mi 'gro ba'o// dag la yid kyis zin par bya ste/ mi smra ba la bzhi ste/ sdod pa'i tshe mi

180a4(rgyud 'grel): yon tan dran par bya'o// nyin gung gi thun gyi chos spyod la lnga ste/ glegs bam klag pa dang / bskor ba bya ba dang / zan bza' ba dang / tsha tsha gdub pa dang / ngal bas pa'o// grogs bam klag pa gsum ste/ maN+Dal mdzes pa bya ba
180a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / mchod pa bsham pa dang / kha lag bkru ba'o// klag pa dngos la ltung ba thams cad sel bas phung po gsum pa klag/ shes rab 'phel bas brgyad stong pa dang / sdud pa klags pa'o// mjug klags pa'i don dang / yon
180a6(rgyud 'grel): tan dran par bya ba'o// gong ltar bdag gi dge ba'i las kyang bsngo ba yang bya'o// bskor ba byed pa la yang gsum ste/ sbyor ba rten gyi rtsar phyin la shar nas phyag gsum bya/ rang yaM dam gyi lhar mos pa byas nas/ dpa oM AHhUM
180b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod la/ hU~M gis rten stong par sbyangs te/ aH'i 'od kyis rang gi yi dam lha yi gdan pad+ma dang / nyi zla'i gang yin pa'i khar sa bon gsal ba las sku mdog rgyan bzhugs tshul gsal bar bskyed la/ de nyid kyi thugs ka'i sa bon
180b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'od kyis ye shes sems dpa'i dgug gzhug bya/ de'i snying po brjod cing snying po'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rten de la 'dus nas yod pa la/ bskor ba dngos ma yengs par snying po de zlos shing
180b3(rgyud 'grel): bskor te/ dngul byung na gzhag la mjug 'phro gcod kar spyan drangs pa rnams 'gro don la gshegs su gsol// bskyed pa de rang la bsdus te mchod rten nam/ tshe tsha 'am/ glegs bam yin na de nyid du gyur nas gzhag go/ bza' ba
180b4(rgyud 'grel): la gsum skye// sbyar ba la lnga/ gang dang gang gis gang 'tsho bo// 'tshe ba dag pa de btsal la// bkres dang sgom sogs zhi bya'i phyir// sman bzhin du ni bsam par bya// zhes pas ci tsam dgos pa g.yo sgyus ma btsul zhing / lus gso
180b5(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa'i phyir dgos pa dang / de la gtor ma btang ba ni snod gtsang mar zan dang / tshod ma dang pags pa ci yod las bcad de chus bkang la mdun drang por stegs la gzhag la rang yi dam gyi lhar gsol bas oM AHhUM brjod cing
180b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM gis stong par bya// A'i 'od kyis bdud rtsir 'gyur/ oM gyi 'od kyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsir gyur nas 'gron bkug ste/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA Na ma Ad+ya nud pan na tAtwa aM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ zhes lan gsum brjod la btang /
181a1(rgyud 'grel): smon lam gdab pa dang / oM sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twe b+h+yo badz+ra nai bi drA hUM/ zhes brjod la lha bshos dbul/ oM ha ri t+ne pany+tsa ga tA pu tra ma hA yak+Sha ni ha ra ha ra sarba pA paM sarba a ti si ni a ti grih+Na kring
181a2(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes brjod la/ 'phrog ma la chang bu sbyin pa dang / oM a gra paN+Di a saM b+h+ya swA hA/ zhes brjod l-i phud kyi chang bu sbyin no// bza' ba dngos so/ oM AHhUM brjod pas dug thams cad dang bral te bdud rtsir bsam/ g.yas pa'i sri
181a3(rgyud 'grel): lag gis reg pas dug thams cad zhi bar bsam/ de nas ci rigs par ba ba'o// oM u tsiSh+pa paN+Di a si b+h+ya swA hA/ zhes pas lhag ma bcang la sbyin no// gzhan lhag ma med par bcang ngo // mjug la gnyis te/ yon tan bla ba
181a4(rgyud 'grel): grags pa'i mdo nas// gtor ma btang zhing bshos gtsang phul// 'phrog ma phud kyi chang bu dang // lnga pa lkog me'i chang bu yis// 'bras bu longs spyod chen por 'gyur// zhes bstan pa dang / bdag la yan chags mi 'ong bar bya
181a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir kha bshal te/ gang gis sbyin dang gang la sbyin// sbyin pa ji ltar mi dmigs pa// smyon pa dus gsum mnyam pa yis// sbyin bdag de la yos rdzogs shog/ ces smon lam gdab bo// de yang sangs rgyas la sgyu ma mkhan
181a6(rgyud 'grel): bzang pos chos ston drangs la sangs rgyas skyengs par bya bar 'dod pa la/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ dngos su 'khor gsum sbyin bdag zas len pa po gsum sgyu ma dang 'dra ste/ sgyu ma'i nus pa yod pas smon pa'o// tsha
181b1(rgyud 'grel): la yang gsum ste/ sbyor ba ni dang pos dang / chu dang / me tog dang / dri dag sbyar la/ ji tsam 'debs pa'i 'dag pa dris btab la// mdun du khri la gzhag ste/ rang yi dam gyi ltar mos pas oM AHhUM/ brjod pas stong par gyur/ de las bruM buM sa
181b2(rgyud 'grel): po/ de las 'khor lor gyur// 'khor lo'o lte ba la a las zla ba/ zla ba'i steng na oM yod pa de'i 'od kyis bar snang khyab ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs dam bskul/ sems can gyi sgrib pa sbyangs te slar 'dus nas oM shin tu gsol
181b3(rgyud 'grel): ba las rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can// 'khor lo dang zla ba'i gdan la skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bskyed de gsal ba dang / de'i thugs ka'i pad+mo dang zla ba'i steng nas oM las 'od 'phro
181b4(rgyud 'grel): bas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad bkug ste mdun gyi na mkhar bzhugs pa la yon chab la sogs pas mchod nas bskyed pa dang / gnyis med du zhu nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo bdud rtsi'i ngo
181b5(rgyud 'grel): bo dkar ba 'od dang bcas par gyur par bsam mo// de nas na mo b+ha ga ba taM/ ba ro tsa na pA b+ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha daM sa mya ka saM bud+d+ha yau/ tad+ya thA/ aM su k+ShAM su kr-I/ sa me sa ma ye/ shAn+te/ dAn+te/ sa mo biM/ a na la b+haM/ ta raM b+he/ ya sho ba ti/
181b6(rgyud 'grel): ma hA ta dze/ ni rku la/ niNA ni/ sarba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA / kazhes nyi shu rtse gcig bzlas la gdab ste/ lag pas len tsa na 'od kyi gong bu oM dang ldan pa blangs te sku par du bcug la/ gong gi sngags kyis btab la
182a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad du 'byung ngo // mjug o ye d+harmA haM tu pra b+hA ba he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga two t+ya ba da ta/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shA ma Na ye swA hA/ zhes lan bdun brjod pas ra bA gnasu 'gyu ro// me tog
182a2(rgyud 'grel): la bzlas te tshe tshal gtor bas skad cig la rnam par snang mdzad grangs med du gyur/ de'i 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad bkug ste sngon bzhin dngos sam blos mchod nas tsha tshar gyur pa'o// gcig byas pas bye ba snyed kyi
182a3(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams 'thob bo// ngal gso ba la gsum ste/ sbyor bya lus ngal bar bsdud// dngos chos skyed pa'i rgyal po dang / khyim bdag dang / mkhan po dang sgrub dpon gyi che ba brjod pa dang / de dag dran par bya/ dge ba byas pa'i ye
182a4(rgyud 'grel): tan dran par bya/ mjug rgyu 'bras 'brel pas theg pa chen po'i mdo blta'o// phyi dro'i thun la gsum ste/ gong bzhin du thun glogs bam klags pa dang / skor pa bya ba dang gtsug tor la sogs pa'i mdo gdon pa'o// srod kyi thun la
182a5(rgyud 'grel): lnga ste/ gong bzhin du khrus bya ba dang / gtor ma btang ba dang / maN+Dal dang mchod pa dbul ba dang / bsam gtan bye ba dang / nyal ba'o// nyal ba la gsum ste/ sbyor ba khams dang sbyar la bsam gtan bsdu ba dang / glo g.yas phab
182a6(rgyud 'grel): la nyal ba dngos dang / nang por smra par ldang sems kyis gnyid kyi bsam gtan la 'jug pa'o// bye brag pa'i lnga pa la yang gnyis te/ nub phyogs bye brag tu spro ba'i nyan thos tha mi dang / 'bring gnyis kyi lta ba chos bdag dang //
182b1(rgyud 'grel): gang zag gnyi su 'dod de/ chos kyi bdag phyi'i yul dkar dmar/ snyan mi snyan zhim mi zhim/ kha mngar 'jam rtsub sna tshogs su snang ba 'di rdul phra rab 'dus pa'i ngo bo g.yag rnga dang ne gsing ltar 'dod cing / dge sdig gi rgyu
182b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bras kyang yul can rdza su 'dod la/ de yang rkyen gyis mi rtag skad cig mas rtag par snang ste/ bum pa la sogs pa dbyig pas 'jig par dngos su snang ba dang / sdom brdzas can yul can yin pas nyams na rdza chag pa dang 'dra ba
182b3(rgyud 'grel): dang / ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du yod pa dang / phyi mar 'phro 'dod pa dang / sdig pa yang de bzhin du 'dod pa'o// gang zag gi bdag phung po gsum par 'dod do/ bdag btsal bas mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du med la/ bde sdug nyam su myong
182b4(rgyud 'grel): bas yod pa yang min med pa yang min par 'dod pa'o// bsgom pa la gsum ste/ bsgom pa'i skyon dang // bsgom pa'i thabs dang / bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu'o// skyon ni 'khor dang sdug bsngal bya'o// de yang bdag tu mthong bas 'gro ba
182b5(rgyud 'grel): mo la chags pa nyes so// bsgom thabs bdag zhi bar mgo nas rkang pa'i bar bdag med par mi gtsang bas mthong / bsgoms pas 'bras bu sems de zhi nas dgra bcom par 'dod pa'o// skyon rtag pa dang chad par phyi nang 'dod pa deng lus
182b6(rgyud 'grel): gtsang ba dang nyon mongs pa la chags na'o// nyan thos 'bring gi bsgom pa la yang gsum ste/ ma bsgoms par rtogs pas 'khor bar sdug bsngalo// de yang rlung phyir shor bas rtog pa 'byung bas bdag tu btags pas nyon mongs pa la
183a1(rgyud 'grel): chags pas nyes/ thabs rlung 'dzin pa ste gsum// bgrang ba rlung gcig nas bcu dang brgya dang / stong khri 'bum gyi bar du bgrangs te/ zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyes pa dag par 'dod/ bsdams nas re re bgras
183a2(rgyud 'grel): bas bdag phung po gsum par 'dod pa dang / kha dog la slob pa dang / dkar sngo 'dra bar phyir 'byung nang du 'ong ba gnyis drag gzhan blo'i gnas bzung nas 'bras bu lcag bcas lhag med de las 'byung bar 'dod de// dbyibs la
183a3(rgyud 'grel): slob pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / gsum pa dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pa kha ltar slob ste/ rtse gcig pa sna'i rtse mo nas sor gzhi nas/ dpag tshad tsam du phyir bsring zhing / sna bi tshang tshing nas lte bar bskyil ba'o// rtse gsum par phar lo sna sgo gnyis
183a4(rgyud 'grel): nas spros pa tshur la sna rtser bsdus te gong bzhin bsrid/ pad+ma dang / ut+pa la stu rtse nas 'phro la pher la yul gang ba dang / nang du bum par bkang bas lhag bcas sdi ga sed kyi nas bu 'byung bar 'a'o// skyon mo gtsang bsgom pa dang / yum
183a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ltar 'gags nas sems med pa'o// nyan thos rab dang rang sangs rgyas// kha che brag tu smra ba ste/ chos kyi bdag tha ma dang mthun no// gang zag gi bdag med par 'dod pa'o// des bsgom pa yang bden pa'i bsgom// de yang las kyi 'byung ba'i mdo
183a6(rgyud 'grel): las/ sdug bsngal 'di brgyad phung po la/ phung po chags pas dug lnga yin// zhes pas hU~M kun 'byung drug lnga spang ba dang / 'bras bu sdug lnga spang ba dang / 'bras bu sdug bsngal lus la gcod par shes pas las la tsa chags shing 'jas
183b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / ye shes dang byams pa dang mi gtsang ba dang / bdag med du lhag gis mthong la/ bdag med pa'i stong pa de bsgom pa'o// de yang gong gi lus ngag yod kyi dge ba dang bsdoms pas sngon gyi sgrib pa 'dag la bdag med pa la stong pa la gzhag
183b2(rgyud 'grel): pas dgra bcom pa thob pa'o// skyon gang zag gi bdag 'dod pa spong ba'o// theg pa chen po'i sdom pa la gnyis te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang / sngags kyi dam tshig gnyis// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la bzhi ste/ spyod lam dang /
183b3(rgyud 'grel): lta ba dang / bsgom pa dang / skyon no// spyod lam la gnyis te rten dang / spyod las dngos so// rten la lnga ste/ mdo sde ba dang / rnam bcas pa dang / rnam med pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / rab tu mi gnas pa'o// spyod lam dngos la gausum ste/
183b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba dang / dngos dang / mjug go// de yang spyod lam khyad par med par dus gsum du lnga car 'dod la khyad yod de/ sbyor dngos mjug gsum mdo sde pas rta 'brel du 'dod la/ rnam bcas sems kyi rnam par 'dod// rnam pa med dpas
183b5(rgyud 'grel): bzang rtog tu 'dod la/ sgyu ma lta bus sgyu ma lta bur 'dod/ rab tu mi gnas pas kun rdzob yin gyi don dam mo yin te/ rmi lom lta bu mi bden par snang bar 'dod/ don dam la khas len med pa'o// gzhan don dam du 'dod pa'o// spyod lam dngos
183b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba la dgu ste/ mched po dang / bstod pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / skyabasu 'gro ba dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / yi rang ba dang // bskul ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / bsngos pa'o// de yang mchod dang bstod dang phyag 'tshal dang // spyas
184a1(rgyud 'grel): dang sdig bshags yi rang dang // bskul dang gsol ba gdab pa dang // bsngo dang dgu po sbyor bar bstan// zhes dri ma med pa'i mdo nas bstan to// mchod pa la gsum ste gnas dang / rten dang / mchod pa dngos so//
184a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas rang byung dang / byin gyis brlabs pa lha khang la sogs pa nyams dga' bar/ rten byang chub chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang mkhan po la mchod par bya ba'o// mchod pa dngos la gnyis te/ mchod par bya ba dang // mchod par
184a3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o// mchod par bya ba la rten phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'o// mchod byed pa dag/ dgos pa de rnams mnyes pa/ de la dgos pa mchod pa yin// de'i dgos pa bdag gzhan don grub pa'o// mchod
184a4(rgyud 'grel): po dang yon 'byor na dngos/ ma 'byor na bskal pa mang ltar me togo spang gang la brten te slob dpon dang / yid kyis gzhan na yod pa'i dngos po lus sems su bcas pa dbul te/ mchod pa rnam pa bdun gyis mchod de/ chu gtsang gis
184a5(rgyud 'grel): sku bsil zhing ras bzangs kyis sku byi dong bya ba dang / me tog man+da ra ba la sogs pa'i phreng ba dang / sil snyan gyis mchod pa dang / tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / ga bur dang / gla rtsa dang / rgya spos la sogs pa'i dud pas mchod pa dang /
184a6(rgyud 'grel): rin po che 'bar ba dang / mar me'i phreng ba gcig gam/ bcu 'am brgya skyong dbul ba dang / tsan dan la sogs pa'i dri'i byug pa bya ba dang / 'bras chan dang / sran chan dang / gro chen dang / nas chan dang / zho dang mar dang / sha skam dang nya skam dang
184b1(rgyud 'grel): nya btsos pa dang / na ri ke le dang / a 'a bra dang / bil ba dang / nyo tI la sogs pa'i 'bras bu dang / gro ma dang / nyung ma dang / la phug dang / be la sha la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang / khur pa dang la du la sogs pas mchod pa dang / dung la sngogs
184b2(rgyud 'grel): pa sil snyan dang dbyangs kyi rim pas mchod pa'o// yon la rin po che sna bdun dang / bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad dang / chu mig dang / nags tshal dang / skyed mos tshal dang / spang ljongs dang / mtsho dang / steng ka la sogs pa/ gzugs sgra'i bye brag
184b3(rgyud 'grel): ji snyed pa blo dang dngosu 'byor pa dbu'o// 'brel pa namakha'i snying po'i medo nas// sems gnyis bskyed nas sangs rgyas mchod// mchod pa yon dang bcas pa yis// rgyal dang de yi sras mnyes nas// 'gro ba'i don la reg par 'gyur zhes bya'o//
184b4(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa yang rten gong ltar bstod byed dang / dgos pa mnyes pa dang / de la dgos pa phyogs dus kun gyi sangs rgyas sras// gang dag 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'o// 'gro ba 'dren par gang bzhugs pa/ sku'i mtshan ldan rnams la bstod
184b5(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i gsung can rnams la bstod// byams pa'i thugs ldan rnams la bstod// ces theg po chen po'i mdo nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' bstod pa nyid kyis stong ngo do// 'brel pas kun nas brjod pas so// phyag 'tshal
184b6(rgyud 'grel): ba la yang gong ltar drug gis theg pa chen po nas phyag 'tshal ba gsum mam/ bdun nas stong dang khri'i bar du 'tshal ba'o// skyabs dngos dang dbye ba gnyis las/ dngos la gsum/ skyabs la sngon gyi sbyor ba rnams shes nas// slob
185a1(rgyud 'grel): dpon dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
185a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la skya bsu mchi'o// zhi ba 'dod chags dang bral ba theg pa chen po'i tshis la skyabasu mtsha'o// kun la skyob par mdzad pa'i 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la skyab su mchi'o// zhes lani gsum
185a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod do// dbye ba la brgyad/ dbang po dang / rten skyabasu mchi ba nyan thos lta/ bdun lo gzhan 'dra ste/ yid theg pa chen pa'i chos dang / gzhan dag la dad pa'o// sbyor ba lus dag yid gong ltar dang / gzhan/ skyabs/ sems rten dang / sangs
185a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas sprul skuro shes pa// chos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dge 'dun 'jam dpal la sogs par shes par bya'o// mchod pa'i gong gi'o// dus mtho' thug pa med pa 'am/ byang chub bar du'o/ yon tan 'khor ba las thar pa
185a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / gzhan don nus pa'o// spyod pa la 'jug pa nas// khyod kyi thugs rjes rje su bzung bas na/ srid la mi 'jigs sems can phan pa bgyi/ zhes pas so// mi nyams pa bya ba la gong mo'i 'jig rten gyi sbrengs pa'i steng du gzhan don bya ba
185a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / srog gcod pa spangs nas gzhan la mi 'tshe ba dang / mu stegs dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang mi 'grogs pa'o// sdig pa bshags pa rten dang / mkhan po'i spyan sngar/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis// thog med dus
185b1(rgyud 'grel): nas 'khor bar 'khor// shin tu ma rig sdig pa'i las// sna tshogs bgyis dang bgyid du stsal// rje su yi rang bgyis pa bshags zhes pa dang / mdo gzhan nas bstan pa ltar bshagaso// yi rang ba'i rim pa mdo gzhan ltar yang bya
185b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag na// skye bo rnams kyis dge spyang dang // de yi stobs kyis bder 'gyur la'ang // bdag ni shin tu yi rang ngo // nyan thos rang rgyal bde ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la'ang // nges par de ring
185b3(rgyud 'grel): yi rang ngo // sangs rgyas mdzad pa gang byung dang // sems can bde la yi reng ngo // bskul ba/ sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems// de dag tshogs la bdag bskul na// sems can rang dgar mi gtad par// chos kyis rgyud khyod
185b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bskor// gsol ba gdab pa/ phyogs bcu sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' 'don mdzod la// sems can bde lam bkod par// mya ngan mi 'dab bzhugs par gsol// de rnams kyi dge ba bsngo ba//
185b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis de ltar dge spyad pas// nam kho'i khyab pa'i sems can rnams// dge ba 'di yo byin pas brlabs kyis// pha rol phyin drug mthar phyin nas// thams cad byang chub chen por shog/ gal te byang chub ma thob par// theg
185b6(rgyud 'grel): chen chos la mi spyod pa dang // 'gro don mi 'dor 'khor ba las// 'gro rnams myur du sgrol bar shog/ mdo gzhan ltar yang gdab po// dngos la gnyis te/ smon pa dang / 'jug pa'o// smon pa ni slob dpon dgongasu gsol//
186a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa la rjesu slob po// rjes
186a2(rgyud 'grel): su sgrub bo/ rjesu bgyid do/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba rnams la ji ltar phan pa de ltar bdag kyang phan por bgyid do zhes lan gsum brjod do// dngos 'jug pa ni/ slob dpon dgongasu gsol/ de
186a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba dang / tshul khrims la byung ba'i dge ba dang / bzod pa las byung ba'i dge ba dang
186a4(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus las byung ba'i dag pa dang / bsam gtan las byung ba'i dag pa dang / shes rab las byung ba'i dge bo'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyis sems can ma grol ba thams cad gros pa mams ma bskal ba thams cad bsngal
186a5(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad pa dang / dbugs ma phyin pa thams cad dbugs phyin par mdzad pa dang // mya ngan las ma 'das pa thams cad mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang dus 'di ni sa bzung nas/ nam
186a6(rgyud 'grel): snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du bdag gis sbyin pa las byung ba'i rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i dge ba dang / bzod pa las byung ba'i dge ba dang / brtson 'grus las byung ba'i dge pa dang / bsam gtan las byung ba'i
186b1(rgyud 'grel): dge ba dang / shes rab las byung ba'i dge ba ji snyed bgyid pa de snyed kyis sems can ma grol ba thams cad dgrol bar bgyi'o// ma rgal ba thams cad bskal bar bgyi'o// dbugs ma phyin pa thams cad dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o// mya
186b2(rgyud 'grel): ngan las ma 'das pa thams cad mya dran las bzla bar bgyi'o zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o// slob dpon dgongasu gsol/ gal te sdom pa las nyams na slar gso bas gnang du gsol zhes lan gsum brjod do// mjug gi don shes
186b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba la gsum ste/ dgos pa shes par bya ba dang / thob par shes pa dang / mjug mi nyams pa'o// dgos pa shes pa la gnyis te/ sbyor ba dang rten no// sbyor ba la mchod pa la sogs pa dag las skye bas dang dgos par shes
186b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / rten gzhan dang bdag nyid las/ gzhan la rten dang dbang po gnyis/ dbang po sdom pa la gnas pa mkhas pa'i slob dpon las skyo bar shes pa dang / yi dam dang dbang po las skye ba'o// rte ni byang chub chen po la sogs pa'i
186b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum las skye'o// bdag las skye ba gong gi nyan thos kyi ltar khyad par du 'phags pa drug dang / phan sems yod pa nus pa dang ldan pa las skye bar shes par bya'o// thob par shes pa lo bcu ste/ rten dang / dbang po dang / sems can
186b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / sbyor ba dang / blangs pa dngos dang / sems can byang chub la dgod pa'i bsam pa dang / mi ldog pa'i bsam pa dang / blangs pa'i dus de nyid nas yid ches pas thob pa'o// mi nyams par bya ba la gsum ste/
187a1(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya ba dang / shes pas spang ba dang / shes pas bsgrub pa'o// shes par bya ba la lnga ste/ sdom pa'i ngo bo dang / rten gyi khyad par gyis bslab pa'i rim pa dang / dus dang rigs dang / sdom pa
187a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum ldan du shes par bya ba'o// ngo bo smon 'jug gnyis las smon pa'i ngo bo dang / grogs gnyis te/ de yang ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pas ngo bo yang dag par blangs pa'i sems pa dge ba rgyun chags 'bras bu la dam 'cha'
187a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// de yang dad pa dang / snying rje dang / 'dod dang / khas blang ba bzhi las dang ba'i dad pa gzhan don gyis bdag grol bar shes pa dang / bden snyam pa dang / bdag la snying rje skyes pas gzhan don la mos pa'o// mos pa skyes nas rgyun sa
187a4(rgyud 'grel): bcu man chad du yin dgos pas smon pa'i dge ba'i rgyun sems can la sangs rgyas kyi bya bas smon pa sems can sangs rgyas su 'dod la/ bas len dam 'cha' ba'o// grogaso la bdun te/ 'dun pas lta bu 'jug pa'i gzhi byed pa
187a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa zla ba tshos pa lta bu dge ba 'phel ba dang / sbyor ba mi lta bu dngos po thams cad bsreg pa dang / bsam pa bzang po gser lta bu sems mi nyams pa dang / skyob pa ma lta bu nyes pas mi gos pa dang / 'brel
187a6(rgyud 'grel): pa rgyu 'bras lta bu thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba dang / myur ba thog lta bus la sbyor ba'o// 'jug pa'i ngo bo de yang ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pas yang dag par blangs pa'i sems po dge ba rgyun chags rgyu la dam 'cha' ba'i ngo bo
187b1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de yang gong ltar bzhi/ yid ches pa'i dad pa sangs rgyas gzhan don las 'byung bas gzhan don las 'byung bas gzhan la snying rje skyes te/ sangs ma rgyas bar du 'phro mo gcod pa dang / gzhan don byed pas gzhan don khas
187b2(rgyud 'grel): blangs pa dang / bdag gzhan sangs rgyas pa'i rgyu sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin dang bcas pa'i sdig spong ba so so thar pa'i bslab pa/ dge ba chos sdud pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa/ sems can drin byed de gnyis sems
187b3(rgyud 'grel): can don du spyod la stobs gar cher de la yang 'byed pa dang phye zhing spyod pa'o// de yang sangs ma rgyas bar du sangs rgyas 'dod pa'i rgyu spyod par khas len pa'o// grogs la bzhi ste// sems can thams cad sngon 'brel gyi bur shes nas
187b4(rgyud 'grel): byams bi bye ba dang / mchags pas 'dod pa'o ches ni smyon pa da / chos thams cad bdag med pas ring la 'dod pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas gzhan don las 'byung bas rgyu 'bras mi dgag pa'o// rten gyi khyad par gyis bslab pa
187b5(rgyud 'grel): rim pa shes par bya ba la gnyis te/ rten dang / bslab pa'i chos so// rten la yang gnyis te/ 'dod pa chung ba dang che ba'o// che ba la yang gnyis te/ las dang po pa dang / mthar phyin pa dag pa'o// bslab pa'i rim pa gnyis te/ spyod pa
187b6(rgyud 'grel): dang mjug pa'o// smon pa la yang gnyis te/ btags pa ba ni gong gi mi dang zhes pa'i rten tsam la yang skye la/ dngos thob nas ngo bo dang ldan par bsrung ba'i las dang po'o// 'jug pa la gnyis/ btags pa pa las dang po bde la ying
188a1(rgyud 'grel): yod de/ dngos sa dang po pa dag pa la yod pa'o// las dang po pa'i bslab bya la gsum ste/ gzhi lam 'bras bu ste/ gzhi la yang gsum ste/ sbyor ba sngon du song bas mos pa smon pas gsum la skyabs
188a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / dbang po shes nas gnas tshol ba dang / bsam pa'o// bsam pa bdag la sems pa dang / gzhon la sems pa'o// bdag la sems pa la bzhi ste/ bdag gi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba dang / dgos pa lus ngag gi dge
188a3(rgyud 'grel): ba bya ba dang / grogs lus dal/ ngag dben/ yid zhi ba dang / longs spyod kyis tshogs bsags pa'o// gzhan sems pa la gnyis te/ snying rje dang bzod pa'o// snying rje chos la dmigaso pa dang / gang zag la dmigs pa'o//
188a4(rgyud 'grel): bzod pa sdug bsngal dang du len pa dang / sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam po'o// lam pha rol tu phyin pa drug smon pas spyod pa'o// 'bras bu skye ba las dbang ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / las dang / thabs dang / sems can gyi don
188a5(rgyud 'grel): don byed pa la dbade ba lnga'o// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lus dang po'i bslab bya la yang gsum ste/ gzhi sbyor ba sngon du song bas skyabs po dang / dbang po dang / bsam pa 'jug pa'i sems kyis gong bzhin 'dod pa'o// bsam
188a6(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhan la sems pa kho na ste/ snying rje dang / bzod pa la gnyis te/ snying rje la yang gang zag la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa dang / dmigs pa med pa gsum ste/ gang zag la dmigs pa ni mu stegs dang / nyan thos
188b1(rgyud 'grel): dang thun mong ste// sems can rkyen gyis sdug bsngal ba la skye ba'o// chos la dmigs pa ni sems tsam ste/ chos nyid ma rtogs pas lan te rtogs par byed pa'o// dmigs pa med pa dbu ma ste/ sdug bsngal ba chos nyid ma
188b2(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa la snying rje bskyed pa'i dus na rab tu mi gnas par shes pas gsum bsdus pa'o// bzod pa gzhan don du sdug bsngal phra mo la sron zhing dad du lon pa'o// goms nas che bas mi gnod la ji mi snyam pa dang / bzod pa
188b3(rgyud 'grel): de dang mi bzod pa rab tu mi gnas par brjod pa gsum ga bsgom pa'o// lam pha rol tu phyin pa drug gzhan don du rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'bras bu re ba med pa dang / sku bzhi dang gis 'byung ba'o// dus la 'dod pa chung ba'i
188b4(rgyud 'grel): mtha' med pa dang / chen po'i rgyu bskyed pa'i dus blangs ma thog dang / lam sgrub pa snying po byang chub thob par dang / sangs rgyas pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med gsum pa'o// rigs la gnyis te/ zla ba yar ngo la sems bskyed
188b5(rgyud 'grel): thob pa rnams byams pa la sogs pa ltar bram ze las sangs rgyas pa dang / mar ngo las thob pa rnams shAkya thub pa la sogs pa ltar rgyal rigs las sangs rgyas pa'o// gsum dang ldan par shes par bya ba la gnyis te/ ldan
188b6(rgyud 'grel): lugs bstan pa dang / nges pa bskyed pa'o// ldan lugs la na mkha'i snying po'i mdo nas/ chos dang gang zag gcig nyid sems// smon dang mjug dang so sor thar// rig pa sbyor bas gzhan gyi don// nus na gong nas gong du 'gyur zhes
189a1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa bzhin te/ gong gi so sor thar pa'i bslab pa ris bdun gyi bye brag de rang gi sems yin pas 'og ma'i nyan thos ma spangs par theg pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang yin la/ de
189a2(rgyud 'grel): yang sems kyi snang ba phung po dang khams dang / skye mched rgyud ltar lhar gnas pa'o// de yang / sngags kyi dam tshig ni/ bdag dang dgos pa ltar gnas pa mthong bas lha dang / lha mi gnod pas nyan thos lter nyes pa sbyong ba dang / lha
189a3(rgyud 'grel): ma yin pa gzhan gyis ma rtogs pas byang chub sems dpa' ltar phan 'dogs pa dang / de ltar sems su 'dus pa'i don la sems can rnams shin tu 'khrul nas sems rab tu mi gnas par ma shes shing bdag tu bzung ba la
189a4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje skyes nas so sor thar pa'i bslab pa dang / dam tshig spyod pa dag la dmigs pa med pas smon 'jug gzhan don du byed pa dang / de yang sngags kyis lhar snang ba thams cad sems kyi 'phrul par snang bas
189a5(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos bye brag tu spyod la/ bye brag ma 'gags na nus pa so sbyor 'byung bas byang chub sems dpa' ltar 'dogs pa dang / de ltar sems kyi rgyun la rten nas sku bzhi 'byung bas/ 'gro da 'dren pa'i snang ba ltar so so thar pa'i bslab
189a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang / sngags kyi dam tshig dang gsum ldan pa'o// sku bzhi nus pa so so nas snang zhing chos skur 'dus 'byung ba bzhin sdom pa yar ldan du 'gyur te/ so so thar pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur/
189b1(rgyud 'grel): de sngags su 'gyur/ de so sor snang bar yang btub pa bzhin no// nges pa bskyed pa yang bzhi ste/ gzhi ma nyams pa dang / rgyu ma nyams pa dang / lam ma nyams pa dang / 'bras bu ma nyams pa'o// gzhi ma nyams pa slob dpon la la dag
189b2(rgyud 'grel): rten dang rten par sdom pa gsum min par 'dod/ de mi bden te/ ka bas gdung dang 'og khang gis snang khang bteg pa ltar ma yin zer ba mi rigs te/ sdom pa yar ldan du gnas gyur pas sa bon gyi dus na sa bon ma nyams/ myu gu ma
189b3(rgyud 'grel): spangs/ 'bras bu'i dus na 'bras bu ma nyams la/ sa bon ma spangs te/ dam tshig gi dus na so sor thar par ma song ste/ mi gnas med kyang nyes pa med do// nyams pa spang / slob dpon la la mi gcig gis mi mang po gsod na/ mi
189b4(rgyud 'grel): gcig po de ma bsad na byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa nyams la/ bsad na so so thar pa'i sdom pa nyams par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ ma shin brdzun nam thabs kyi yan lag nyams zer te/ de yang mi bden te/ so sor thar pa'i ltung
189b5(rgyud 'grel): ba ni sbyor ba dang ngos su mjug rdzogs pas 'ong ste/ sbyar ba dang / mjug med pa dang / dngos so sor thar pa bdag 'khor ba la 'jigs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don du dmyal ba la mi 'jigs par nyes pa len pa/
189b6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar srog mang bar bton pa dang / gcig la sdig pa dgos pa dang / bdag dmyal ba la mi 'jigs par rang yang thar pa'o// de bzhin du brdzun sogs yan lag dang bcas pa ma nyams pas so// lam ma nyams pa yang slob
190a1(rgyud 'grel): dpon la la dag/ so sor thar pa'i bslab pa rten du dgos na/ sor thar pa'i bslab pa gong gi kya yul lu rtsod byang chub kyi sems 'gro ba gzhan dang gling gzhan la skye zer te/ de yang mi bden te/ de ltar mu stegs ltar
190a2(rgyud 'grel): rkyen med pas rgyu gtso bas las brdzun te/ 'gro drug so sos bskyed la dge bas thar pas thob pa'i rgyu yin pa la/ dge bas ngan 'gror 'gro ba yang yod dgos pa la med pa des de ltar ma yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs rjes sems can
190a3(rgyud 'grel): mor skyes la/ mi bsnyen gnas bsrungs pas nyan thos kyi rten bzong ba de goms pa las byang chub kyi sems// de las sngagasu 'gyur bas thams cad mkhyen pa'o// rgyu rkyen ma song bar thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung na/ mu stegs dang
190a4(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos la thams cad mkhyen pa rigs na// chos nyid stong pa shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs pas 'thob zer na/ chos nyid yod pas 'thob na sems can la cis med// rtogs pas chog na rtogs tshod gang kho na// rtogs tshad gang kho
190a5(rgyud 'grel): na tsam gyis chog nad lta ga ro/ tshod bstan du yod na thams cad mkhyen te brtag dpyad rigs pa bzhis ci bya/ med na rtsod pa brjod pa la don med/ thob pas mkhyen na thob rgyu brtag ste/ des na lam sngon du ma song bar 'gro ba gzhan dang / mi
190a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag la byang chub sems mi skye ba'o// 'bras bu ma nyams par bya ba slob dpon la la nyan thos kyi rigs dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen po dang / rigs nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / chad pa drug yod la/ sangs rgyas
190b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang rim gyis dang / nyan thos las ldog pa dang / rang sangs rgyas las ldog pa dang / so sor yod pa mtshan nyid kyis sangs rgyas pa dang / sngags kyis dang / sangs rgyas so sor yod pa la/ bstan pa yun ring thung dang / chos theg pa cha chung
190b2(rgyud 'grel): ston la/ bram ze dang rgyal rigs so sor 'dod de/ da mi bden te/ gzhi don dam la yang sems can dang / sangs rgyas gnyis la khyad med par// sangs rgyas la khyad yod de/ rgyu rig pa bzang rtag tu sbyong ba la yang 'dra snyam lam sems gnyi
190b3(rgyud 'grel): dang phar phyin drug spyod pa la yang 'dra mnyam// 'bras bu 'dod pa che chung bstan pa dang / chos rigs kyang gdul bya ste/ sku bzhi lo bzang ngan med/ gal te yod ni gang bzhin du dge bas ngan song dang / sdig pa dang thar pa dang dang / nyan thos
190b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bcu bzhi po'i sa dang / sngags dang nyan thos la sogs par 'gro ba'o// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs bde ba chen por gnas shing chos skur snang yang ma grub cing snang la/ gsung brjod du med par gnas te/ theg pa gsum
190b5(rgyud 'grel): dang theg pa'i dgos par yang gsung ngo // sku bcu bzhi'i sa la bzhugs la rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo gzugs skur ston no// yon tan spros pa dang bral la bzang ngan gyi rtog pa 'dod yon du snang grub bo// phrin las bya btsal dang bral ba dgyes rdor
190b6(rgyud 'grel): ltar sems can thams cad/ rigs lnga dang / gsum dang / gcig tu grub pa'o// de ltar shes pas sdom pa gsum rdzogs nas gsum ldan du bya'o// sngags kyi rgyas par 'og gi skabasu bstan pa nas dbang thob par shes par gyis
191a1(rgyud 'grel): shig/ shes pas spang ba la gnyis te/ nyes pa shes pa dang / spang ba'o// nyes pa shes pa la smon 'jug gnyis te/ smyon pa'i rtsa ba'i nyes pa gzhan don la smon pa gzhag nas nyan thos su 'gyur /
191a2(rgyud 'grel): yan lag la bzhi ste/ dkon mchog/ mkhan po/ slob dpon/ rnal 'byor pa/ paN+Di ta/ dge 'dun chos skyong ba'i rgyal po/ pha ma// mchod par 'os pa bslus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa mthong ba thos pa/
191a3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon gcig pa dus gcig tu bskyed pa la phrag dog gis bskyed pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bye brag gong nas gang du 'pho bar mi bar de rnams kyi dge ba'i rgyu 'bras la skur nas 'gyod pa
191a4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad la bdag gi lus ngag gis gnod pa byed pa'o// 'jug pa'i nyes pa la gnyis te/ rtse ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug gzhan don bor nas rang don du bsngo ba dang / yan lag la yang bzhi ste// zhe sdang gis
191a5(rgyud 'grel): bshags pas mi phan par gzhan 'chog pa dang chags pas ser sna dang ldan te/ chos nor dgos pa dang / 'dod pa la mi ster ba dang / chos rnams bdag med par ma shes par gzhan la 'gran sems kyis gnod pa dang / sangs rgyas
191a6(rgyud 'grel): zhan don las mi 'dod par rgyu 'bras bkag nas smon 'jug spong ba'o// spang ba la yang gnyis te/ smon pa nyams par shes smon pas nyes pa spang / 'jug pa'i nyes pa 'jug pas spang ba'o// shes pas bsgrub pa la gnyis te/ yon
191b1(rgyud 'grel): tan du shes pa dang / yon tan du shes pa sgrub pa'o// yon tan la gsum ste/ sangs rgyas la skyabs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhal mthong ba dang / chos la skyabs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos nyan cing zhal mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
191b2(rgyud 'grel): dge 'dun la skyabs pas grogs byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa'o// lam gyi yon tan mkhan po dang bla ma mchod pas dad lha nyod sangs rgyas dang 'grogs pa dang / sems can slu ba dang 'gyod pa spangs nas pha rol tu phyin pa
191b3(rgyud 'grel): drug spyad pas de lta nyid theg pa chen po'i chos nyan pa dang / gzhan la gnod sems spangs nas phan sems dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' dang da ltar 'grogs pa'o// 'bras bu'i yon tan 'jug pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pas
191b4(rgyud 'grel): gdul bya la sbrul sku dang / tshogs rdzogs pa'i snang ba la longs sku ste/ da lta nyid sangs rgyas yin pa dang / gang 'dod gang phan spyod pas da lta nyid chos ston pa dang / bstan pa dang spyod pas phan pas da lta nyid du byang chub sems dpas
191b5(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba'o// bsgrub par bya la bzhi ste/ sdom pa gsum bsgrub pa dang / mi nyams par bya ba dang / rgyas par bya ba dang / nyes pa bcos thabaso// sdom pa gsum sgrub pa ni sdom pa dngos dang / rang bzhin dang bcas pa'i sdig pa spang ba
191b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba bsgrub pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/ sbyin pa chos skyabs dang / zang zing gi sbyin pa bdag gtong ba po dang / gzhan len pa po dang / sbyin par bya ba'i rgyu gsum sgyu mar shes pa'i gzhan don sgrub pa dang /
192a1(rgyud 'grel): dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang / sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can don byed kyi tshul khrims dang / sdug bsngal dang du len pa dang / sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa dang / zab mos bzod pa dang /
192a2(rgyud 'grel): go cha'i brtson 'grus dang / sbyor ba dang / nges par spyod pa dang / mi 'geng ba'i dang / dpa' bo'i brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan lus dal/ ngag dben/ sems zhi ba dang / thos bsam bsgom pa'i shes rab rnams sgyu mar shes pa
192a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan don bsgrub pa'o// sems can don byed kyi tshul khrims gzhan don du sbyin sogs stobs gar tshe rim pa dang / dam bcas pa med pas sgyu ma'i rnam pas sgyu ma shes pas bsgrub pa'o// mi nyams par bya ba la brgyad do// sems can
192a4(rgyud 'grel): sngon las kyi 'bras bu yin pas dben por bsgrub pa pa dang / ma chags pas lus dang longs spyod dge ba sbyin pa dang / bdag med pas 'bras bu mi re ba dang / sangs rgyas gzhan las 'byung bas skyo ba mi bya ba dang / slob dpon
192a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang 'dra bas bsnyen pa dang / grogs po byang chub sems dpa' bsnyen pa dang / dge bar byed pa thams cad la yi rengs pa dang bskul ba dang / lus ngag yid kyis gzhan don las gzhan mi bya ba'o// rgyas par bya ba la
192a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis te/ ma rgyas pa dang / de rgyas par bya ba'o// mo rgyas pa la rgyu 'bras gnyis te/ rgyu la bsngo ba ma shes pa/ bsngo ba lus pa/ bsngo ba log pa/ bsdom dag pa/ bsngo ba ma rgyas po'o// bsngo ba ma shes pa ni sngon du sems can la khas blangs
192b1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ chos nor skyabs mi ster ba'o// mi 'dod mi dgos mi phan na nyes pa med do// bsngo ba lus pa ni sbyin par bsams nas ma byin pa'o// de yang mi 'dod mi dgos mi phan phran chung gnod na nyes pa med do// bsngo ba log pa ni gcig la
192b2(rgyud 'grel): bsngos nas gzhan gcig la byin na'o// gcig stobs che la gcig mi 'dod sogs gong ltar na nyes pa med do// bsngo ba mi dag pa ni lan la ra ba dang / drin partsis pa dang / 'di'i phan la mi re ba'o// des chos 'phel zhing rang
192b3(rgyud 'grel): gi yid la tshe 'do yi 'dod pa med na nyes pa med do// bsngo ba ma rgyas pa ni grags pa dang / gzhan 'og tu gzhug pa ste/ dus bstan pa la phan zhing yid la myed na nyes pa med do// 'bras bu la yang lbu ste/ bsngo ba lus pa ni
192b4(rgyud 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad kyang dag pa'i rtsa ba ma bsngos pa'o// bsngo ba ma shes pa ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rgyu las 'bras bu longs spyod che ba la sogs par re ba'o// bsngo ba log pa ni bdag don du bsngos pa'o// bsngo ba ma dag pa ni/
192b5(rgyud 'grel): sems can sangs rgyas su mi smon pa'o// bsngo ba ma rgyas pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyas ma thabs pa'o// rgyas par bya ba de rnams las bzlog pa ste/ shes pa/ ma lus pa/ ma log pa/ dag pa/ rgyas pa/ byang chub sems
192b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' 'dod pa che bas sems can la bsngo ba ma lus pa la sogs pas sbyin no// rgyas pa la sogs pas bsngos po sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag sku bzhi thob ste/ sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad sku bzhi la dgod
193a1(rgyud 'grel): par smon la gzhan yang mdo dang / slob dpon gzhan ltar smon no// 'dod pa chung ba de dag rnams sems can thams cad sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du sems can gyi don byed cing 'grub par smon la/ mdo dang brtan/
193a2(rgyud 'grel): bcos gzhan ltar yang smon no// rgyas pa chen por ni 'jig rten gyi dge ba'i rgyu 'bras la yi rang zhing bsngos par 'gyuraro// nyams pa bcos pa'i thabs la gsum ste/ nyams pa'i tshad dang / thabs dang / nyams pa bcos pa nyes
193a3(rgyud 'grel): par bstan pa'o// tshe nga ni rtsa ba'i pham pa bzhi las bdag nyid rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la rab tu zhen nas bdag lnga bstod la gzhan la smod na pham pa dang po byung ba'o// bdag la nor zas yod pa la sdug bsngal la mgon med pa
193a4(rgyud 'grel): bkres sogs smod pa la snying sran gyis mi ster ba dang / dad pa dang / gus pa dang legs pas chos 'dod pa la snying mi brtse bas chos mi ster ba ste gnyis pa byung ba'o// zhe sdang ba do nas gzhan la khros te 'thab mo sogs kyis bshags
193a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la mi nyan par brdeg pa la sogs pa byed par zhe sdang drag pos 'chang na gsum pa byung ba'o// theg pa chen po'i sde snod 'gro ba skyob pa la skur pa 'dabs shing gzhan gyis zhar la btsas pa'i chos ma yin pa la mos dga' sten nyan ni
193a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' pham pa bzhi pa byung ba'o// yan lag sdom pa nyi shu pa ltar nyon mongs pa'i sems dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'o sems kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi mchod pa la sogs pa'i sdom pa rnam so// bcos pa'i thabs dag
193b1(rgyud 'grel): ni rtsa ba bzhi gang byung yang / nyon mongs pa drug po byung nas nyams pa sngon bzhin 'gyod pas blang / nyon mongs pa 'bring na khrel yod pa ngo tsha shes nas mkhas par gnas pa gsum la bshags/ des kyang 'gyod dam zhes dri/ 'gyod do/
193b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan gsum brjod cing phyin chad bsdam/ nyon mongs pa chung na gcig po de'i drung du bshag so// 'gyang ngam zhes pa dang 'gyod do zhes lan gsum dri ba zla bar bya'o// yan lag rnams byung na'ang de bzhin du bshags te/ nyes pa dang nyes pa
193b3(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i khyad par sdom pa nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa nas shes par bya'o// nges pa bskyed pa la bcos pa dang / byed pa spro ba gnyis las/ bcos pas nges pa bskyed pa ni ma ga d+ha ra shA ri'i bus sangs rgyas spyan sngar sems bskyed nas bya rgod kyi
193b4(rgyud 'grel): phung po'i ro'i nub tu gsang ba gsum pa'i phug tu bsgoms pas bram ze gcig slong du byung ste/ ci 'dod byas pas khyod kyi lag pa g.yas pa 'dod zer nas/ lag pa bcad nas g.yon pa'i khar gzhag nas byin pas ma 'dod nas/ ngas
193b5(rgyud 'grel): ni sems can gyi ngan mi 'ong ngo // slad zer nas byin pa yang mi 'dod pa snyam ste yi mug por gyur nas smon pa dang 'jug pa gnyis ka btang ba la/ sangs rgyas kyi na mkha' nas tshigasu bcad pa gsungs te/ thabs dang ldan la byang chub sem
193b6(rgyud 'grel): thabs med pas ni nyan thos te// khyod rang thab sol mi mkhas pas// g.yon pa mi 'dong mgos sbyin med// ces brjed nas bram ze lag pa g.yon pa mi 'dod pa la g.yon pas ster ba rang gis nyes na ci la yi chad/ mgo thog tu gzhag
194a1(rgyud 'grel): la sbyin mod/ nga yang thabs la mkhas pas sangs rgyas bsgrub par bya'o// zhes gsungs pas slar 'gyod nas blangs pas thob/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras sems bskyed nas pha bsad de/ yang 'gyod na
194a2(rgyud 'grel): sngaslar blangs pas thob bo// mdo gzhan nas kyang blta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa gser dngul ltar bcos su btub pas nyams pa med de/ med pas spros pa la rgyu 'bras gnyis la/ 'bras ba'i yon tan dpag tu med cing rtag
194a3(rgyud 'grel): mang bas 'dir brjod pas mi zad pas ma bstan te mdo gzhan du blta bar bya zhing shes par bya'o// rgyu pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa'i 'bras bu gzhan la bsngos pas tshogs lam la sbyor ba dang / sbyor lam la sbyor ba'o// de'i rgyu 'bras chos
194a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rab tu mi gnas par shes pas mthong ba'i lam la sbyor ba'o// de rnams mi gnas par shes nas rgyun chad pas bsgom pa'i lam la sbyor ba'o// de sems can gyi don du pho rol tu phyin pa drug spyod po ltar snang yang 'bras bu lar
194a5(rgyud 'grel): nga med pas mthar phyin pa'i lam la sbyor ba'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa la chos nor la chags pa med nas dang po la sbyor ro// drug drang chags pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med na sa gnyis pa la sbyor ro// drug dang ma chags pa dang /
194a6(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa med nas zhe sdang med na so gsum pa la sbyor ro// de ltar snyoms las med na bzhi pa la sbyor ro// de ltar bcu dong ngal ba/ dben pa/ bzhi ba na lnga pa la sbyor ro// de ltar bcu gsum pa dang / 'khrul pa can na drug pa la sbyor ro//
194b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du skyon med na bdun pa la sbyor ro// de'i steng du zhum pa med na brgyad pa la sbyor ro// de'i steng du the tshom med na sa dgu pa la sbyor ro// de'i steng du rmongs pa med na sa bcu pa la sbyor ro// 'bras bu lam dang gnas pa dngos kyi mdo la so/
194b2(rgyud 'grel): blta bar gyis shig/ de ltar spyod lom du bya ba sems bskyed nas mdo sde pa dang / dbu ma pa'i bar du spyad pa la khyad med na/ 'dod pa la khyad med do// lta ba la lnga ste/ lnga char la re r-I ste/ mdo sde parten 'brel du 'dod de/ dper na ras
194b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon po'i khar shel gzhag pa dang 'dra ste/ shes pa dang rnam pa rtan 'brel yin/ ras kyi shel sngo byed ros yin/ de bzhin du ma yin nas tho dad na bye brag pa'i dge bas sems la mi phan pa dang / sdig pas sems la mi gnod de/ bya
194b4(rgyud 'grel): brag ma yin pas rten 'brel yin te/ dge ba'i rnam pas sems la phan la/ sems rten 'brel du ye yod pas gnod pa'i rnam pas skyed par byed pa'i rdul phra rab cha dang bcas pa skad cig gis ma rtogs pa'i sil bur 'dod la/ pha
194b5(rgyud 'grel): rol tu phyin pa drug kyang de tsam du rtogs pas 'bras bu skur bzhir 'dod do// bsgom pa ni de ltar rtogs sam shes na/ dngos po thams cad dang sems rten 'brel du ye yod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug las 'bras bu 'byung ste/ da
194b6(rgyud 'grel): lha de mi rtogs pas da ltar rten 'brel sems yin par khad kyis khad kyis bsgom par 'dod la/ de yang grub pa'i mtha' ma lus par ston pa theg pa chen po'i mdo nas/ rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas ni// skad cig skad cig la brtan nas//
195a1(rgyud 'grel): sems ni sna rtser brtan byas la// khyim par gyur kyang bsgom par bya// zhes pas rten 'brel shes pa'i rnam par bsgom pa'o// skyon bsal ba la gsum las lta ba'i skyon bsal ba ni mu sgrogs rgyu gtso bor 'do ga
195a2(rgyud 'grel): na re/ thams cad rgyu la rag las te// pad+ma la sogs me tog bzhin// 'gro ba so so'i rgyu nyid las// thar pa dang ni thams cad mkhyen ces brjod de/ sangs rgyas pa'i rgyu sems gdod ma na yod la/ gdod ma nas med na bsgrubs pas mi
195a3(rgyud 'grel): 'grub ste/ pad+ma rang la sngo dkar dmar po so so nA yod la/ de bzhin du sems can la sangs rgyas pa'i rgyu yod pas sangs rgya rgya med na btsal bas mi pan/ yod pa la bsgrub mo dgos/ yod pa shes pas chog zer ba de'i skyon no 'dir ni rgyu la rtso
195a4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub kyis 'ong bar 'dod pa'o// sgom pa'i skyon ni zhi ba dang / bye brag pa ste/ 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid ni/ phyi'i spyod yul las 'gags nas/ gnyis kyis bsgrubs pa'i zhi bar gnas// 'bad de bdag gis bsgom par bya// zhes pas rnam pa
195a5(rgyud 'grel): lo blo log ste/ rang gi sems zhi bar bying nas badra ba snyam byed pa dang / nyan thos bye brag tu smra ba'i min ta/ mdo las rgyal byed tshal ni nyams dga' bar// bad gi nyid gang gi gyur kyang bla'i// bye brag pa yA thar pa ni// nam yang go go tam ma
195a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo zhes pa ni gong du bstan pa'o// nyan thos mi gtsang ba dang / dbus dang / bden pa ngo zhis gnas pa'i sems de skyon no// 'dir rten 'brel du pha rol tu phyin pa drug skyid cing gong ltar gsal la mi rtog pa'o// theg pa chen po'i skyon ni
195b1(rgyud 'grel): mdo las bye brag bdag chos phung po gsum// gzhan spangs rang gi sdug bsngal zhi// bde bar 'dod pa dman pas te// slar yang chung bas 'khor bar 'gyur zhes pas yul bye brag tu 'dod cing / gang zag gi bdag yod pa yang min//
195b2(rgyud 'grel): med pa yang min zhes phung po gsum par 'dod la/ rang 'khor ba las thar pa'i bde ba 'dod pas bskal pa gcig nas slar 'khor ba'o// 'dir grub pa'i mtha' ma lus pa ston par byed pa'i theg pa chen po'i mdo nas/ pha rol phyin drug
195b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la bsngo// theg tshan chos la rnam par spyod// dge ba sems dang 'brel par brjod// mdo sde de ni theg chen bshad// ces pas de ltar gsum dang gong gi bsgom pa skad cig zer bas nyan thos bye brag tu smra ba skad cig nas mi rtag
195b4(rgyud 'grel): pa shes pa dang / khyim par shes pa dang / sems tsam snang bar mi 'dod pas de bzhin thag pa chen po'o// sems tsam zhe na/ rnam pa sems kho nar mi 'dod rten 'brel du 'dod de/ des spyod pa sgom po rnams so so'i rnam bcas kyi lta ba
195b5(rgyud 'grel): ni mdo sde pa ltar rton 'brel yin te/ thams cad sems yin la rnam pa yang sems kyi rnam par 'dod de/ lung las kyang / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khams gsum pa 'di ni sems tsam mo zhes pa dang / rigs pa yang nyi shu pa nas/ dug
195b6(rgyud 'grel): gis cig car sbyar bas na// phra rab rdul cha drug tu 'gyur// drug po dag kyang go gcig na// gong bu rdul phran tsam du 'gyur// zhes pas mdo sde pa'i phra rab bdun la rdul phran gcig yin pas phra rab drug char shar dang lho dang nub dang bya
196a1(rgyud 'grel): dang steng dang 'og gi cha des so sor dus gcig la phye zhing blang du btub na phra rab de la drug po'i gos nas yang drug blangs te phye bas phra rab med na/ shar phyogs gcig gi sa nas gcig len na ri'i gong bu 'di
196a2(rgyud 'grel): yo rdul phran du rigs te/ des na sems kho na ste/ pha rol phyin drug sems kyo rnam par gzhan don du spyad pas 'bras bu thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku bzhi don dam du 'dod pa'o// mdo sde pa dang nyan thos kyang kun rdzob tu mi 'geg so// slob
196a3(rgyud 'grel): dpon shes rab 'byung gnas sbas pa mnyam gzhag na mi rtog/ rjes la thams cad mkhyen par 'dod// sku gsung bdag po dkar dmar 'di 'khrul pa/ sangs rgyas pas snod gzhal yas khang / bcud lha dang lha mor mi rtog pa snang bar
196a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod do// gdag gi dbang phyug grags pa ni/ dgag sgrub gang yang med la mnyam gzhag dang rjes thob yang med par sna tshogs gnyis med du 'dod/ bsgom pa yang thams cad sems yin pas de la dang gis 'jog pa'o// skyon la
196a5(rgyud 'grel): lta ba'i skyon rig byed ltar song pa bsgom pa'i skyon mdo sde ba'o// rig byed pa na raM/ dngos po gang dang gang snang ba/ bya bral sems nyid chos skur snang // sems las gzhan yod ma yin la// gsal la mi rtog gnas bde ba// tshangs pa la
196a6(rgyud 'grel): yang tshangs de nyid// bdag gi ye shes tshangs pa'i mchog/ ces pa'i snang bas dngos po ci snang sems yin la/ de yang ye nas yin pas/ byi ba brtsal dang rtog pa dang / the tshom med la de yang chos sku snang yang sems nyid yin la mi
196b1(rgyud 'grel): rtog par gnas pas bde ste/ gsal mi rtog pa 'dri ni lha tshangs pa zhes bya/ chos sku zhes bya// sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/ de las don lhag pa gzhan med la/ de rtogs pas bdag lhun gyis grub cing sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar 'dod pa'o/
196b2(rgyud 'grel): mdo sde pa'i bsgom pa brtan par bya ba dang / sna rtser sems 'dzin pa'o// 'di ltar lta ba skad cig gis mi rtag pas khyad par ro// bsgom pa la sems yin pas mnyam gzhag rjes thob med la ye nas rang rig yin pas gom su med
196b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// rnam pa med pa'i lta ba ni rnam pa dang bcas pa ma yin te/ rnam pa 'khrul pa'i shes pa yin la don dam du rnam pa med pa'o// lung las/ bag chags kyis ni dkrugs pa'i sems/ don du snang ba rab tu 'jug ces pas
