304b6(rgyud 'grel): bsngal gcig tu bsdom pas ni// de'i 'bum gyi char mi phod// sangs rgyas stong gi 'od zer dang // byang chub sems dpa'i 'phrin las kun// rgyun du mdzad kyang phan mi 'gyur// bskal pa ther 'bum la sogs su// de ni thon par mi
305a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te// 'jig rten 'jig na'ang gzhan du 'pho// sa gol gcig gis byin par byed// de bas shin tu nan tan gyis// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// longs spyod mang du 'phel ba med// theg pa che la 'phyas
305a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dogs shing // thun mong mchog gis dngos grub rnams// shin tu ring bar gyur pa dang // gdul bya'i don rnams yil 'gyur zhing // lha spyod ya char gyur pa yis// theg pa phyin po 'dres pa nyid// bka'i byin nyams 'grub par dka'/
305a3(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba'i lha rnams g.yel ba dang // zab mo'i chos las ring 'gyur zhing // bskal par ngan song ltung bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor sngo skams nyid du 'gyur// rnal 'byor skyes bu chen po yis// dam tshig ma nyams gzhung mthun dang // lus la
305a4(rgyud 'grel): nad nyung mtshan ldan zhing // thun mong nyes byas dag par 'gyur// srid pa gsum la dbang bsgyur zhing // theg chen zab mo'i don thob gyur// gsung gis lha mnyes rgyud 'phel zhing // mthu dang byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// las
305a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams dus su 'grub par 'gyur// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs// thugs kyi skyo dub med pa dang // man ngag snod 'gyur dngos grub nye// dgongs zab don la mkhas pa dang // lha rnams kyis ni dbang bskur
305a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ yan lag dam tshig ma nyams na// skyon bzlog pa nyid yon tan 'gyur// bdud bzhi bcom zhing ngan song skyob// theg chen lta spyod gzhung bsrang bas// lha rnams 'gro zhing bsam pa 'grub//
305b1(rgyud 'grel): don gnyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// theg chen dam tshig la gnas na// 'og ma'i 'dul sdom dam tshig kun// bsrung ba med par thub pas na// dge slong byang chub sems dpa' dang // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor chen po
305b2(rgyud 'grel): yin/ nyams na bskang ba'i thabs rnams ni// byang chub sems kyi dam nyams na// mkhas la gnas te gnas par bya// sku yis dam tshig nyams gyur na// gang la nyams pa der song la// nor rdzas mnyes pa
305b3(rgyud 'grel): der phul nas// gang nyes tshig tu bshags byas la// phyin chad sdom pa legs par bca'// gal te grongs chang gyur pa na// de yi slob dpon bzhugs pa la// dam tshig gong ma bzhin du bshags// med na mnyam pa
305b4(rgyud 'grel): brgya la bshags// de yang rnyed par ma gyur na// de dang mnyam pa gsum bkug la// sbyin sreg me thab rab brtsigs nas// dkyil 'khor lha la mchod rjes su// spyan drangs gsang mtshan la sogs mchod// gong du smos pa'i yon rnams
305b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang mnyam po gsum la dbul bar bya// gal te gus par mi len na// gnyis ka rdo rje dmyal bar skye// de bas myur du tshangs pa bya// gsung gi dam tshig nyams gyur na// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs nyid du// nges par shes te
305b6(rgyud 'grel): skongs par 'gyur// bzlas pa sngags kyis bsab pa dang // bsgrub pa chen po gsum gyis bskang // thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na// 'gro drug sems su gsal rtogs na// bdag nyid bdag la gsang bar byed// mi rtog ting
306a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin rlung zhugs te// ma yengs blo la 'gris par bya'o// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// gang 'das de nyid sor bcug la// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi tshogs kyis bskang // de ltar nyams su blangs
306a2(rgyud 'grel): na skongs// snga rtags sdug bsngal 'byung mi 'gyur// dam tshig chen po dpes bstan pa// sa gzhi lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// lam dang 'bras bu'i chos rnams kun// dam tshig med par 'byung mi srid// su mtha'i mkhar gyi rang bzhin
306a3(rgyud 'grel): pas// srung ba thub dang ma thub las// legs nyes stobs chen spyod pa'o// rin chen lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// dngos grub dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung // nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// 'di yod thams cad shong bar
306a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// rno dpal mtshon gyi rang bzhin pas// 'khor ba'i dra ba gcod pa la// pha ma lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad spyod// rgya mtsho lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// rlabs chen dus dus 'byung bar byed//
306a5(rgyud 'grel): me dpung lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// gangs mtsho thams cad tshig par 'gyur// de bzhin rtsi sman rang bzhin pas// 'khor ba'i gtsang rnying ma lus 'byin// rgyal po lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// phyogs 'ga' brten yang rims kyis
306a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho// rgya mtsho nor len de da dpon dang // thog ma nas mthar 'dis phyin pas// 'di la shim tu nan tan bya'o// dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba// gud na yod pa ma yin te// rang gi sems nyid dam tshig yin// ji snyed snang
306b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i chos rnams kun// rang rig rkyen bral nyid snang bas// cir snang cir srid rang rig nyid// 'gro ldog spyi tshugs gang song yang // snying po'i don las 'da' mi srid// rang bzhin dam tshig chen po yi// rang bzhin lhun grub dam tshig
306b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ de rigs pas phyin ci ma log na// mngon snang gdags pa'i chos med pas// lta ba'i dam tshig chen por bshad// de dag blo la 'dris pa yis// spyod lam kun yang ma nyams par// ting 'i dzin rgyun gyi
306b3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig ste// sangs rgyas nyid dang spyod yul gcig/ 'di la bsrung ba ci yang med// nyams pa rdul tsam 'byung mi srid// ma 'gags spyod pa 'dzin med pas// lhag pa'i dam tshig rnam bzhi ldan// bsrung bye ma lus
306b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dir 'dus phyir// dam tshig kun gyi mdo zhes so// sgyu 'phrul rnam bkod gtor tshogs rgya mtsho'i rgyud chen las// lam 'bras snying po me long bcu gcig gis ma tshan pa// 'khor ba'i dang mchus tshul
306b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis sgeg pa'i blos bsdus pa'i// dge rtsas kun kyang dam gnas 'gro kun byang chub shog/ spyi'i dam tshig mdor bsdus pa// dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa// dam tshig chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
307a1(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang dam tshig mi 'gal ba ye shes dpas gyis mdzad pa bzhugs so//
307b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shI la sam+ba ra sa ma yA bi rud+hA nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang dam tshig mi 'gal ba zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal tshogs kun mkhyen dam/
307b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang phyug snying rje'i mchog gi bdud rtsis brlan pa'i blo gros can// gzhan don yon tan dri med bden pa'i rin chen rin thang med pa mang po 'thob pa'i mchog/ 'gro ba nyon mongs ha la ha la'i dug zos rnams la chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char pa yis//
307b3(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan 'das pa dam pa'i don byed pa yi dpal ldan gang yin khyed kyis rtag tu bsrungs// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing // bde gshegs byin brlabs med pa dang / mang du thos pa dang bral zhing // thos pa nyung ngus cho ga shes pa// mkhas
307b4(rgyud 'grel): panyid du rlom byed rnams// rgyud dang sngagangang phyug rgya sogs// sprin la sogs dang sangs rgyu sna yum// lung nod ji bzhin ma rtogs pas// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdom// dang por bzung nas de
307b5(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu sa rab tu byung nas dge slong ngam// dang por rab tu byung brten nas// sngags dang pha rol phyin lam gnas// phyi nas de rnams rmongs sogs kyi// 'dul ba yi ni bstan bcos las// nyan thos la sogs sdom gnas pa// so sor thar dang
307b6(rgyud 'grel): lo drir gnas// der bstan pa yi bslab pa rnams// phal cher bsrung bar ma nus pas// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang // 'gal ba nyid du gnas bzung nas// de ltar de spangs rnam par gnas// de dge mi shes bsal phyir dang // bstan
308a1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'khrul bzlog pa'i phyir// rigs 'dzin gyi ni dam tshig rnams// byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dang // so sor thar gsungs sdom pa ni// rgyu 'bras ltos 'brel grub rnams la// mi 'gal 'brel pa gsal bar bya// sgrub
308a2(rgyud 'grel): ba lung bzhin bya ba ni// dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal snu nas// yang dag shes rab pha rol phyin// mngon par rtogs pa brgyad rnams dang // dam tshig dbang bskur thib pa yis// shin tu man ngag dang ldan pas// dpal ldan 'dus sogs rgyud kyi don/
308a3(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis ni rnam dbye ba// thob pa des bsam snying rje yis// bdag dang gzhan gyi byang chub phyir// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de// kun las phyir mi ldog brtan bya// thabs kyi rang bzhin bya ba 'am// sgom pa yi ni lam dag ste// sbyin la sogs
308a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bslab pa la// yang na sngags spyod rim pa las// rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni// bsten pa yongs su btang mi bya// mdo sde chos mngon 'dul ba yi// gtsug lag gi ni bstan bcos dang // gtsug lag ma yin lo dr-i sogs// slob dang
308a5(rgyud 'grel): rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// so sor thar sogs sdom pa ni// dge slong blo dang ldan pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' yang dag bsten// bdag dang gzhan gyi byang chub dang // dpal ldan 'chi bdag las rgyal
308a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i// bstan pa yang ni bsrung phyir dang // de bzhin 'jig rten gsum gnas pa'i// mi dang lha sogs 'jig rten rnams// sems sun 'byin pa gzhom phyir ro// sdom pa'i rnam par dbye ba ni// dpal ldan rgyal bas gang gsungs pa// phan
308b1(rgyud 'grel): tshun 'gal ba dag tu ni// gang yang nam du'ang gnas ma yin// chos 'dul las ni bcom ldan gyis// so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni// rnam pa brgyad gsungs 'di lta ste// dge slong dang ni dge slong ma// dge slong dge tshul dge tshul ma// de bzhi
308b2(rgyud 'grel): dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma// bsnyen gnas la ni gnas pa'o// de rnams bslab pa'ang rnam dbye ba dpal ldan thub pa'i dbang chen po// snying rje ldan pas gsungs pa ni// dge bsnyen pho mo dag gi sdom// rnam pa lnga ru rab bstan te// 'di ltar srog gcod spyod
308b3(rgyud 'grel): ba nas da myos 'gyur chang mi 'thung ba'i bar// dge tshul pho mo'i sdom dag ni// dgon pos rnam pa bcur gsungs te// srog gcod pa la sogs pa nas// ji srid gser dngul la sogs pa// len pa spong ba'i bar du'o// de bzhin gzhan ni bar slob
308b4(rgyud 'grel): ma'ing 'dul las bcu gnyis nyid yin te// chos dang rjesu mthun pa rnams// thar pa'i lam ni dag phyir gsungs// thub pa thugs rje chen po yis// spang bya thams cad spangs pa ni// dge slong dge slong ma rnams kyi// sdom pa yin par gsungs pa yin//
308b5(rgyud 'grel): thub pa thugs rje chen po yis// glu dang gar sogs phreng ba sogs// gcig byas phyed dang dus min zas// bar gyi spang bya brgyad spangs pa// bsnyen gnas kyi ni sdom par gsungs// sprin la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos// bya ba thabs kyi bdag nyid gnas/
308b6(rgyud 'grel): shes rab pha rol phyin pa ru// bstan pa rgyal ba'i dbang po yis// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// sdom pa nyid du gsungs pa yin// phyag rgya sngags sogs rnal 'byor gyi// rim pa gnyis la brten pa las// rdo rje ye shes lus ngag gi/ lha'i
309a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rab bsgoms pa// thabs dang ldan par sgrub pa ni// byang chub sems dpa'i bslab 'grub pas// so sor thar sdom gyis de 'grub// gsang sngags sbyin sogs dbye ba las// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye ba yis// dge slong la sogs
309a2(rgyud 'grel): dbye bya ste// dge slong srogs sdom dbye ba med// dge slong nyid sdom gcig yin te// de bzhin len dang sgrub pa'ang gcig/ rab byung sdom pa bting nas ni// sngags kyi sdom deng sbyin sogs kyi// sdom pa yang ni gzung mi bya// gsang sngags kyi ni sdom pa dang //
309a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sogs sdom pas bsdams pa dang // rnyed dang bkur sti'i rgyu yis sam// gnas kyi 'tsho ba 'grub don du// rab byung sdom pa len 'dod na// dge slong min pas sdom mi bya// gsang sngags sbyin sogs ldan pa ni// rab byung sdom pa bsgrub pa'o//
309a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa mgon po byams pa yis// 'di ltar mkhyen te gsungs pa ni// rab tu byung ba'i phyogs dag ni// yon tan tshad med rnams dang ldan// de ltar sdom brtsonani khyim po yi// byang chub sems las khyad par 'phags// gseng sogs lam dang
309a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sogs kyi// lam nyid dag ni dge slong gis// dge slong mkhas las blang bya yi// gzhan nyid las ni ma yin no// sngags dang sbyin sogs la gnas pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni// tshul khrims pha rol phyin rnam gsum// dang po sdom
309a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i tshul khrims dang // dge ba chos sdud tshul khrims dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims te// des bsgrub 'di 'grub nges pa yin// rgyal bas 'dul ba'i sde snod las// dge slong sdom gang gsungs de ni// dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yi//
309b1(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims sdom pa'i cha ru 'gyur// dpal ldan de bzhin gshegs pa dang // dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// dbugs dbyung dag la brten nas ni// rdo rje'i lam ni gnyis su gnas// de la bde gshegs dbugs dbyung ba// dge slong rnams la zhi sems kyis
309b2(rgyud 'grel): ma lus spros pa dang bral ba// gsungs pa dbang spyod sogs rim bya// phyi rol shes rab spangs nas ni// rtag tu rab snang shes rab ldan// de la 'dul las gsungs pa yi// sdom pa yi ni byang chub sgrub// rdo rje'i bdag nyid thob pa yi// rdo rje sems dpa'i rol pa
309b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ dge slong bdag nyid gyur pa yi// dpal ldan rnam par snang mdzod sogs// gos dkar sogs dang snyoms 'jig pa// do shel dpung rgyan gdu bu yis// rnam par brgyan cing gos dag ni// shin tu bzang po mnabs pa ru// dpal ldan 'dus sogs
309b4(rgyud 'grel): las byung bas// sems can kun gyi don 'gyur ro// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbugs dbyung ba// rtag tu khyim pa sbyang ba'i phyir// dbang bskur la sogs rim pa ni// spros dang bcas pa de la gsungs// sems sngogs 'os su gyur pa la// phyi rol rig ma'i
309b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bskur bya// spros pa med pas rab byung la// dge slong rnams kyis de sbyin te// 'dul la sogs pa'i sdos pa ni// thams cad ldan pa'o slob m+b+ha la// rtag tu rang sang shes rab kyi// bsgom pa gsal bar bya phyir ro// sbyin sa gas spyod dang sngags sogs spyod/
309b6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gnas pa'i bdag nyid dag/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub sangs rgyas chos// rang dang gzhan la rab bsgrub par// rab tu 'jug pa'i dge slong gi/ dngos gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang // bse ru nyan thos nyid gnas pa'i// zhi ba 'dod pa'i dge slong gros
310a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dul las gsungs pa'i sdom pa yang // phra mo tsam yang gtang mi bya// khyim pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang // gang tshe tshangs spyod nyid bsrung na// rab byung byang chub sems dpa' yis// rang gi tshul khrims ji ltar dor// dpal ldan mgon
310a2(rgyud 'grel): po byams pa yis// rtag tu tshangs par spyod nyid dang // 'tsho ba rnam par dag nyid du// byang chub sems dpa' la gsungs so// dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yis// sbyin sogs bya ba'i lam gyis sam// yang na sngags kyi sdom pa yis// gnas te de nyid sgrub byed//
310a3(rgyud 'grel): bsad/ 'dul las gsungs pa'i sdom pa ni// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung // dpal ldan thub pa'i dbang po ni// thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin des// theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas// zhes bya bar ni gsungs pa yi na/
310a4(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa rnams ni sdom pa yin// gong nas gong du rjes 'jug ste// 'di ltar dge bsnyen sdom pa ni// dge tshul gyi ni rje su 'jug/ gang de dge slong rjesu 'jug/ gang dag nyan thos dge slong gi/ sdom gsungs byang chub sems dpa' yi// rjesu 'jug ste kun ldan pas//
310a5(rgyud 'grel): dge slong shin tu khyad par 'phags// bya ba thabs kyi sbyor ba ni// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ste// sngags pas sbyin la sogs pa ste// thams cad du ni 'jug par bya// gal te sdom pa 'gal gyur na// dge slong gi ni sdom pa rnams// phul bar gyur na dge
310a6(rgyud 'grel): tshul dang du dge bsnyen yang ni mi gnos 'gyur// sems can don la ltos pa yis// so sor thar gsungs sdom gting zhes// gal te de ltar brjod byed ni// de dag nges par rmongs pa yin// blo ldan khyad par 'phags pa yi// dge slong byang chub sems dpa'
310b1(rgyud 'grel): ni thabs la mkhas pas thams cad du// rmi lam du yang 'gal mi bsam// sbyin la sogs pa bya ba 'am// yang na de nyid bsgom pa yin// dge slong sems can bsgrub pa 'am// byang chub sems dpa' snying rje che// gzhan don byed par 'dod rnams kyis// 'dul
310b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i dge slong gi/ bya ba tshul khrims khyad 'phags phyir// tshul khrims lhag par brtan par bya// 'dul ba las brjod tshul khrims ni// dge slong nyid du posgrub bya'i phyir// ji srid 'tsho bar brten bya ba// sems can don yin btang mi bya// sngags
310b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs bsgom la gnas pa dang // sbyin la sogs la gnas pa yi// dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yis// so sor thar gsungs bsgrub pa nI// nam yang btang bar mi bya'o// btang na dmyal sogs 'gro bar 'gyur// de ltar ma gyur rnam nges na// yang dag
310b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir// dge slong sdom pa yang dag pa// so sor thar la gnas par bya// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras la gus pas lung dang rig pa yis// shin tu dri ma med cing mi 'gal sdom rnams byas pa las// bdag gis zla 'od lta bu'i dge ba
310b5(rgyud 'grel): bsags pa gang yin des// 'jig rten ma lus dpal ldan rgyal ba'i dbang po myur grub shog/ tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang dam tshig mi 'grel ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po ye shes dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogaso//
310b6(rgyud 'grel): kha che'i mkhan po dz+nyA na shrI b+hA dra de nyid dang // zhu chen gyi lo tse ba dge slong blo gros snying po dang / dge slong rab zhi bshes gnyen gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
311a1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba bzhugs s+ho// /
311b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sarba sa ma ya saM gra ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ dam tshig thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// oM AHhUM/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum bdag nyid// dpal ldan
311b2(rgyud 'grel): bde chen rdo rje la// btud de gsang sngags theg pa'i gzhung // rgyud las gsungs pa bri bar bya// byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo bstsags pas 'di ltar shes par bya'o// theg pa chen po'i yang chen po 'di 'og ma rnams las khyad par du 'phagres
311b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ ji ltar zhe na 'di skad du 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas thams cad chos kyi skur rtogs pas kun tu bzang po'i rgyas thebs pa dang 'jig rten gyi lha chen po dam tshig can 'khor dang bcas pas bkur gnas byed pas bkur gnas byed pas byin
311b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs dang ldan pa dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pas thugs la dgos shing byin gyis brlabs dngos grub myur ba dang / bde bar gshegs pa rnams dang spyod yul gcig pas 'khor ba dang ngan song gi 'jigs pa
311b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bral zhing dbugs phyin pa dang / rdo rje byang chub kyi sems dang ldan zhing sku dang gsung dang thugs mi phyed pas bar du gcod pa gang yang med pa dang / phyi nang thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par yid ches pas dam tshig nyams par mi
311b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba dang / gal te nyams na yang rang bzhin gyis skongs par 'gyur ba'i khyad par ro zhes gsungs so// yang slob dpon chen po in bo d+hi'i zhal snga nas bla ma'i khyad par dang snod kyi khyad par dang cho ga'i khyad par dang las kyi khyad par dang dam
312a1(rgyud 'grel): tshig gi khyad par dang lta ba'i khyad par dang spyod pa'i khyad par te bdun gyis 'phags so zhes gsungs so// slob dpon chen po ye shes zhabs kyi zhal snga nas sngags kyi theg pa ni rnam pa gsum gyis mthun mong ma yin te/ 'di ltar sgrub pa po
312a2(rgyud 'grel): dang lam dang 'bras bu gsum mo zhes gsungs so// slob dpon tri pid tra ma'i zhal snga nas ni/ don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang // thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang // dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas pas// sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags// zhes gsungs so// /
312a3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon To bi he ru ka'i zhal nas kyang 'dir ni snod kyi khyad par dang snod du byed pa'i chos dang gzhung dang lam gyi khyad par dang 'bras bu dag gi khyad par gyis sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags zhes gsungs pa dang / gzhan yang rdo rje dril bu pa'i zhal nas kyang
312a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags kyi theg pa ni theg pa chen po'i yang chen po yin te/ 'di ltar rten gyi gang thig gi khyad par dang / 'jug pa lam gyi khyad par dang / mthA thug pa 'bras bu'i khyad par dang / mngon par 'byung ba'i khyad par ro zhes gsungs so// slob dpon rat+na A ka ra shIn+d+ra pa'i zhal snga nas 'dir/ dmig
312a5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam par dag pa dang / grogs kyi mthu dang spyod pa yis// blo ldan rnams kyi theg pa 'di// chen po'i chen po nyid du bsgrags zhes gsung so// bdag gi bla ma rje btsun dam tshig rdo rje'i zhal nas ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa las theg pa 'di gong du gyur pa yin/
312a6(rgyud 'grel): te bla ma dang dbang bskur ba dang dam tshig dang man ngag dang brtson 'grus kyis khyad par du 'phags so zhes gsungs so// de la 'dir dam tshig 'ba' zhig brjod par bya ste/ dam tshig ni sngags pa rnams kyi gnad kyi gnas su gyur pa dang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi
312b1(rgyud 'grel): lo tog skye ba'i sa gzhir gyur pa yin pas de bri bar bya'o// dam tshig kyang gang zhe na/ rten dang rgyu dang rtsa ba dang ngo bo dang nges pa'i tshig dang dbye ba dang ming gi rnam grangs dang rkang grangs dang brda dang bdud dang dgra dang nyams pa'i tshad dang skyongs pa dang ma nyams pa'i
312b2(rgyud 'grel): rtags dang bsngo ba grang bya ba dang bskang ba dang bsdus pa'i dam tshig dang nyams pa'i nyes dmigs dang ma nyams pa'i phan yon dang 'bras bu rnamaso// des na rten ni theg pa chen po'i rigs can skyabasu 'gro ba gnyis sngon du song ba bla na med pa byang chub kyi
312b3(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed pa dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing dbang bskur ba thob pa'o// de la rgyu ni byang chub kyi sems so// rtsa ba ni snying rje'o// ngo bo ni ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang / snying rje dang shes rab mtshungs par ldan pa shes rab mtshungs par ldan pa shes
312b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyun no// nges tshig ni rtogs pa'i phyir ram/ mnyam pa nyid du 'gro ba'i phyir ram/ thob cing mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro// de la dbye ba ni rtsa ba dang sbom po yan lag gi sgo nas dbye ba dang bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa'i sgo nas dbye ba dang spyod pa dang lta ba'i
312b5(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas dbye ba dang spyi dang khyad par dang lhag pa'i sgo nas dbye ba dang thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sgo nas dbye ba dang / rags pa dang phra ba'i sgo nas dbye ba dang / bsrung bar bya ba dang nyams su blang ba dang sprad par bya ba dang spyod lam dang thun mong ma yin/
312b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sgo nas dbye ba'o// de la ming gi rnam grangs ni dam tshig dang sdom pa dang brtul zhugs dang spyod yul dang dka' spyad dang spyod pa dang shI la la sogs pa'o// de la rkang grangs ni thun mong gi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i rtsa ba'i
313a1(rgyud 'grel): ltung ba bcu gnyis dang kr-i ya'i rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu gsum dang / spyod pa'i rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang / yang
313a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang yang bzhi dang / rtsa ba'i ltung ba bdun bcu tham pa'o// de la yan lag gi dam tshig rnams ni 'di rnams so zhes bgrang bar mi nus te/ mdo sde dang mngon pa dang 'dul ba dang rgyud sde rnams su blta bar bya'o// de la dam tshig brda ni ji skad du/ mi
313a3(rgyud 'grel): bshig pa ni seng ge ste// gcen zan rgyal po yin paso// za me tog ni rgyal mo mdzod// dug sbyong ba ni der mi rigs// ra ta na myu gu lcug phran dag/ thabs te 'byung rgyun gtsang mi bya// gangs kyi zhu chu phal pa yang // mkhas pas btung bar mo d+ya
313a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i ze 'bru kha ma dbye// bla zer ma yin dbye mi bya// ma brtags bug rdol can snod du// bdud rtsi sman blugs zags par 'gyur// don med bcos pa'i tshul brtags can// bsrel zhing spyad par bya ba min// shel dkar rat+na s+pho nga dang // 2
313a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzab khung du nub mi bya// seng ge dkar mo'i 'o ma dag/ gser snod ma yin brug mi bya// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// bsreg par bya ba yod ma yin// khyung chen gshog pa gar brkyang ba// de dag gcag par bya ba min// gan mi lcags ma'i
313a6(rgyud 'grel): rung mo dag/ brdab par bya ba ma yin no// rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i gzhi// gzhig par bya ba ga la yin// bur shing bsregs pa'i sgron med de// mthor rlung drag pos bskyod mi bya// rdo rje tshig gi chu rgyun dag/ 'ol kar bkag par bya ba min/
313b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal pos bka' rtags phyag rgya dag/ nam yang bshig par mi bya'o// gtsug gi yid bzhin nor bu de// rgyal mtshan rtse las dpog mi bya// zhes gsungs pas/ zla ba'i dam tshig kyang brdar gsungs te/ dpal dgyes pa rdo rje las/ tsa'u sa ma ya/ kA s+yA
313b2(rgyud 'grel): raHsad+d+hi/ kap+pu ra/ pA la zhes pa dang / snyoms 'jug gi dam tshig kyang po la/ kaM ko lA/ kun du ru zhes gsungs so// rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi yang brdar gsungs te/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las/ ri bong can dang mig dang yon tan rig byed dang // mda' dang
313b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang po ri dang bkra shis gza' dang phyogs// drag po nyi ma yan lags rnams yin zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o// de la dam tshig gi bdud ni rnam rtog 'phrig pa'i bdud dang / btang snyoms le lo'i bdud dang longs spyod g.yeng ba'i bdud dang / tshig rtsub mtshon
313b4(rgyud 'grel): cha'i bdud dang khro gtum 'khrug pa'i bdud do// de la dam tshigi dgra ni gsang ba 'phel bas bcos kar song ba'i dgra dang chos log par spyad pas bar chad 'ong ba'i dgra dang rtsa ba byung bas chad pa chen po 'byung ba'i dgra dang / sgrub pa mi brtson pas dge
313b5(rgyud 'grel): ba 'phrog pa'i dgra'o// de la dam tshig gi nyams pa'i tshad ni nyams pa che chung gi tshad dang dus kyi tshad do// de la nyams che chung gi tshad ni kun du nyams pa chen po dang rtsa ba nyams pa dang / yan lag nyams pa dang zlas pa nyams pa dang zhar la nyams
313b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de la dang po bla ma'i dam tshig ni de bsgongs pa dang de la mtshon la sogs pas brgyab pa dang sku la smad pa dang / 'khus pa dang bsnyes pa dang 'khon pa dang bka' bcag pa dang ngan sems dang 'phya ba la sogs pa'o// rdo rje spun pho mo'i dam
314a1(rgyud 'grel): tshig ni de bsad pa dang 'khus pas dang brdegs pa dang nor rdzas dang chud ma la sogs pa phrogs pa dang / lkog kha dang ngor kha dang nan dur dang brnyas pa dang 'tshang 'bru ba dang ngan sems dang khon pa dang brtse gdung med pa la sogs pa'o//
314a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems gtan spangs pa ni kun tu nyes pa chen po'o// de la rtsa ba'i ltung ba bdun cu las bla ma dang rdo rje spun dang byang chub kyi sems ma gtogs pa drug cu rtsa gsum nyams pa dang / gzhan yang rang gis dbang ma thob par gzhan
314a3(rgyud 'grel): la bskur ba dang mi she bar dkyil 'khor 'bri ba dang rab gnas dang sprin sreg dang / tshogs kyi 'khor lor zhugs pa dang / gsang sngags rang shes su bla ma med par spyod pa dang thun mtshams kyi rnal 'byor chag pa dang lha dang bla ma la mchod pa dus su
314a4(rgyud 'grel): chags pa dang mi dge ba bcu dang mtshams med pa lnga dang nye ba'i mtshams med pa lha dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang rang gi gsang ba bzhi po bag med par gzhan la smra ba dang ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pas
314a5(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa ci la yang mi 'dzem pa rnams ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhig ral du 'gyur ro// de la rtsa ba'i yan lag tu gyur pa yan lag gi ltung ba bdun dang bco lnga la sogs pa spyir bzhi par skabs pa ni gsang ba nye bar btang pa bzhi gsang bar 'os pa'o//
314a6(rgyud 'grel): sngasdigs kyi rgyud la sogs pa nas gsungs pa ji snyed pa rnams dang / gzhan yang gzugs sku dang po ti dang rdo rje dril bu dang phur bu 'jims pa dang 'tshong pa dang 'gom pa dang mchog tu yi dam lha'i sku dang / glegs bam dang phyag rgya rnams sbyin pa dang
314b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshong ba la sogs pa rnams ni yan lag gi ltung ba zhig ral du 'gyur ro// de la byang chub kyi sems gtan spangs te rtsa ba mang du byung ba ni kun tu nyon mongs pa chen po'o// de ma shor yang rtsa ba'i nyes pa gcig gam 'ga' byung ba ni rtsa ba nyams pa'o//
314b2(rgyud 'grel): ba ma shor ba yang nyes pa gzhan byung ba ni yan lag nyams pa'o// bla ma ngan pa dang grogs ngan pas nyes pa byung na ni bzlas nyams pa'o// mi shes pa dang ma gus pa dang bag med pa dang nyon mongs che bas nyes pa byung ba ni zhar la nyams pa'o// de
314b3(rgyud 'grel): de la dus kyi nyams pa ni brtson pa rab kyi rab kyis ni nyes pa byung ba'i rjes nyid la ma bskas na nyas so// rab kyi 'bring gis snga dro nyis phyed dang phyed kyi phyed dang rmongs ka dang de bzhin du dus su ma bskangs na nyam so// rab kyi thams ni nyin par nyes pa mtshan mo la mtshan mo'i nyes pa nyin par ma bskaskas na nyam so// bring shi ra
314b4(rgyud 'grel): sha tha dang phreng gi tha ma ni zhag bdun dang dus khyad par can dang zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tshun chad du ma bskangs na nyam so// tha ma' rab dang tha ma'i 'brang dang tha ma'i tha mas ni zla ba gcig dang zla ba bdun dang zla ba bcu gnyis tshun chad du ma bskangs na nyams so//
314b5(rgyud 'grel): shin tu dman pas kyang skye ba 'di la nyams pa lus pa las 'chi kar bskangs na de bskongs pa las de ma bskangs na nyams so// de la dam tshig nyams pa'i rtags ni gdung sha rI ram dang khrel ma khrel dang rmi lam dang bar chad mang nyung las brtag
314b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de la dam tshigo bskang ba ni so so dang thun mong gi'o// de la so so bskang ba ni spyod parlabs po che tsha tsha dang sbyin sreg dang gtor ma dang yan lag bdun pa dang chos spyod bcu dang tshogs kyi tsakra dang nye'u 'don pa dang dge 'dun la chos ston yon dang
315a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa dang grwa chen po'i gzhi gzugs pa dang gzugs khyad par can dang rang gi lha'i snying po bzlas brjod bya ba ni 'bum phrag lnga dang khri phyag gsum dang khri phrag lnga stong phrag gsum dang stong phrag lnga dang brgya phrag gsum dang brgya phrag lnga
315a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcu phrag gsum dang bcu phrag lnga dang nyi shu rtsa gcig ste nyams pa chen po la sogs pa lnga dang rim pa bzhin du sbyor ro// gzhan yang rdo rje slob dpon gyi nyams na slar yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya ba dang / rdo rje spun gyi dam tshig nyams pa ni tshogs/
315a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshim la sogs pa ste/ nyes pa so sor bskang ba'i thabs so sor ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bskang bar bya'o// de la thun mong gi bskyud pa ni bshags pa dang / sbyang ba dang slar blang ba'o// gzhan yang gong du bshad pa'i dge ba'i las kyis bskang
315a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang rdzas kyis bskang ba dang don gyis bskang ba dang ting nge 'dzin gyis bskang ba dang gsang ba'i thabs kyis bskang ba'o// de la dang po gong du bshad do// gnyis pa ni bla ma spyan drangs nas rin po che dang khyad par can phul nas nyes pa bshags/
315a5(rgyud 'grel): te dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas rdzas de dag slar slu ba'i tshul du bla ma las dam tshig slu bar bya'o// gsum pa ni chos thams cad na mkha' ltar rnam par dag pas bsgom pa dang chos zab mo nyan po dang bsam pa dang klag pa dang / kha ton bya ba de la brtag pa dang bri ba dang gzhan
315a6(rgyud 'grel): la sbyin par bya'o// de la bzhi pa ni sdig pa bkru ba dang sdig pa sreg pa dang sdig pa ga tor ba dang dam tshig rdo rje bsgoms nas de'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bskang ba'o// de la lnga pa ni bla ma la rdzas dang rang gi chung ma phul te/ gsang ba'i dbong dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang da /
315b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa'i dbang zhu bar bya'o// gzhan yang yi dam lha'i ting nge 'dzin dang bzlas pas shin tu yang bskongs so// khyad par du rdo rje byang chub kyi sems bsgoms nas bskad du mi gtub pa yang skongs te/ mdzod kyi mdo la sogs pa lta bar bya'o// de la dam tshig rnams
315b2(rgyud 'grel): bsngo bgrang bya ba ni mdor bsdu na dran pa'i tshul gyis bsngo bgrang bya ba dang / kha ton dus gsum du bsngo bgrang bya ba dang / dus drug tu yi dam nar ma'i dus su bskang zhing bsngo bgrang bya ba dang / glegs bam ltas pas bsngo bgrang bya'o// de la dam tshig skongs pa dang /
315b3(rgyud 'grel): ma nyams pa'i rtags sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o// de la dam tshig nyams pa'i nyes demig so ni ji skad du dpal sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud las/ dam tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor du// dbang bskur dngos grub 'thob mi 'gyur// zhes
315b4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pas dang po dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing dbang bskur ba thob nas dam tshig sdom pa mnos nas phyis ma bsrungs na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten la so 'das pa'i dngos grub mi 'byung la/ mi 'dod pa sna tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dam tshig med pa'i
315b5(rgyud 'grel): mi rnams la// sngags dang phyag rgya mi sbyin zhing // de dang 'grogs par mi bya ste// snying rje bskyed la spang bar bya zhes pa dang / dang por bla ma rje btsun las// dam tshig thob nas mi bsrung ba// mkha' 'gro srin pos bsad nas su// ngu 'bod la sogs dmyal bar
315b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro/ shes rab snying rje mi ldan pa// gosang sngags la ni 'jug mi bya// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// rdo rje'i dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur// de bas dam nyams sdig can de'i// nyams pas grib ma 'gro bas na// lhan cig gnas par mi bya zhing // de la
316a1(rgyud 'grel): snying rje bskyed par bya// zhes gsungs pa dang / dpal sangs rgyas thod pa las kyang / re shig dam tshig nyams pa las// dngos grub thob pa lta zhog gi/ mi yi skye ba'ang rnyed par dka'// gang yang bla ma brgyud pa yi// rims 'ongs de nyid man
316a2(rgyud 'grel): dag ni// de yis ji ltar 'grub mnyam dgongs zhes gsungs pa dang / gzhan yang rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams na dper na shing chen po rtsa ba tshig pa 'am skams pa 'am 'bag pa dang 'dra ste/ 'jig rten dang de las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad med par 'gyur
316a3(rgyud 'grel): sbom po'i nyes pa ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du shing chen sdong po dang 'dra ste/ 'jig rten gyi dngos grub chen po brgyad mi 'byung ngo // yan lag gi ltung ba ni shing gi yal ga dang 'dra bar phrin las bzhi'i dngos grub kyi bar du gcod do// gzhan yang 'di la g.yel
316a4(rgyud 'grel): badrang mchod pa dang gtor ma chag na byin brlabs chung ba dang rnal 'byor sngo snyams so// bla ma'i thugs ma zin zhing bka' bcag na bgegs ldang ngo // spyod partsing ba dang bag med na 'byor pa brlag par 'gyur ro// gal te dam tshig ma bsrungs kyang bkra
316a5(rgyud 'grel): shishes pa 'dra na yang 'phral du tshe la gnod pa med kyang de nyid chad pa chen po 'byung ba'i rtags yin te/ dper na rgyal po'i bka' chad byung na de la zan dang tshang mang po blud nas gzi bar byas na phyis gsod do// dam tshig kha cig legs par bsrungs pa las
316a6(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal dang bar chad mang ba ltar 'dug kyang de tshe rabs snga ma'i las kyi lhag ma lus pa yin pas des ni myur du phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa ni tshe 'dir yang bkra mi shis pa mang po 'byung la
316b1(rgyud 'grel): dus ma yin pa brgyad dang / gshis ngan du 'chi ba bcu gnyis kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de nas shi nas kyang rdo rje'i dmyal bar skyes nas de nas thon pa'i dus med do// de la dam tshig ma nyams pa'i phan yon ni tshe ring ba dang longs spyod che ba dang ci bsam pa 'grub pa
316b2(rgyud 'grel): dang mthu dang byin brlabs che ba dang bkra shis par 'gyur ro// bsgom pa dang bzlas pa dang mchod pa la brtson pas rnal 'byor pa sdom skams par longs spyod che ba dang bla ma'i bka' ma bcag cing gus pas bar chad med pa dang rdo rje spun la brtse gdung
316b3(rgyud 'grel): byas pas mi ma yin rnams kyis bkur sti byed do// g.yo sgyu med pas mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags 'chol bar ma spyad pas 'byor pa brtan pa dang bkra shis so// 'chi ba'i dus su yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams
316b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsu nas rigs 'dzin gyi gnas su khrid do// gzhan yang des skye ba 'di dang phyi ma dang skye ba bdun dang skye ba bcu drug tshun chad kyis 'grub pa la the tshom med do// de la dam tshig thams cad bsdu na gnyis te/ snying rje rus pa'i gting nas skye ba dang shes
316b5(rgyud 'grel): rab tshig tsam ma yin pa gting nas go ba'o// 'di gnyis rgyud la brtan na dang po nyid nas nyes pa mi 'byung lo gal te byung na yang myur du bskongs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dam tshig thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems su 'dus te de yang rnam pa
316b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhi 'o/ byang chub kyi sems dang bla na med pa byang chub kyi sems dang kun tu bzang po'i sems dang rdo rje byang chub kyi sems so// de la so so thar pa'i sdom pa ni las dge sdig gtsor ston no// mdo sde'i sdom pa ni snying rje gtsor ston no// gsang sngags
317a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi sdom pa ni sku gsung thugs kyi ma phyed pa gtsor ston no// de de la so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa brtan po las skye'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni lhag pa'i bsam pa bzang po las skye'o// gsang
317a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi sdom pa ni rdo rje byang chub kyi sems las skye'o// de la so so thar pa'i sdom pa ni spong ba bdun no// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni spyong pa bcu'o// sngags kyi sdom pa ni spong ba gcig go// so so thar pa'i gzhung du ni kha na ma tho ba gnyi ga
317a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod do// byang chub sems dpa'i gzhung du ni rang bzhin 'ba' zhig brjod do// sngags kyi gzhung du ni de gnyi ga'i tha snyad ma brjod do// yang so so thar pa'i sdom pa ni rdzas kyi bdag nyid du yod par 'dod do// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni brtag
317a4(rgyud 'grel): pa tsam du yod par 'dod do// sngags su ni de gnyi ga'i tha snyad ma brjod do// yang nyan thos kyi sdom pa la bar chad kyi chos mang du yod do// byang chub sems dpe'i sdom pa la bar chad kyi chos nyung zad gcig go/ sngags kyi sdom pa la ni bar chad kyi
317a5(rgyud 'grel): chos bshad pa med do// yang sdom pa dang po la ni pham pa byung na phyis blang ba'i skal ba med do// bar ma la ni pham pa byung na phyis blang ba'i skal pa yod do// tha me ni rdo rje byang chub kyi sems dang ldan na nyams pa med do// de la sdom pa dang po la
317a6(rgyud 'grel): ni mkhan po dang slob dpon dgos so// bar ma'i sdom pa la ni bla na gcig pu 'am yang na med pa'o// tha ma de la ni bzhi ste/ bla ma'i zhal nas byung ba'i dbang dang / ye shes lha'i byin gyi rlabs kyi dbang dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas lung bstan pa'i
317b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang / rang nyid kyi sems kyi rtsal gyis thob pa'i dbang dang ngo // yang snga ma ni gzhan la gnod pa byed pa las ldog go// bar mya ni de'i steng du gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'o// phyi ma ni de'i steng du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad spyod nyam su len pa'o// yang dang po'i
317b2(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyi rjesu slob pa'o// bar ma'i sdom pa ni sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su slob pa'o// sngags kyi sdom pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjesu slob pa'o// yang dang po'i sdom pa ni bdag 'ba' zhig gi
317b3(rgyud 'grel): don no// bar ma'i sdom pa ni gzhan 'ba' zhig gi dron no// phyi ma'i sdom po nA gnyi ga'i don no// yang dang po'i sdom pa ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas so// bar ma'i sdom pa ni snying po byang chub kyi bar du'o// phyi ma'i sdom pa ni nam mkha' ji
317b4(rgyud 'grel): srid gnas kyi khar du'o// sdom pa dang po'i 'bras bu ni mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis so// bar ma'i 'bras bu ni sa bcu 'am sa bcu gcig pa'o// tha ma'i 'bras bu ni sa bcu gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang bsgom sgrub dang chos spyod yi dam
317b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi lngas ma khrel ba dang / ded pa dang bsnyen bkur bla mas ma khrel ba dang / dam tshig dang sdom pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis ma khrel ba dang / brtse gdung phan gnod rdo rje spun pho mos ma khrel ba dang / bzlas brjod dang gtor ma dang
317b6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga'i nus pa dang byin brlabs mtshan mo rgyu ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs kyis ma khrel ba dang / rdo rje bla ma'i man ngag zab mi zab rang gi slob mas ma khrel ba dang / lta ba zab mi zab mkhas pa rnams kyis ma khrel ba dang ji ltar dam bcas pa'i don
318a1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sems kyis mya khrel ba dang / spyod pa bzang ngan grogs pos ma khrel ba dang / gtong phod dang / gsol gshog dang / ro tshod dang / wI nges dang / mthun 'jug 'jig rten gyi mi rnams kyis ma khrel pa
318a2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor ni// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom// spyod lam rnal 'byor dus su ni// phyi nang thams cad gzhan min te// sems nyid lnga nyid sgyu ma nyid// 'od gsal yin te mnyam nyid ni/
318a3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa gzhi yang de nyid yin/ nyin dang mtshon mo rtog par ni// sems kyi skad cig re re la// de ltar mos pa yang yang bya// rdo rje shugs dang mi ldan yang // snang ba byin gyi sa brlabs pa yin// de lta bu yi sngags pa
318a4(rgyud 'grel): ni dam tshig nyams pa'i dogs pa med// b+haM ga lar skyes dge slong ni// mar me mdzad dpal ye shes kyis// gzhung dang bla ma'i man ngag gis// dam tshig thams cad bsdus nas bris// dam tshig thams cad
318a5(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po dI daM kA ra shI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rje btsun bla ma chen po de nyid kyi zhal snga
318a6(rgyud 'grel): nas dang / lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
319a1(rgyud 'grel): las dang po pa'i dam tshig mdor bsdus pa ye shes byang chub kyis mdzad pa bzhugs so//
319b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ karma pra ma tha sa ma ya sU trA saM grA ha/ bod skad du/ las dang po pa'i dam tshig mdor bsdus pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang sngags kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgor zhugs
319b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i las dang po rnams kyi dam tshig mdor bstan pa/ hUM rdor las byung mthong ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal nas// sngags 'chang rnams kyi bsrung ba'i dam tshig ni// mdor bsdus brtse ba'i yid kyis bshad
319b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ sdug bsngal tshogs kyis bsregs pa'i sems can la// snying rjer ldan pa'i yongs la khyab pa dang // g.yo dang mi g.yo'i chos rnams ma skyes par// rtogs pa'i shes rab snying rje'i gzhir bya'o// rtag tu dang dang brtson 'grus dran pa
319b4(rgyud 'grel): dang shos bzhin ting 'dzin mchog la gnas par bya// dang por sngags pas srog gcod rku ba dang // 'khrig dang rdzun smra chang 'thung la sogs pa'i// tshul khrims sngags kyi rtsa bar sangs rgyas gsungs// de bas srog bzhin
319b5(rgyud 'grel): bslab pa bsrung bar bya// zhes so// yul gangs ri'i rtse na gnas pa'i slob dpon dz+nyA na sa twas mdzad pa'i gsang chen sgron ma'i dam tshig las// nyan thos tshul khrims theg chen sdom pa dang // sa bdag khrims las 'da' bar mi
319b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// zhe'o/ rdo rje rtse ma'i rgyud las/ byang chub sems 'dzin gyur nas ni// lha gzhan dag la mi mos dang // dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang // de la gzhol zhing 'bab pa yis// gsod dang rku dang 'khrig pa dang //
320a1(rgyud 'grel): brdzun dang chang ni rnam par spang // khyim pa'i tshul du gnas nas ni// rig sngags rgyal po bsgrub par bya// / gal te de ni rab byung na// sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya// so so thar dang byang chub sems// rig
320a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin sngags kyi sdom pa'o// zhes 'byung bas sdom pa dang dam tshig mtha' dag la gnas par bya'o// de lta bas na rnal 'byor pas thog mar rig sngags pa rung ba'i dam tshig la gnas par bya'o// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams
320a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// tshul khrims kyi ni sdom pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// de bzhin brtan por bzung bar bgyi// sangs
320a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i// sdom pa deng nas gzung bar bgyi// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yis// slob dpon nyid kyang gzu bar bgyi// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
320a5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen po las// dam tshig yid du 'ong po la// nyin re bzhin du lan drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba'i// pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa las// phyi nang
320a6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen po las// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du gzung por bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems//
320b1(rgyud 'grel): dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung // ma bsgral pa rnams bdag gis bskul// ma grol ba ni bdag gis dgrol// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing // mya ngan 'das la sems
320b2(rgyud 'grel): can dgod// dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni// ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar// bdag ni rab tu gnas par bgyi// lus dang ngag dang yid dag gi/ mi dge ba ni rnam bcu dang // bag med pa yi gnas byung ba// 'bru chang bcos pa'i chang dag dang // theg pa dman la
320b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa dang // de bzhin lha dang lha min dang // gsang ba pa rnams brnyas pa dang // phyag rgya mtshan ma gzhom pa dang // mtshon cha la sogs 'gom pa rnams// dus 'di nyid nas gzung nas ni// ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar// bdag ni rab tu ldog par
320b4(rgyud 'grel): bgyi'o// zhe'o// gal te rig sngags gzung ba nyid du nges pas ni/ sdom pa dang dam tshig tshul bzhin du ma bsrungs na/ 'phags pa rnams bslus pa/ bdag nyid la 'khu bar byed pa/ dngos grub chen po la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ de ni g.yon can shing
320b5(rgyud 'grel): rul pa lta bu yin no// dam tshig la mi gnas par gsang sngags tshig tsam gyis/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don du las sna tshogs byed pa'o// dper na mdze can nang na 'bus rnyings pa la phyi rol gyi gos dang rgyan gyis bkab pa lta bu yin no// des ni bdag
320b6(rgyud 'grel): gi don yang bya bar mi nus na gzhan gyi don lta ci smos/ de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis smod cing bshud pa yin no// gsang sngags kyi dngos grub sgrub pa dang gzhan gyis don du dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las byed pa ni/ dus yun ring por
321a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi sems kyi rgyud sbyangs pa dang / sdom pa dang dam tshig la sngags spyod pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas/ dben par tshul bzhin du las byas na dngos grub tu yang 'gyur la gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa yang 'grub bo// dam tshig
321a2(rgyud 'grel): spangs te gzu lum su gsang sngags dgongs pas bshad pa'i don/ sgra ji bzhin du bzung nas snod min pa'i slob ma dang / grong la sogs par log par spyad na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' rgyud khyad du bsad pas slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub dang / in+d+ra
321a3(rgyud 'grel): bo d+hi la sogs pa'i zhal snga nas kyi tshig gi bdud rtsi spangs pa yin pas bdag legs su 'dod pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyi zas dug dang bcas pa bzhin du spang bar bya'o// de bas na dngos grub kyi snod du rung ba'i sgrub pa pos/ dang por dam tshig mnos pa nyid nas
321a4(rgyud 'grel): zung nas byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du mi nyams par bya'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang thob pas ni dam tshig gnyis bsrung ste/ bza' ba'i dam tshig dang / bsrung ba'i dam tshig go// de la bza' ba'i dam tshig ni/ ga bur mtshal dang bi pi ling // tsan dan
321a5(rgyud 'grel): dmar dang gur gum sogs// man ngag bzhin du sgrub pa pos// rtag tu bsten cing bza' bar bgyi// bsrung ba dag gi dam tshig ni// rang lus phyag rgya nyid bsgoms la// ma lus 'gro ba'i tshogs bsam bya// rdo rje slob dpon rdo rje rnams// rdo rje
321a6(rgyud 'grel): de ni spyan rnams la// gtso dang sems dpa' bskyed par bya// 'di ni sku yi dam tshig ste// tshul khrims bsrung la brtson par bya// sred 'byung dag gi skyon spangs te// rigs sngags lha yi snying po dang // rdo rje phra sogs rtse gcig pas// rgyun mi 'chadang
321b1(rgyud 'grel): par bzlas par bya// de ni gsung gi dam tshig de// rtag tu 'di las 'da' mi bya// rgyun du ting 'dzin gnyis po dang // spyod bzhin dran pas zin par bya// thun mong ma yin gsang chen dang // man ngag gzhan du mi spel lo// lha dang spyod dang lha dag dang //
321b2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon mchog gnyis gsang ba ste// 'di dag gsang chen gzhan du min// 'di dag thugs kyi dam tshig go// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba 'di// srog gi phyir yang mi gtong ngo // rgyal bas dgongs te gsungs pa yi// dam tshig bzhi la
321b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas par bya// ji bzhin don ldan bcu bzhi ni// phas pham par ni rab tu bsgrags// spang zhing 'dor bar mi bya ste// rtsa ba'i ltung bar shes par bya// slob dpon la ni brnyas pa dang // bder gshegs bka' las 'das pa dang // snang bas spun
321b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi bsngags min smra// byams pa chen po rnam spong dang // byang chub sems ni 'dor ba dang // theg pa gsum la smod pa dang // skal min gsang ba sgrogs pa dang // rgyal ba'i bdag nyid phung po smod// dam pa'i chos la yid gnyis za// gdus
321b5(rgyud 'grel): la bya mes dang chags bral dang // chos la gnyis su 'byed pa dang // dad pa'i sems la rab tu smod// dam tshig bsten pa ji snyed pa// brtags pa'i rig ma smod pa ste// rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ba des// sngags pa'i dam tshig zad par 'gyur/
321b6(rgyud 'grel): nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// nyin re bzhin ni bzla bar bya// gal te nyams gyur rnal 'byor pa// kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur// dam tshig dang ni mi ldan pa'i// rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang // tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod pa dang //
322a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i chos ni ston pa dang // sems can dad dang ldan pa la// dam chos gzhan du ston pa dang // nyan thos dag tu rlom byed pa'i// nang du zhag bdun 'jug pa dang // sbyor ba nges par ma byas pa'i// snod min gsang ba ston
322a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams// kha na ma thobacas 'gyur te// sngags pa de yi dam tshig zang // zad pas 'grub par mi 'gyur zhing // bdud dang sdug bsngal rab tu 'phel zhe'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang thob pas kyang dam tshig rnams/ dang po thib pa nyid nas byang
322a3(rgyud 'grel): chub chen po'i bar du yang dag par gzung ngo // gal te nyams par byas na don dam par bsrung du med pa dang / dgongs pa'i don gyi tshig gi gzugs brnyan la brten nas/ dam tshig mi srung bar gzu lums su dkyil 'khor la sogs pa
322a4(rgyud 'grel): byed pa ni 'phags pa dang 'gro ba kun bslus pa ste/ yon tan de gsang sngags sid+d+ho 'o ma lta bu spyi bo snod dang mi ldan pa'i mi la bstan pa dang / dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las byas pas sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba'i
322a5(rgyud 'grel): skye ba dang / bdag dang gzhan rlag par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ de nam du yang dngos grub kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba yin no// de lta bas na dam tshig rnams lus dang srog la ltos pa med par
322a6(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar bya'o// dam tshig nyams pa gso ba ni gnang ste/ thun mtshams sbyor ba las gyur na// bde gshegs las rigs bsam gtan gyimi// de yi nyes pa bsal bar bya// gser sbyangs dri med lta bur 'gyur// sbyor ba'i yan lag
322b1(rgyud 'grel): sbosgom nyams na// mchod pa la sogs tshul bzhin bya// 'phags la bzod gsol dam bcas na// phyin chad bsdams te gus par blang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid las// dang por rigs bdag dkyil 'khor du//
322b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzhin yang dag blang bar byas de ltar ma bshags par blangs pas nyams pa khyad du gsod cing de'i nyes pa 'phel ba dang bcas par gyur na skyon che ste/ gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas rdo rje sems
322b3(rgyud 'grel): dga' dang // de bzhin chos kyi sems dpa' dang // rmongs pa 'gal bar byas na ni// tshal bar 'gas par gdon mi za zhe'o// de lta bas na sangs rgyas dbu 'gas na mi rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ dam tshig nyams pas ni bdag nyid dang / gzhan
322b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su yang nyes pa sna tshogs su 'byung la/ phyi mar yang bskal pa gsum la sogs par ngan 'gror 'gro'o// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi rgyud chen po las/ dam tshig med cing dun spyod pa// bslus 'gyur ngan pa'i mtshan nyid de/
322b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma yis zos nas kyang // de las da ni skyob mi byed// gsang ba pa'i nang nas ni// sgrub pa po de phyugs dang 'dra zhe'o// bla ma lnga bcu pa las kyang // slob da pon la ni smod pa de// yams dang 'tshe bo'i nang rnams dang // gdon dang rims dang
322b6(rgyud 'grel): drug rnams kyis// rmongs chen de ni 'chi bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po me dang sbrul gdug dang // chu dang mkha' 'gro rkun po dang // gdon dang log 'dren rnams kyis kyang // bsad nas sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ nam yang slob dpon dag gi ni//
323a1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu sems dkrugs mi bya ste// gal te rmongs pas byed 'gyur na// dmyal bar nges par 'tshed par nges// mnar med la sogs 'jigs rung ba'i// dmyal ba bstan pa gang yin pa// slob dpon la ni smod pa dag/ der ni gnas par yang
323a2(rgyud 'grel): dag bshad// zla gsang thig le'i rgyud las kyang // dam tshig sdom pa nyams pa las// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// byin gyis brlabs par mi mdzad de// spos dang me tog la sogs pa// phul yang bzhes par mi 'gyur te//
323a3(rgyud 'grel): nangad dang dug dang dgra rnams kyis// bsad nas sems can dmyal bar 'gro zhe'o// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog las kyang // dam tshig 'di las 'das gyur na// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad
323a4(rgyud 'grel): dngadang du byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// lha rnams dang ni mi ngag dang // sgrub pa po dang rnal 'byor bcas// de dag las ni snying ring nas// snying nas khrag chen drangs nas 'thung zhe'o// yang de nyid las/ dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang /
323a5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig rnam par spangs pa dang // gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas// bskyod kyang ci yang mi 'grub po zhe'o// phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud las/ dam tshig 'di las su 'da' dang // sdang sems ldan pa de dag ni// mgo
323a6(rgyud 'grel): ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje rnams kyis rtag tu 'gems zhe'o// yang mtshoms med lnga byas pa'i sdig pa ne bu'i/ gseng sngags log por spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no// gzhan las ni/ dam tshig 'di las su 'da' le// bskal pa grangs
323b1(rgyud 'grel): med gsum du ni// mnar med shin tu mi bzang sogs// bcu drug dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur zhe'o// ye shes grub pa las babs ni/ dam tshig nyams la sdug bsngal zhing // lus dang de bzhin yid dang ni// de'i yon tan nyams 'gyur zhing // myur ba nyid du 'chi bar
323b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ shi nas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal ni// bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag tA// myong nas gnas las 'pho 'gyur bas// gdol pa 'am dman pa'i rigs su skye// lkugs par skye 'am yang na 'on par skye zhe'o// de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyu las// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal
323b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i chung dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed ce'o// dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud las kyang // drag po'i dam tshig mdung rtse dngam mo rnams kyis rgyas 'debs pas// gal te 'ongs na khyod kyi snying // rtog tu 'jigs par byed par 'gyur zhe'o// gal te dam tshig
323b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di las 'das gyur na// pha gsod 'gro ba yin pa dang // ma gsod pa yi 'gro ba gang // 'gro ba der ni 'gro bar 'gyur// zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas/ dam tshig nyams na skyon che bas na lus dang srog gi phyir yang mi btang bar bsrung bar bya'o//
323b5(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa dang dam tshig tshul bzhin du bsrung ba yang don che ste// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud las kyang // 'gro ba'i don dang de don du// dam tshig sdom pa bsrung byas nas// bsod nams gtsang sbra las byung sa/ bsgrub pa'i yon tan rgya chen po//
323b6(rgyud 'grel): stong phrag brgya yi kha min par// kha cig gis kyang brjod par mi nus she'o// gnan las ni// dam tshig sdom pa 'di rnams kun// tshul bzhin bsrung dang sgrub pa yis// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes gyur nas// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhe'o//
324a1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin zhe'o// phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud las kyang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcas pa yis// brtul zhugs dang ni tshul khrims dang // spyod pa
324a2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa'i gzhi rnams la// gal te gnas na de yi tshe// sngags pas 'di ltar sngags bsgrub pa zhe'o// slob dpon rdo rje gzhad pa'i sgrub thabs las// sngags pas rnam pa 'di dag gis// dam tshig sdom pa bsrung byas na// tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub kyis
324a3(rgyud 'grel): rdorje gsung nyid thob par 'gyur zhe'o// gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang / gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi bskal par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing btsal yang byang chub sems dpar mi 'gyur te/ gsang ba 'dus pa
324a4(rgyud 'grel): la dga' zhing de'i dam tshig la gnas shing bsgrubs na tshe 'di nyid la mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// rnam par snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las// dbang po gnyis ni nyam sbyor te// lus dang ngag dang sems bsdus nas//
324a5(rgyud 'grel): nga yi snyam pa'i gzi bskyed gzugs// rnam pa kun gyis rnam brgyan na// rnal 'byor ldan po che de la// ye shes rdzogs pa nyid du 'gyur zhe'o// gzhung gzhan las thabs kyi dam tshig thams cad la spyod cing mi nyams par bsrungs la/ shes rab
324a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsrung du med par shes pa ni rnal 'byor pa mchog ces bya'o// gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ rnam par mi rtog las byung ba'i// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rig so// theg pa mchog 'di bla med pa// mchog tu blang
324b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur sgrub par byed// rigs da rme sha can la sogs// gsod padon du gnyer ba rnams// theg pa bla na med pa yi// theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur// mtshams med pa la sogs pa yis// sems can dag gis bsgrubs na 'grub// srog gcod pa'i sems
324b2(rgyud 'grel): can rnams// brdzun du smra bar dad pa dang // gzhan gyi nor la chags pa dang // rtag tu 'dod la spyod pa dag/ de dag bsgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur zhe'o// ye shes grub pa las/ de ltar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa// yar ngo'i zla ba ji bzhin du// rims kyis yang
324b3(rgyud 'grel): dag 'phel 'gyur gyis// nam yang 'grib par mi 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus dman pa la la zhig/ sangs rgyas thob par ma gyur kyang // 'khor los sgyur rgyal bde ba ni// skye ba kun tu thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bsod nams ni// phyogs su
324b4(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum yod pa rnams// de yi ba spu'i khung bu zhes// rgyal ba mchog gi rab tu gsungs// zhe'o// le'u brgyad pa las/ sems can kun gyi gnyid gcig pas// rnam pa slu ba med pa'i sems// de bas brtan pa bskyed par bya// 'di byas pa yis
324b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sangs rgyas// dgyes pa'i bdag nyid can kun mnyes// bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa yang // glags skabs tshol bar mi byed cing // phyug na rdo rje la sogs pa// dgyes pas rtag tu bsrung bar mdzad ce'o// gzhan las ni// stong chen po'i
324b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste 'phags pa rnams la phul ba bas/ gang gis dam tshig la yang dag par gnas te 'du 'dzi spangs te dgon pa la gnas nas/ skad cig tsam ting nge 'dzin gnyis kyi mnyam par gzhag na de
325a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis las mnyam par gzhag pa de bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtshan gyis brgyan pa ni gling bzhi la dbang ba'i mthu yod cing chos kyi 'khor lor sgyu
325a2(rgyud 'grel): to de bzhin du rgyal ba'i sras dam tshig dang sdom pa la yang dag par gnas pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa ni ring por mi thog par skye ba bdun la sogs pas 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad byed pa yin no// yang yid bzhin gyi
325a3(rgyud 'grel): nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po ni su'i spyi gtsug na yod pa la 'gro ba gang gis kyang bar mi chad do// de bzhin du sngags pa gang zhig sdom pa dang dam tshig gis nor bus sgo gsum brgyan pa la bdud la sogs pa gang gis kyang bar du mi chod do// yang
325a4(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu mig dang rkang par ldan pa ni gang 'gro ba'i gnas su phyin cing dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed do// mnyam pa'i dam tshig mig dang 'dra ba dang spyod pa'i dam tshig rkang pa dang 'dra ba la brten te ye shes kyi lam srang du zhugs pas thams cad
325a5(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa'i nor bu blangs te/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don lhun gyis 'grub par byed par 'gyur ro// yang dper na ri'i rgyal po gangs la sman 'bral bar dka'o ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de gang gis rnyed pa de ni dug dang nad la sogs pa rtsa ba nas 'byin cing tshe
325a6(rgyud 'grel): ring ba yang 'grub bo// de bzhin du rdo rje slob dpon gyi thugs nor bu rin po che'i nor bu blangs te/ las dang skal ba dang ldan pa gang zhig dam tshig rnams kyi sman thob pos 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i bag chags dang nyon mongs pa'i nang
325b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad zhi zhing byang la bla na med pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar du mi 'chi ba'i tshe yang 'thob bo// dper na ded dpon bsod nams kyi gzi brjid dang thabs dang ldan pas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs te/ rin po che'i gling du phyin te nor bu rin po che blangs nas bdag
325b2(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhan la phan 'dogs so// de bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'gro ba 'khor ba las 'don pa'i ded dpon la brten te/ tshul khrims dang dam tshig tu sbyar nas thabs la mkhas pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi skyab bskyod nas/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho
325b3(rgyud 'grel): las bsgral te/ dngos grub rnam pa gsum gyi nor bu blangs te/ bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs so// de lta bas rnal 'byor pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dag gis dam tshig dang sdom pa mtha' dag tshul bzhin bsrung ste/
325b4(rgyud 'grel): lang rgyud dang sgrub thabs dang mthun par dgongs pa'i gnasu/ nam lhun gyis grub pa'i bar du/ rdo shing ngam ri dgras shi ba'i ro bzhin du gnas te bsgrub par bya'o// bdag nyid dran gso rnal 'byor pa la phan gdags phyir// rgyud dang sgrub thabs
325b5(rgyud 'grel): dag las dam tshig mdor bsdus pas// 'phags dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la gnod ste bzod par gsol// des ni 'jig rten gsum bcas rdo rje 'dzin thob shog/ dbang pos mtshan ma'i yul gyis rtsa na gnas pa'i slob dpon dz+nyA na bo d+his
325b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ las dang po pa'i dam tshig mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu b+ha dang / lo tsa ba bsod nams rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// #// rgya gar skad du/ tri sam+ba ra pra b+hU mA lA nA mA
326a1(rgyud 'grel): d+yo skang du// snam gsus yang kyi byung ba zhes b+hag bla ma dang 'dam pa'i spya stsal phyag 'tshal lo// rnam dag zab yangs shes byan rgya mtshalas// bskrun pa'i sku dang bdag blo'i dang dpon gyis// mkhyen pa'i dang 'byar brtsa bar
326a2(rgyud 'grel): rlung bskyod nas// sdom gsum yid bzhin nor bu kho bos blang // deng sang bstan pa'i gsha mo 'di ru// sdom pa gsum gyi rnam gzhag la// mkhas pa'i rgyu skar 'ga' zhig gis// phyogs re'i tshwa tsam rtogs 'gyur mod// so sor thar dang byang chub
326a3(rgyud 'grel): sems/ rig 'dzin sngags kyi sdom pa la// 'thob tshul gnas tshul gtong ba'i tshul// gnyis ldan gsum ldan 'byung pa'i gzhung // nyes pa phan yon rim pa dag/ bdag blo nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis// phyogs las rgyal bar byas
326a4(rgyud 'grel): dgod// gling gsum skyes pa bud med kyis// rang nyid 'khor ba bsgral don du// mkhan slob cho ga tshad ldan las// ji srid 'tsho yi bar dag tu// gnod pa gzhi dang bcas pa las// gtso cher lus ngag sdom pa de// nyan thos bye brag smra
326a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sdom/ gang zag glang bu 'dra ba la// sdom pa khal dang 'dra ba zhig/ thob pa'i thag pas sbrel bar gnas// so sor thar pa'i gnas tshul yin// bslab pa phul dang shi 'phros dang // mtshan nyid dag ni byung ba dang // rtsa ba chad
326a6(rgyud 'grel): dadang mtshan 'das las// so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba gtong // gsungs so pham pa spyad pas kyang // so sor thar pa'i tshul yin no// lha mi la sogs gang rung gis// 'gro ba ma lus skyob pa'i phyir// slob dpon cho ga tshad ldan las// ji
326b1(rgyud 'grel): srid byang chub snying po'i bar// smon dang 'jug pa'i bdag nyid can// lus ngag yid gsum rang don dang // gzhan don thabs ma yin las sdom// kun rdzob byang chub sems kyi'o// de nyid snang la rang bzhin med// 'jig sogs bzhin du goms pa las// yul
326b2(rgyud 'grel): dang yul can gnyis las grol// don dam byang chub sems yin no// sems dang sems byung sems bskyed gnyis// rang don gza' dang bral bas na// nyi ma dang ni 'od zer bzhin// de dag gnas pa'i tshul yin no// rang don blangs dang nag po yi// chos bzhi
326b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs zhugs pa dang // 'bras bu dag ni thob pa na// tsha grang gru bzhin sems bskyed gtong // rigs bzhi la sogs bsod nams ldan// rang gzhan dgos 'dod phun tshogs don// bla mcho ga tshad ldan las// nam mkha' ji srid gnas bar du// lhan
326b4(rgyud 'grel): skyes ye shes brda don spyod// rnam rtog dri ma kun las sdom// rig 'dzin sngags kyi sdom pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyal mtshan la// rim gnyis yid bzhin nor gyis smras// 'dod yon lnga yis kun nas mchod// dgos 'dod kun gyi 'byung
326b5(rgyud 'grel): gonas dang rig 'dzin sdom pa'i gnas tshul yin// dgos 'dod med do skyon rnams 'byung // dpag bsam shing bu 'gyel pa ltar// rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung ba na// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sdom pa gtong // rgyud ni sum brgya pa las ni// 'khor bzhi po la rjes su
326b6(rgyud 'grel): gnang rang rang gi bslab pa dang yang ldan// dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa bya// gsungs so dus kyi 'khor lo las// rten ni gsum las dge slong mchog/ 'bring ni dge tshul yin par 'dod// gzhan yang rdo rje rtse mo las// gal te de ni rab byung na// sdom pa
327a1(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa gsum dang yang dag ldan// so so thar dang byang chub sems// rig 'dzin sngags kyi sdom pa'o// gzhung 'bum pa las 'di skad du// rdo yi rigs kyi bye brag ba nu// lcags dang zangs dang dngul du 'byung // gser 'gyur rtsi yi dngos po
327a2(rgyud 'grel): yis// kun kyang gser du 'gyur ba bzhini// rigs can gsum gyi sdom pa yang // dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs na// rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya'o// gsungs pa'i don la 'ga' zhig ni// sdom gsum gnas gyur ngo bo gcig/ gong ma'i rtsa ltung
327a3(rgyud 'grel): byung ba na// 'og ma gtong zhes sgrogs pa yod// de la cung zhig brtag par bya// gsum ldan gsungs pa'i dgongs pa'i don// gcig ldan spong ba'i dgongs pa min// rigs pas kyang ni shin tu gnod// bud med la smod ltung ba yis// reg srung sdom pa
327a4(rgyud 'grel): pa gtong ngam ci// gal te gtong na ha cang thal// mkha' la sprin chen 'khrig po yis// sa yi lo tog skam zhes bsgre// gzhan yang sdom pa gtong thob rgyu// sangs rgyas gsung las gzhan pa yi// cho ga mkhan du byed rigs sam// gzhan yang 'gal
327a5(rgyud 'grel): bltag spong la// gnas gyur rtsi ba rigs ma yin// rigs ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di// gang+gA'i chu las gyur zhes paste// d+hen+ya rang gis brtags la blang // sdom gsum ldan zhes gsungs pa de// shes rgyar gcig la N+Di na ni// gcig tu 'dod
327a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang gsum du 'gyur// ldan chos rdzas gzhan tha dad phyir// 'on te snga phyi la rtsin// gsum ldan zhes pa'i sgra don mong // 'on te sdom gsum rdzas gcig tu// shos skyed gcig la ldan zhe na// gtong thob cho ga gcig tu 'gyuraro// des na rtse
327b1(rgyud 'grel): sor thar ldan pas// byang chub mchog gi sems blangs na// dang po de ni kun gzhi la// bag la nyal ba'i tshul du gnas// rig 'dzin sdom pa thob pa na// 'og ma gnyis ka bag la nyal// dper na mkha' la skar ma shar// cung zad snang bar byas gyur
327b2(rgyud 'grel): mo dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar bya'i tshe// skar 'od nyams mod 'jig rten gsal// rta bdun tsha zer byung ba na// zla ba'i 'od nyams 'jig rten gsal// gal te rig pa 'dzin pa yis// gdul bya gang la gang don du// 'og ma'i sdom pa blangs
327b3(rgyud 'grel): pa na// gong ma zil gyis mi non mong // sdom pa cho gas 'thob pa yin// mkha' la nyi ma gnas gyur med// rgyu skar 'char ba bkag pa med// des thob tshul dang gtong ba'i tshul// rang rang cho ga bzhin du gnas// kun gzhi bag chags mang po can
327b4(rgyud 'grel): yin yang shes rgyud tha dad med// 'og ma'i ltung ba byung gyur mod// gong ma ji srid gnas kyi bar// rnam par smin pas gos pa med// dper na zla sker nub gyur mong // nyi ma mkha' la gnas kyi bar// cung zad 'grib par byas pa med// gong mi
327b5(rgyud 'grel): ltung ba byung ba na// 'og ma ji ltar gnas gyur kyang // cung zad phan gyi skyob mi nus// rtswa bdun tsha zer byung ba na// zla skar gnas kyang mun pa'i bag/ gser 'gyur rtsi zhes gsungs pa'i don// zil gnon yon tan mchog la dgongs// zla skar gnyis
327b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'od zer yang // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas kyi bar// nyi ma'i 'od ces kun gyis sgrogs// gzhan yang kha cig sdom pa gsum// sa chu gru 'dra gzhi rten du// 'dod ces sgrogs pa 'khrul pa yin// de yi 'khrul gzhi kho bos bstan// mkhas
328a1(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po rta dbyangs dang // slob dpon sgeg pa rdo rje sogs// sdom gsum de nyid rig pa yis// don de ldog pa du mas phye// khyab bya khyab byed gsungs pa la// rten dang brten par byed na 'khrul// byang sems sdom pa'i don gcig la// phan spyad
328a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i ldog pa dang // gnod spong dgag pa gnyis 'dug mod// phan sgrub ngo bo gang yin la// gnod pa spong ba khyab pas na// khyad bya khyab byed rdzas gcig tu// ba lang rdzis kyang mi go 'am// des na rig 'dzin gcig pu la// gsum ldan sbyor ba 'thad
328a3(rgyud 'grel): mo yin de gal te 'thad na 'og ma gnyis// cho ga mi dgos skye bar 'gyur// sdom gsum cho ga thun mong du// thub pa chen pos gsungs pa med// phrag dog nor 'dod gti mug can// rang gzo byed pa su yis khegs// mdo rgyud spangs kyang phyogs
328a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phen// sgra tshad byung na gtam gzhan sbyar// bstan pa'i byi dor ji ltar bya// rig 'dzin sdom pa kho na bas// gsum ldan bsngags pa'i dgongs pa ni// 'bras bu'i sgo nas ma yin te// yin na kun mkhyen mchog dman 'gyur// des na lam dus
328a5(rgyud 'grel): gdul byi'i don// gcig dang gsum gyi khyad par dang // sdom pa rdzas chos gzhan nyams mod// gzhan yod pa yi khyad par yin// sdom gsum gang yang mi ldan na// lha mi'i lus kyang rnyed par dka'// nyams na mthong chos rnam smin gyi/
328a6(rgyud 'grel): rim pa gnyis kyis bstan par bya// de las so thar nyams gyur na// rang gis rang bslus gnod pa nyung // rgyal dang de sras thams cad kyis// cung zad khrel gyi shin tu min// pham pa lci yang bye brag gis// lo grangs ngan song gsum du gan
328b1(rgyud 'grel): byang sems nyams na 'gro ba kun// bslus pas gnod pa shin tu mang // rgyal dang de sras thams cad dang // 'gro ba kun gyis shin tu khrel// pham pa lci yang bye brag gis// bskal pa'i grangs kyis dmyal bar gnas// rig 'dzin sdom pa nyams
328b2(rgyud 'grel): pas ni dang yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs can// rgyal dang de sras kun brnyas pas mi 'jig mnar med gnas dag tu// sdug bsngal chen po de yis myong // rtsa ba kun nyams phyal pa dag/ gsol nye bar mi brtson na// rdo rje dmyal bar de ltung ste// dmyal ba phan
328b3(rgyud 'grel): papa thams cad kyis// sdug bsngal gcig tu bsdoms pa bas// de yi 'bum gyi char mi phod// 'jig rten 'jig ni gzhan du 'pho// se gol gcig gis phyin par byed// sangs rgyas stong gis 'od zer dang // byang chub sems dpa'i phrin las kun// /
328b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyun du mdzad kyang phan mi 'gyur// bskal pa ther 'bum la sogs su// de ni thon par ma gsungs so// so sor thar pa'i phan yon ni// gnas skabs lho mi mtha thug ni// dgra bcom 'bras bu nges par 'thob// byang chub sems kyi phan yon ni// gan+da
328b5(rgyud 'grel): skabs bde mang ring mo na// sangs rgyas nyid du nges par 'grub// rgyas par mdo sde blta bar byos// rig 'dzin sdom pa'i phan yon ni// gnas skabs kun mkhyen bde longs spyod// gal te bsgom pa dang bcas na// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'gyur// ma
328b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms gyur kyang ltung med na// skyo ba bcu drug nyid na'o// mkhyen brtse dung phyur ldan pa yi// paN chen blo yi rgya mtsho las// sdom gsum nor bu'i phreng ba blangs// bdag gzhan 'gro ba ma lus kyi// blo gros gtsug lag legs gnas te// kun mkhyen
329a1(rgyud 'grel): dgos 'dod spyod par shog/ rgya gAng shar phyogs dzA ga ta la'i baN+Di ta chen po bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ras mdzad de rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+rA yA na mA lA pat+ti karma/
329a2(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+haM/ bod skad du/ rdo rje theg pa rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i las kyi cho ga/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje theg pa'i sgor zhugs pa'i// rab 'byor pa yis dpyang bya ba// las kyi cho ga 'di ltar
329a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzod/ spyi bo nyi zla pad stengs su// bla ma sangs rgyas bsam byas te// rtag tu dran dang gsol gdab bya// srog gcod brdzun dang ma byin len// 'dod pas log par g.yem pa ni// nI la bab kyang bsrung bar bya// byams
329a4(rgyud 'grel): dang snying rje dgo' ba ni// lus grib bzhin du 'bral mi bya// bum pa'i dbang thob gyur nas ni// lha dang bzlas pa rnal 'byor dang // phyag 'tshal mchod dang sdig bshags dang / rjes su yi rang skor dang ga sol// dge bsngo
329a5(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa byul ba dang // sbyin pa bla ma dran dang chos// dam tshig rnam pa bco lnga 'di // nyin rI thebs re ma byas na// zhag gsum 'das na bum dbang gi/ dam tshig nyams pas bshags par bya// de yang brgya pa brgya
329a6(rgyud 'grel): rtse brgyad// bzlas te phyis ni mi nyams bya// gsang ba'i dbang thob rnal 'byor pas// mi 'chi lnga dang sgron ma lnga// rlung dang lta stangs 'khrul 'khor dang // tshogs dang gtor ma brtul zhugs dang // glu dang gar
329b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ni ram shu// dam tshig rnam pa bcu gcig po// zla ba phyed du bral gyur na// gsang ba'i dam tshig nyams par gsungs// nyams na tshogs 'khor sbyin sreg bya// gsum pa'i dbang thob rnal 'byor pas// bde ba thig le rtsa gnas dang //
329b2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'dzag bde ba skad cig dang // phyag rgya ma dang sbyor ba dang // zla ba gcig bral nyams par gsungs// dbang dang sbyin sreg bshegs pa bya// ba zhi ba'i dbang thob rnal 'byor pa// spang blang rtsol dang dngos dang zhe na// skad cig
329b3(rgyud 'grel): skyes kyang nyams pas na// mi dmigs bde chen spros bral gzhag/ dbang bzhi spyi yi dam tshig ni// rgya mtsho'i dadakyil du gzings mi bshig/ btsan dug gar ma bza' mi bya// 'thab khang rtse nas dbab mi bya// za ma tog tu sprul
329b4(rgyud 'grel): mi gzhug/ pad+ma sad kyis bsad mi bya// g.yos legs gzhan la drang mi bya// de drug rdo rje dmyal ba'i rgyu// rgyal khrims bshig par mi bya zhing // chung ma nyams par mi bya'o// pham btsongs nas rin mi bza'// me mngag
329b5(rgyud 'grel): bgam par mi bya'o// 'di bzhi dran song gsum gyi rgyu// spu gri'i sbrang rtsi bldog mi bya// ga yos 'gyong bza' ru byog mi bya// sman zos mi gseb skyug mi bya// ri rab rtse nas bsnyil mi bya// gnyen la snying rings mi bya'o//
329b6(rgyud 'grel): de lnga sems can dmyal ba'i rgyu/ ma bu 'bral po'i las mi bya/ gdung sems thag pa rgyun mi gtsang // chu bya bden par gsung mo bya// sprang rtsi'i ro la chags mi bya// 'di bzhi khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu// rug chu khol
330a1(rgyud 'grel): mar lus mi bkru// rtsi dug sbyar ba'i drug mi bldag/ rnga snod seng ge'i zho mi bzho// chang rnga'i them bu gtang mi bya// de bzhi byol song phag gi rgyu// 'dir yang tshe thung dngos grub 'gyang // mthon po'i kha nas ljang ma
330a2(rgyud 'grel): bya// chag sa mi gseb bcag mi bya// ga zha gzhan la brjod mi bya// lam du tsher ma 'gram mi bya// 'di ni rang ngan sgrub pa'i rgyu// lce thog zas zhim sgyur mi bya// mdzod phugs dgra la bstan mi bya// rkun nor gzhan la bstan mi bya//
330a3(rgyud 'grel): ser ra'i ro tshogs mi bya zhing / mi la nga ba mi shes min// khyi rgod phang du blang mi bya// 'di drug dngos grub yal ba'i rgyu// lha khang dud pas mi bdug cing // mchod rten bshig par mi bya'o// 'di gnyis dman pa'i byang chub rgyu//
330a4(rgyud 'grel): me long g.ya' yis mi bsgo zhing // khab rtse gnyis pas btsem mi bya// 'di gnyis bdud kyis khyer ba'i rgyu// dug gi phyag tshang mi bya zhing // stag la zham bu mi bya'o// 'di gnyis mkha' 'gros za ba'i rgyu// nam mkha' chos kyis bsgyur mi
330a5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ ri bong ras phug 'jig mi bya// 'di gnyis 'khor bar sdong ba'i rgyu// myu gu than pas bskur mi bya// lcug phrog rtsa gugo breg mi bya// 'gro ba'i lam sA dgag mi bya// 'di gsum ngan song sgyur ba'i rgyu// mchog la da man
330a6(rgyud 'grel): bapar gzung mi bya// byams tshigs khyad du gsad mi bya// dgos pa yal bar dor mi bya// 'di gsum gtan gyi bar chod yin// bde la skur pa gdab mi bya// ma la ngan tshig smra mi bya// bu mo sring mo spro mi bya// 'di gsum
330b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro 'khrug pa'i rgyu// las kyi cho ga 'di rnams las// 'gal na rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'gyur// ltung ba chen po byung gyur na// dbang rdzogs bdun dang sbyin sreg khri// tshogs 'khor brgya rtsa brgyad dang ni// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas
330b2(rgyud 'grel): bshags// ltung ba bzhi po byung gyur na// dbang bskur gcig dang sbyin sreg brgya// tshogs 'khor bdun dang mchod sbyin gcig/ smre sngags drag pos bshags par bya// ltung ba chung ngu byung gyur na// lus la tshab ma smre bshags bya//
330b3(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal gcig dbul bzod gsol bya// brgya pa bdun nam nyi shu gcig/ bzlas pas de las ldang ba yin// ngag lo rgyal dang sme bshegs bya// maN+Dal dbul zhing bzod gsol bya// brgya pa brgya rtsa brgyad dang ni// lnga bcu nyer gcig
330b4(rgyud 'grel): bdun dag dang // lanA gcig brjod pas 'dag par gsungs// yid la 'gyod dang maN+Dal dang // brgya pa gong bzhin bzlas pas 'dag/ kun gyi kha skong gtor ma dang // maN+Dal bdun po rnam dag shes// brgya pa rtag tu bzlas par
330b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ yan lag dam tshig ces bya ba// sngags med btsan dug bza' mi bya// rtsi mAng+ga ri mo bkru mi bya// stobs med ral kha spyad mi bya// tshod med zhal ce bcad mi bya// dpung med skyil ma mi bya ste// rgyus med sa mkhan mi bya'o//
330b6(rgyud 'grel): yang rtsal med par 'phyong mi bya// dga' bo'i sa ru shags 'gyed min// bye ma'i ril mkhar mi brtsig/ rgya mtsho'i gling du yul mi gzung // tsan dan nags lo me mi 'jug/ me tog ldum rar sad mi gsad// rgyal po
331a1(rgyud 'grel): // nga sa myig smye// rangad galas lags smin+d+ha// ltu nam bdag sa b+hA// da lam m+b+ha bAn+d+haH// 'du ba nga bak+Sha// sgyu rlung sgyusgyu brjod pa mgyur// slo rab nga
331a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dris mi byA// 'gyogs po 'gran pang mi bya'o// g.yang lugs rtag tu dgau mA~M byA// sbyin la 'dug pa snang bai b+ha// m+b+han+dan na'i spyod kha dam bi dr-iD+D+h+ya// rtag tu mda' nr-i bsang bya lding // rtag dru gtsun gdung bar bya//
331a3(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu phub gzugs byar bya// mkhar dpe stong kyi na 'obs gtsang bya/ ba'i ro la yang yang brtag/ rang gi srog zin dus drag bya// mdor na de la sogs pa yi// dam tshig dpag tu med
331a4(rgyud 'grel): mod kyang ring sems drang por bsrang byas te// rtag tu bla ma dran byed cing // sgo gsum tha malA ma luswA nA// dam tshig sdom ba thams cad ni// gdon mi za bar bsrung
331a5(rgyud 'grel): bar nges bag yangs chen po ci bder spyod// dam tshig dang sdom pa'i rnam par bshad pa// rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i las kyi cho ga/ rnal 'byor gyi sgrog ces bya ba/ bla ma rdo rje gdan pas
331a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po e b+hu ka ra gup+ta dang / bod kyi lo tsa pa tsa mi sangs rgyas grags pas glen skad du bsgyur ba'o// karma shang tran rdzogs so//
332a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i zhen log sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so// /
332b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod gnas dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la 'jug thabs don 'di bstan par bya// gang zhig bdag gzhan sdug bsngal spong 'dod cing // bde ba 'dod pas dam chos spyad par bya// mi rtag chos la
332b2(rgyud 'grel): bye brag bsam las 'das// ci phyir 'jig rten 'di dag mi rtag ste// snod kyi 'jig rten ri rab lhun po dang // gser gyi rI bdun rol mtsho chen po bdun// gr-idI ba nI gling phran lcags rI mu khyud yang // 'jig pa'i dus na bskal pa'i me byung ba//
332b3(rgyud 'grel): thol ba'i lhag ma tsam yang mi lus te/ tha mar chu dang rlung gis 'jog pas na// brtan zhing nges pa 'dra ste brtag mi bzod// lo zla tshes grangs shol ni mi thebs pasau// lo zla 'das shing 'jig pa'i dus dang nye// dus bzhi 'khor ba
332b4(rgyud 'grel): snod pa med pas na// dbyar dro skye la dgun+da grang skam pa dang // lo legs lo nyes thanA zhod nges pa med// rtsi tog ljon shing lo 'dab rgyas pa 'dra// dus kyi drong bral rlung gis mi rtag go// rtag pa lcags na tswi phyir 'gyur zhing 'gro/ de la sogs pa
332b5(rgyud 'grel): mi rtag dgongs nas gda'// brgyad kyi 'jig rten 'di yang mi rtag ste// nyin zhag 'das shing shi dang phar phar nye// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gsum gyis rtag tu 'khor// skye rga nA 'chi rang thag ri mo 'dra// 'chi bdag bdud nI so bya nya sdod 'dra// 'jig
332b6(rgyud 'grel): rten 'di na che chung phyag dbul kun// 'chi bdag bdud kyi lag tu mi 'gro med// snga ma shi ba'i mi rnams kun gyis kyang // rtag tu re zhing bu dang nor bsags kyang // rang ni dge sdig gnyis dang 'grogs te 'gro/ bu nor phyir lus bdag la phan
333a1(rgyud 'grel): med pas rade phyir bu nor zas la chags mi bya// yod bsdu dge ba'i las la mi 'bad na// de ni 'jig rten 'di yi gter bsrungs yin// shes pas dam pa'i chos la mi spyod na// brtags pas banam bu don med glen pa yin// de bas nor
333a2(rgyud 'grel): med dbul lo bsnyen dga' dang // bram ze ldan pa phul ba dag la spyod// de ni 'jig rten 'di yi gter bsrungs yin// shes pas dam pa'i chos la mi spyod na// brtags pas btsam bu don med glen pa yin// de bas nor med dbul lo bsnyen dga' da
333a3(rgyud 'grel): bram ze ldan pa phul ba dag la spyod// 'jig rten 'di yi pha ma bu tshe dang // phu nu mdza' shes bran khol nor rnams kun// sdug bsngal skal len 'ga'o yang mi 'ong ste// 'chi ba'i phyir ni gcig kyang mi 'ong ngo // don de ma rig sems can mang po
333a4(rgyud 'grel): kun 'tshe 'di'i 'khor ba'i nye bshos ched dag tu// sdig pa'i bye brag rnam pa mang po spyod// phan med rang ni ngan song gsum du ltung // de tshe 'gyod kyang phran med nyon mongs sngon// tshe 'dir phrad pa'i las mthun nye bzhi rnams// 'gron po gnas
333a5(rgyud 'grel): mthun tsam ste so sor 'gro/ sdig dang sngos nas zas deng nor bsags kyang // sdig po'i rnam smin rmongs pa bdag gis khur// bsags pa'i nor ni phyir lus bu tshas khyer// sbrang bus 'bad de sbrang rtsi bsags pa 'dra// de bas longs spyod med cing
333a6(rgyud 'grel): dbul ba yang // rgyu 'bras mi slu chos la yid ches pa// mos pas dge ba dad pa'i yon phul nas// dge slong gser 'byig lta bur gyur pa yod// de phyir 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang du blang / dad ngang tshul khrims gtong dang thos pa dang // dri
333b1(rgyud 'grel): med ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod shes rab ni// 'phags pa'i nor bdun lags par thub pas gsungs// dper na nor gyi nang na chog shes pa// rab mchog lags par lha mi'i ston pas gsungs// kun tu cho ga shes mdzad cing cho ga
333b2(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen na// nor mi bdog kyang yang dag 'byor par 'gyur// bdag la shin tu 'phangs pa'i lus 'di yang // gos rnying lam du bor ba bzhin du 'gro/ da lta sa stengs 'di na gnas bya kun// lo brgya tshun chad gcig kyang mi lus so// brgya thug
