333b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bum la gcig kyang mi 'byung na// brgya la srid kyang phal cher yengs 'gyur te// mtshan mo nyal bas brgya phyed gnyid dbang du// song ste de la dran med shrI dang 'dra// lhag ma lnga bcu yod du zad kyang ni// ra ro nyal dang 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen// lnga
333b4(rgyud 'grel): bcu phyed ni der yang zad pas ni// legs par dran pa nyi shu rtsa lnga yod// de yang rang la dbang byar ma mchis te// de ring do nod 'chi 'am rtol med kyi// da lta nyid du brtun te 'bad la bya'o// tshe 'di zil pa 'dra ste med la khang// dbugs nan bun
333b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ste yal la khang // lus ni sgyu ma 'dra ste snang la med// sems ni glog dang 'dra ste skad cig ma// phung po mi rtag 'chi zhing 'gyur ba ste// ngar ba'i mdog ni nyon mongs nad kyis 'phrog/ 'chi ba'i srog ni 'chi bdag bdud kyis 'phrog/ dper na chu
333b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gram g.yang sa'i sdong po 'dra// ring po mo thogs bya khyi dur ba dang // srin bya 'ug pa bya rgod khwa sgeg dang // khyi ltogs wa dang 'bu sprang gzan du 'gyur// de bzhin sgyu mar mi rtag mi rtogs par// phung po 'di yi ched du sdig spyod pa// ma rig
334a1(rgyud 'grel): glan pa can mongs spya ra n+te// bstan pa thal ba'i yongs spyod 'ardzu rnan 'ang // rmi lam longs spyo rnyed dang mtshungs pastAM// da ltar 'dus byas thams cad min+tag pas// dam pa'i chos la myur du dbang bar bya'o// de bas laH
334a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gzugs brnyan mchod gnas la// mos pa'i dad pas dge la brtson pa ni// bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i dbye// rgyal po gsal thub lta bur gyur pa'o// de phyir mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya// cis te mi lus thob pa
334a3(rgyud 'grel): shin tu dka'// khom ldan mi lus thob par gyur pa na// phyi ma'i phan pa 'di la ma bsgrubs na// phyis ni mtho ris thob par gA la 'gyur// ngan song skyes nas sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i tshe// tshe 'di'i btsun phyug bde skyid ci la phan// sna mA
334a4(rgyud 'grel): ci sbyang dran pas shin tu sduge/ de phyir 'khor ba'i chos la ma yengs par// zhe sdang chen po mo ltar 'bar ba la// snying rje chen po'i chu yis myur du song // 'dod chags ser sna'i mdud pa dam po de// chags med sbyin pa chen po'i sems kyis khrol// /
334a5(rgyud 'grel): gti mug mun pa chen po'i thabs pa de// shes rab gsal ba'i sgron me chen po theg/ nyon mongs kun la gnyen po bcug nas ni// 'khor ba'i chu bo chen po bzhi rnams la// brtson 'grus gru btsugs nas ni rgal bar bya// ngo cig yod pas
334a6(rgyud 'grel): sang phong yod pa bzhin// tshe 'di yod pas phyi ma yod par nges// sang phong lo dang sku tshe slang ma ni// gang sngar 'ong ba su la'ang rtol med pas// sang phong don du so nam 'bad pa bzhin// phyi ma'i don du dam chos spyad par rigs// de ring do nub kho
334b1(rgyud 'grel): na mi 'chi zhes// bag med bde bar 'dug pa rigs ma yin// tshe 'di mi stod ri gzar chu dang 'dra// ring por mi rtag rtsu kha'i zil pa 'dra// yang na skye shi chu yi chu bur 'dra// 'khor bar skye ba shing rta'i 'khor lo 'dra// de bas rang gi lus la ma chags//
334b2(rgyud 'grel): par// skyabs kyi sbyin pas 'gro la phan btags na// bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i dpe// rgyal po shi byin lta bur gyur pa'ang yod// mi yi chos lugs legs par spyad pas na// mtho ris lha yul bgrod pa thag mi ring // mtho ris
334b3(rgyud 'grel): thar pa'i go 'phang gang yin pa// gzegs na thar pa gram na 'dug pas na// de bas mi dge bcu spong dge bcu spyod// grags pa nyams par 'gyur ba'i chos drug spongs// dge lo mi skur sdig la mi bstod de// 'bras bu gang spyod de dang mnyam
334b4(rgyud 'grel): bapar gsungs// ngan song sdug bsngal shes kyang mi 'jigs par// mi rtag lus la chags nas sdig spyod pa// e ma'o rang gis rang rlag snying ro d+hI// yi dwags byol song sdug bsngal spyi re bung // dmyal khams bco brgyad sdug bsngal ya re cha//
334b5(rgyud 'grel): skyerga na 'tsho'i sdug bsngal rgyun re zhing // phung po sgyu ma zas nor brnyan ma yin// 'khrul pa'i gnyen po shes 'khor ba'i bshal thag pas// de ring rang dbang yod pa'i mi rnams kyis// rang dang 'brel pa'i bas nor gnyen bshis le// ser snas
334b6(rgyud 'grel): mi bcing chags sems mi bskyed do// sems can rtsol shugs med la bskul mi bya// chang ni ha la'i dug bzhin rab tu bsrung // gzhan gyi bud med dag la chags mi bya// rnam smin med pa'i so nam mi bor zhing // gzhan gyi nor la brtsi gdab
335a1(rgyud 'grel): chom rkun spang // don du lus ngagu yid gsum spyod pa gzab// mdor na mtshams med lnga dang nye ba lnga// lci bzhi log brgyad kha na ma tho gsum// 'di spyod ngan song gsum du gdon mi za// mi rig sdig pa sngon du spyod pa las// 'gyod
335a2(rgyud 'grel): pa drag po sems ni bskyed nas su// sdig pa 'phro gtsang dge ba spyod pa ni// 'bras bu mtho ris thob par gdon mi ze// de yang cis mngon ston pa'i bka' las ni// dang po rgyal po ma skyes dgra yis su// mtshams med pa yi ldog pa byas pa
335a3(rgyud 'grel): las nga nags kyi drang srong dag las sems bskyed nas// 'gyod pa'i sems kyis 'bras bu thob pa 'dra'o// de phyir nges pa'i 'phral bshags dge la sbyor// gzhan ya dang po kho na ma tho ba'i// tshig gis skur pa btab ste smad pa las//
335a4(rgyud 'grel): modo la 'gyod de bshags pa phul na ni// bu mo rdo rje lta bur skyes pa'o// mdor na gzhan don spyod par gsungs pa ste// bdag phyir gzhan la gnod byas bdo bar 'gyur// ma rig skye bo rang gi don byed dang // ston pa sangs rgyas gzhan gyi don byed
335a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang 'bras bu che chung khyad par de 'dra bas// sems can bkres pas nyen par gyur pa las// bas nor lus kyi sgon+da phan 'dogs pa// rgyal po shung lo gar ni lta bu ste// gzhan don spyad na 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// 'di dag shes nas
335a6(rgyud 'grel): dge med sdig spyod pa/ mi shes sdig spyod sdig pa brgya 'gyur che// de bas don med las la ma brtson par// dge ba'i las la rtag tu spyad par bya// rgyu 'bras shes byed rkyen ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen pas// de phyir dge ba shes dam pa
335b1(rgyud 'grel): tsal bar bya// de ni legs pa kun ston nyes pa sprob// yang dag lam ston 'bras bu skyed byed pas// pha ma sa mkhan dus kyis dbyar dang 'dra'o// de phyir dag bshes dam pa rtag tu bstan// chos kyang shes pas mchog spyad pa gces// ci yi phyir na rmi
335b2(rgyud 'grel): chos so nam 'dra// chos kyi bdag bshad bdag gi chos ma bshad// don rtogs bya phyir dang po mnyan yang dgos// nges pa rnyed nas tshig myang bslab mi dgos// tshig mi zad phyir nyan pas mthar thug med// nyan cing 'chad pa spyad thabs btsal
335b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir yin// mi spyod nyan 'chad don chung tshe re chad// gzhan la 'chad pa tshig gi thun pa yin// gzhan gyi than 'byal rang la mi phan ste/ khro mkhan sbyang mkhan bro spyang 'chang pa 'dra// de ni mi nag chos kyi lo rgyus mkhan// thos pas rgyags nas
335b4(rgyud 'grel): rang sems ma thul na// mkhas kyang phan med slar la 'khor ba'i rgyu// thos mang tshig la mkhas ba ne tso 'dra// 'gro ba gang zhig rang la med pa yi// nor bu rin po che yi yon tan dag/ ji snyed brjod kyang rang la phan med 'gyur// de
335b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin chos shes chos dang mi ldan pas// spyad thabs che ba'i yon tan ji snyed cig/ brjod kyang rang gi don la phan med 'gyur// gzhan yang shes nas dam chos ma spyad na// rgya mtsho'i nang du sgom nas shi ba 'dra// gzhan yang kha phyir
335b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la chos 'chad pa// rin chen rnyed kyang spong ba 'dra zhes gsungs// dper na sman mkhan nad la ma btang dang // dbul mos phyag pa'i nor bgrangs pa dang 'dra// lam rgyus shes kye ma phyin 'dra zhes gsungs// de bas 'gro ba kun kyang chos la
336a1(rgyud 'grel): gzung // pha ma bu tsha gnyen 'dun thams cad dang // 'khor g.yog las kyi 'brel pa thams cad kun// gros btab gal gyis bcud de dge la gzung // chos la chud na byang chub spyod pa yin// dge ba nyams chung sdig pa stobs chen dag/ bla
336a2(rgyud 'grel): med byang chub sems ni ma bskyed par// dge ba gzhan gyis zil gyis mi non pas// 'khor ba'i brtson rar bsdams shing nyam thag pa'i// bdag gzhan mi bde bsal bar 'dod pa des// byang chub sems gnyis rtag tu btang mi bya// sdig med dge ba
336a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dang ldan de la// bder gshegs rnams kyi sras su dgongs pa dang // lha mir dgongs pa kun gyis phyag bya'i 'os// mdor na byang chub rnam pa gsum dgongs te// dang por smon dgos bar du 'jug kyang dgos// tha mar don de nyid la gnas par
336a4(rgyud 'grel): byad/ smon kyang ma zhugs don la ma gnas na// yid smon byas pas 'bras bu mi thob pas// byang chub spyod pa rlabs chen spyod par bya// rgyu ni dka' ba dang du ma blangs par// 'bras bu byang chub thob par mi 'gyur te// gang la sbyin par mchog tu btang dga'
336a5(rgyud 'grel): shadang yan lag kun gyi dang po mgo bo yin// sbyin par gtong ba rgyal po zla 'od yin// de bzhin spyad na byang chub thob por 'gyur// de phyir 'khor ba'i chos 'di gtan du spang // mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jug par bya// sbyin pa'i pha rol
336a6(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa yongs rdzogs na// sa ni dang po rab tu dgo' ba thob// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i sa yang thob// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na// gsum pa 'od byed pa yis yang thob/
336b1(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na// bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba yi sa yang thob// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na// lnga pa shin tu sbyang dka'i sa yang thob// shes rab pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na// drug pa mngon
336b2(rgyud 'grel): du gyur pa'i sa yang thob// thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na// bdun pa ring du song ba'i sa yang thob// smon lam pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na// brgyad pa mi g.yo ba yis yang thob// stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs
336b3(rgyud 'grel): na dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros sa yang thob// ye shes pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na// bcu pa chos kyi sprin gyis yang thob// 'bras bu sku gsum lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs rnams kyis su// byang
336b4(rgyud 'grel): chub mchog tu thugs ni bskyed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rlabs po che// rim par gnas nas 'bras bu thob pa ltar// de bzhin bdag dang gzhan la phan don du// sems bskyed nas ni dge ba gzhung du spyod// de ltar dam chos
336b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhung du spyad pa na// nyon mongs 'chi bdag bdud ni 'joms pa yi// bdud rtsi mchog nyid kyang ni de yin no// de phyir dam chos gzhung bzhin spyad par bya// chos gzhung mi spyod myos pa'i ming ci yod// tshul khrims mi bsrung dge slong ci la zer//
336b6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig med na sngags pa gang la zer// sdig ni chung yang mi brnyas spang bar bya// dge ba chung yang dang du blang bar bya// mdor na tshad me de bzhi dang bsdu ba bzhi// gzhon don spyad na bdag don chud mi za// de phyir sgrib gnyis spangs la tshogs/
337a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bsgrub// ston pa'i bka' dang don du mthun byed cing // chags med dge bar gtong ba'i gang zag ni// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can yin pas na// de la phrag dog dbang gis sgro skur zhing // thabs kyis smong byed
337a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i g.yang sar ltung // dge ba'i don la zhugs pa'i gang zag gis// nyon mongs 'du 'dzi med pa'i dge gnas na// mtshan mo stong smad dge la gnas nas ni// gung la nyal tshe dge dran 'apri la nyal// de yis bag tshigs dge
337a3(rgyud 'grel): la gnas par 'gyur// bag chags rtag par gnas n+ya dang po'i drong // yin pas dge ba nyams 'og chud de bya// zas kyang chags phyir ma yin rgyags phyir myin// dge rtags bya phyir tshod ni zin par bza'// rgod dang 'gyod dang gnod
337a4(rgyud 'grel): sems rmugs pa dang // gnyis dang 'dod la 'dun dang the tshom ste// sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag dge ba'i nor// 'phrog pa'i chom rkun lags par rig par mdzod// ston pa'i bka' la brdzun pa mi mnga' bas// the tshom nem nur yid gnyis mi
337a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// 'don la spyad cing tshig phyir mi 'brang ste// don ni gser 'dra tshig ni smin ma bzhin// gser rnyed nas ni sgron ma gdeg mi dgos// don la spyad cing bsgoms na rang rig skye// tshig phyir nyan cing 'chad pa mang byas kyang // rang rig
337a6(rgyud 'grel): mi skye nyon mongs 'phel ba'i rgyu// mdor na theg pa kun la blo sbyangs te// nges pa gcig la zhugs te mi sgrub par// ye rngam zos nas byang chub 'khrul pa ste// des ni 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro// chos kyang rang gi nyams dang
337b1(rgyud 'grel): spyad cing spyad// 'bras bu gong ma che la gtad byas na// nyams kyis mi lcogs bzhin du khas len pa// thang stong sdig pa rang gis blangs pa yin// theg pa'i grangs ni gcig tu ma nges la// theg pa'i khyad par shes rab che chung ste/
337b2(rgyud 'grel): nyams 'og chud par spyad na chad mi za// dam chos gzhung du spyod po'i mi de la/ dam can kun kyang ma bskul reng bzhin 'gro/ mkhas pa chen po'i mthu ni nyi shur 'dra// 'gro ba kun kyang dad cing 'dun pas na// 'dus byas 'dus mi byas
337b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dge ba la// thun mong dag tu spong len med par bya// spong ldan byas na ston pa'i bka' dang 'gal// theg chen sgor zhugs gang zag rnams kyis kyang // shes rab snying rje gnyis kyis gzhi gzung ste// thams cad dbyer med rtog pa shes rab
337b4(rgyud 'grel): yin dang kun la bu bzhin byams pa snying rje yin// de gnyis mi ldan theg chen khas che ba// long spang rgyal po yin zhes zer te brdzun// da lta'i gang zag sngags kyi sgor zhugs pas// gsang sngags zab mo nor rdzas brnyan mar btsongs// 'khor
337b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bu tsha pho mo khyim thab byod// gsang sngags shes pas bdug phred snying re rje// des ni tsan dan sol bar 'tshong ba dang // gser phye spang phyir 'tshong dang 'dra bar gsungs// gzhan yang dad pa can gyi nor blangs nas// dge bar ma spyad mi chos nor du spyad//
337b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu dag ni rnga mo'i lus su skye// de yi nor la nor bdag longs spyod bya// spyo res sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur// lcags rdo ngul rdo bcu ru btub pas na// dad pa can gyi nor ni bzhur mi btug/ tshig tsam mo yin sems kyis ma
338a1(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid/ rtogs nas klong du gyur cing drod ldan dang // chags med dge bar spyod pa'i gang zag gis// ma byin blangs nas spyad kyang mi sgrib bo// mdor na sngags kyi rtsa ba dam tshig bsrung // bya ba'i rgyud kyi dam tshig bstan pa ni// thun mong
338a2(rgyud 'grel): bslab pa bzhi po nyams mi bya// bla med rnam gsum mchod cing bla ma bkur// grogs la gdung zhing mi thun kha zas spang // mtshan mar byas shing lha le phul ba yis// khrus la brtson pa bskyed cing lus spyod bzang // ma nyams bsrungs na rig gsum
338a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thob// rnal 'byor phyi ba'i dam tshig bstan pa ni// spyi yi dam tshig gsum po nyams mi bya// rtsa ba'i dam tshig drug ni gzhung du bsrung // yan lag dam tshig gsum dang ldan par bya// ma nyams bsrungs ni 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor nang
338a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dam tshig bstan pa ni// dam tshig bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab kyang // mdo ru bsdus na rtsa ba gsum du 'dus// lus srog skyed pa'i dus gsum pha ma dang // ma rig sgo 'byed 'dren ston slob dpon dang // dam pas 'brel pa'i grogs mched rnams la ni// lus
338a5(rgyud 'grel): ngag yid gsum don dang mthun par bsrung // yi dam lha yi ting 'dzin g.yel mi bya// de yi sngags dang phye ga rgya rgyun mi gtsang // dam tshig nyams dang ma 'dres snod med la// gsang ba'i man ngag spel bar mi bya'o// da lta gang zag sngags par khas 'chas
338a6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ sku'i dam tshig gzhung du mi srung bar// pha ma spong rdung bla ma smod mi lakhur// phrag dog dbang gis grogs la brtse gdung gcad// ngan song gan su the tsom med par 'gro// gsung gi dam tshig gzhung du mi srung bar// ting 'dzin 'dod sgrub 'dzab tu rna 'cha' zhing // phyag
338b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyar ma byin pas nor len byed pa'i// sngags par khaT 'chas 'khor ba'i g.yang sar ltung // gsang sngags zab mo dgon par mi spyod par// snod dang mi ldan nyan mi rnyed tha la// beg rtse bcas nas man dag lhag par bshad// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa dmyal par skye/
338b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags gab pa'i don rnams ma rtogs par// dam med mi nag khral theg kun bsdus nas// sbas pa'i gsang ba mngon sum 'chol por spyod// bka' dang 'gal bas 'khor ba'i g.yang sar lhung // dang por dam tshig gzhung du mi srung dang kabar du dbang rnams rim par mi nod dang /
338b3(rgyud 'grel): mar bka' gzhung bzhin du mi sgrub par// sngags par khas 'ches gang zag snying re rje// bza' shing rabar dug gi sdong skyes nas// dug des bza' shing byin yang med byed pas// bdag pos dug ngo ngo ni shes ma thag/ rtsa nas phyung ste myur du med byed ltar// gang zhig rtsa ba nyams bri
338b4(rgyud 'grel): phyal ba dang // 'dres nyams 'gyur ba nyes pa 'phel 'gyur bas// don rig nas ni myur du spang bar bya// dper na 'o ma nyung ngu'i thig pa gcig/ rul pas 'o ma kun kyang 'drul ba bzhin// dem nyams snod na de dang ma 'dres ni// nyams pa de dang de ni 'dra bar gsungs// de bas lung/
338b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig chu la'ang mi btung // dam tshig sa gzhi 'dra ste kun gyi rten// dam tshig nor bur 'dra ste 'dod pa 'byung // dam tshig mkhar dang 'dra ste 'jig pa skyob// dam tshig gru dang 'dra ste chu bo sgrol// mdor na chos kyi rtsa ba dam tshig gsungs// phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams kyis sems la
338b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jog rnam smin gzhan ni khang dang rims kyis smin// gsang sngags thun mong ma yin rnam smin drag/ rgyu mar sprul zhugs bzhin du 'gro'o zhes// gsang ba'i rgyud rnams kun las gsal bar 'byung // gang zag sngags par khas len rnams kyis ni// rang bzhin ting
339a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gsum// dam tshig dbang dang mchod pa'i sgor zhugs nas// rang nyid zab mo'i don dang ldan par bya// theg pa 'og ma'i sgor zhugs bsrung sdom dang // chos spyod byed pa mi dgag mi smod// ci phyir chos la spong len phyogs
339a2(rgyud 'grel): ris dang / bzang ngan gnyi su ston pas ma gsungs pas// 'di ltar smod pa'i chos 'di thams cad la// gnyis med mnyam pa chen por rtogs pa ni// 'bad rtsol ci byas dge bar gyur pas na// dge ba'i rtsa ba phyogs ris med par bya'o// da lta'i gang zag thog pa
339a3(rgyud 'grel): 'og ma pa'i// rgyu 'bras don la zhen pa kha cig ni// gsang sngags zab mo'i don rnams ma rtog par// sngags kyi stan 'gan chos spyod 'phrigs mthong na// ban de log chos spyod cing rtsing chos byed// gsang sngags chos min ston pas ma gsungs zer// man dag zab mo'i dos
339a4(rgyud 'grel): la skur btab pas// 'bras bu mnar med dmyal ba'i yang gting du// skye bar gyur pas rmongs pa snying re rje// ston pa'i zhal nas nges por gsungs pa yi// man ngag don dam gsang sngags zab mo la// bka' sbrang gzhung bzhin dang du mi len par// mtshan nyid chos spyod dag la
339a5(rgyud 'grel): zhen pas nga bskal pa gsum du sangs rgyas zhal mi mthong // skal po chung zhing shes rab zhan pa dang // blo ngan don la rmongs pa'i gang zag gis// zab mo'i don lam zhugs skur ba btab// rnam smin dpag gis mi lang brjod las 'das// gsang sngags zab mo'i don lo yid ches
339a6(rgyud 'grel): nasad/ lha spyod dam tshig gzhung du ldan pa dang // sgrub la shin tu brtson pa'i gang zag ni// sangs rgyas sa la the tshom med par 'gro// skye bo ma rig chos la gzung ba dang // chos po chos dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi// don du bdag gis yi ge 'di brtsams pas// kun kyang dad cing don
339b1(rgyud 'grel): la 'jug par smon// zhen log sgron ma zhes bya ba/ slob dpon mkhas pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
340a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po chen po rnam thos
340a2(rgyud 'grel): sras kyi sgrub thabs bzhugs s+ho// /
340b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ mahA rarA dza be shra ba na sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos smras kyi sgrub thabs// dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// nor gyi dbang phyug rin chen gter mnga' ba// gnod sbyin kun gyi nor 'chang kun gyi rje/
340b2(rgyud 'grel): byang phyogs skyong ba'i rgyal po rnam thos sras// dngos grub mchog snol mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// ngal so dge ba stobs po che// sbom zhing seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs// phyag gnyis be con ne'u le bsnams// de slob cho ga bshad par bya// ga pur la
340b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs lci bo yis// sngags brjod sa gzhi legs par byug/ tshom bu dgur ni me tog dgod// dam tshig bdun dang ldan pa yis// rgyal po'i rten gsum gzugs par bya// bdag nyid cho ga rdzogs byas la// sdigs brgya bcu gsum pa bzlas pa/ phyogs/
340b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams kun du bsang gtor bya// snying khar sa bon bsam pa las// byang phyogs 'od zer rab spros te// gnod sbyin bye ba 'bum gyi gtso// rgyal po rnam thos spyan drang te// mdun du legs par bzhugs pa bsam// de la bsang gtor nas brtsams
340b5(rgyud 'grel): tengargyal po 'khor bcas legs par mchod// oM a mri ta kuN Da li hA na ha na hUM phaT/ de la mchod pa'i yi ge la// yi ge gsum dang ldan pa yis// so sor legs par sbyar te dbul// spyi gtsug lkog ma snying kha yi// oM A hUM gis 'od zer gyis/
340b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// 'od zhu stong pa'i rang bzhin bya// de nas mdun du bum las ni// rin chen khang pa brtsegs par bsgom// zur bzhi rim gsum khang brtsegs pa// dbus mo'i pho brang gsum brtsegs te// rtse mo rin chen nor bus brgyan
341a1(rgyud 'grel): dra ba dra ba byed pas bskor// shar sogs shel dang bai DUr+ya// pad+ma ra gA gser gyi ni// ka ba stong phrag bcu yis brgyan// de'i phyi rol phyogs mtshams su// bum pa bzang po dpag bsam shing // rin chen rdzing bu 'dod 'jo ba// brgyad brgyad lnga yis
341a2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu mdzes// rin chen 'bar bas yongs su bskor// dbus su sa bon yi ge las// 'od zer sna tshogs rab 'phros nas// don byas slar 'dus bai la thom// de las rgyal chen 'khor bcas rdzogs// rin chen pho brang dam pa dang // mi 'jigs seng ge'i gdan steng na
341a3(rgyud 'grel): baM las byung ba'i mgon po ni// ngas so dge ba stobs po che// g.yas na rin chen rgyal mtshan 'dzin// g.yon na gter gyi ne le bsnams// sku ni gser gyi 'od pas mdzes// zhal nas rin chen char pa 'bebs// thugs rjes phongs pa las sgrol mdzad// sku la rin chen
341a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyis spras// phrag gong g.yas g.yon nyi zlas rgyan// nyi ma 'bum gyis gzi mdangs can// dbul rin chen rgyan gyis spras// gnod sbyin bye ba'i 'khor rnams dang / na mkha'i sprin tshogs bzhin du bsam// nam pa'i mdzod la mnga' mnyes pa// sems dpa'i
341a5(rgyud 'grel): skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// de nas rgyal po spyan drangs te// mgon po kun gshegs dam tshig can// da lta snyigs ma lnga yi dus// mtshams med lnga ni kun spyod cing // thams cad nyon mongs 'dam 'byings sar// gzigs shing gshegs pa'i gnas ngan yang
341a6(rgyud 'grel): shAkya seng ge'i sbyar sngar khyod// thugs dam gang bzhes de dgongs la// 'dren pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba dang // sems can kun la sman slad du// byang phyogs gnas na bzhugs pa rnams// sems can don phyir gshegasu gsol// phyag na rdo rje thugs gnas
341b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ hUM las spros pa'i 'od rnams kyis// rang bzhin rgyal po rnam thos sras// gnod sbyin 'bum bcas bkug nas ni// nor bu'i grong khyer de dbus su// mdun gnas rgyal po de la bzhugs// rin chen dbang bskur byin brlabs nas// de nas bsang gtor nas
341b2(rgyud 'grel): brtsams te// rin chen bdun dang bkra shis brgyad// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis mchod/ gu gul dud pa dbul zhing bstod// de nas thugs kha'i zla ba la// sa bon sngags kyis yongs bskor te// lce rdo rje sbu gur bsam/ sngags kyi bzlas pa spro bsdu ni/
341b3(rgyud 'grel): so so'i thugs kAr dmigs la zlas// tad ya thA oM hi li ma Ni b+ha dra hi li hi li ma Ni b+ha dra 'i ga N+DI bra ga la gi li ma Sh+TiH/ ku ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ ku ru ku ru mA NaM b+ha dra/ d+ha ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tu ru t+ya ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ su ru ma Ni b+ha drA/ su ru su ru ma Ni b+hA dre/ tsu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tsu ru tsau ru ma Ni
341b4(rgyud 'grel): b+ha dra/ oM a h+ya hri tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha a ba ta ra ti ShA me tsa ya/ tad ya thA bud d+ha ni su te ne/ su ra me ne/ su pa de re/ su su sh+ye/ hi li mi li swA hA/ hUM bai shra ma na ye swA hA/ 'di brjod bsnyen pa 'bum phrag bcu// zla ba yar ngo'i bcwa lnga la// tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor
341b5(rgyud 'grel): byas der ni rgyal po la dmigs nas// a ka ru bsregs sngags bzlas bya// 'dir ni brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas// nyin dang mtshan mo lan drug tu// rgyal po la dmigs sngags bzlas na// rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar bgyid// dpag chad brgya ni tshun chad du//
341b6(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin rnams kyis bsrung bar byed// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // kha na ma tho med pa yi// zas dang skom dang bca' ba dang // nor bu dbyig dang gser gsal bgyid// rin po che'i gter la sogs// bsod nams tshad med 'grub
342a1(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub/ de la sogs pa ma lus 'grub// ngal bar gyur na gshegs su gsol// mchod bstod bzod par gsol ba dang // dkar gtor gtang la phrin las bcol// brum la sogs
342a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i snod bskyed la// khaM las zhal zas bskyed par bya// oM a ka ro mu khaM sadza d+harma ni ad+ya ban nA trang oM A hUM// sangs rgyas gyis spel byas la// sngags rgyal bcu gsum pa bzlas bya/ hUM baM shra ma Na la i dam pa li ma gri ha du sa ma
342a3(rgyud 'grel): ya rak+Shan tu mA ma si ti pra yang tshang // ma ma sarba karmA sA d+hu a mo g+ha swA hAHso so'i sngags la btags la dbul/ hUM byang phyogs skyong ba'i rgyal tshon rnam thos sras// gtor ma phul ba 'di dge bzhes nas kyang // bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa
342a4(rgyud 'grel): lar bu sdug bzhin du bskyang bar mdzod// bdag la gnod par sems pa yi// log par zhugs pa'i sems can kun// de'i phru mo gzhom pa dang // gtan nas brlag pa'i phrin las mdzod// baM yig sum cu rtsa gnyis bsring // snying kha'i lcags
342a5(rgyud 'grel): kyu bkrol la gshegs// oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjesu 'thun pa'i dngos grub gsol// byang phyogs gnas su gshegs nas kyang // slar yang byin par mdzad du gsol// dam tshig sems dpa' 'od du bya// rgyal po'i gzu
342a6(rgyud 'grel): brnyan byas pa la// rang bzhin rgyal po bkug la bstim/ zhabs kyis mnan la dbang du bsdu// hU~M baM shra ma ne ye a nu ra tsa k+Shu ru hUM// de ltar rdzogs par byas gyur na// rgyal po rnam thos sras bcas kyis// 'dod pa thams cad bskong par byed//
342b1(rgyud 'grel): na mkha' mdzod la mnga' brnyes 'gyur// slob dpon chen po 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa'i rnam thos sras kyis bde byed kyi rtog pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta de tsa ba dang bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis bsgyur
342b2(rgyud 'grel): cing zhus pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ ma hA rA dza bi ru ta ka ka ra ma ka la sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi las brtag pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs// dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs gtso phyag na rdo rje
342b3(rgyud 'grel): yis dngos su lung bstan byin brlabs pa'i// spyod mdzad chos kyi rdo rjes ni// grags 'dzin la sogs pha rol ste/ cho gas bsad sogs las rnams ni// bla ma brgyud pa las byung ba'o// gnod sbyin rgyal po gtsor gyur pa'i// stong
342b4(rgyud 'grel): phrag brgya dang gnyis lhag pa'i// de sgrub cho ga bshad por bya// dpal ldan khro rgyal rdo rje can// sngon 'gro rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// lha sogs gdug pa gzhom pa'i phyir// drong por cho ga la 'jug bya// ske tsho yungs dkar dug sna tshogs// bong bu
342b5(rgyud 'grel): chu dang spangs sogs dang // tshwa dang gdurig pa'i tsher spangs chu// hUM brjod sa bzhi legs par byugs// kha ro tsher ma can gyi shing // nam phyed byad bltar me tog blang // tshom bu ru ni legs par dgod// khrus byas bsrung ba bdun byas la// sems
342b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i skyil krung bde bstan la// byang du mngon phyogs 'jug par bya// de nyid rigs kyi me tog dang // sna tshogs dug phye mi rus phye// legs par sbyar ba'i de bzhin spos// mi rkang los byung mar me gtang // sa lu dmor po sha lnga sogs// gcig tu byas pa'i
343a1(rgyud 'grel): lha bshos dang // mi dang bong bu'i dri chu dang // rma bya'i sgro dang ku shar bcas// bsang gtor dri'i chu dang ldan// sngags rgyal bcu gsum pa bzlas bya// phyogs mtshams kun du bsang gtor bya// de nas bdag nyid rnal 'byor pa// gang
343a2(rgyud 'grel): bkrus nas brtsams sgrub thabs gzhung // bdag nyid cho ga rdzogs byas la// yi ge bcu gsum bzlas pa ni// 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas byas la// snying khar yi ge bsam pa las// 'od zer byang du rab 'phros te// gnod sbyin bye ba 'bum gyi gtso// klu
343a3(rgyud 'grel): chen brgyad kyis bskor ba yi// rnam thos rgyal po spyan drangs te/ mdun gyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni// rim pas legs par bzhugs par bsam// de la bsang gtor nas brtsams te// grong gi mchod pa'i rim pa yis// yi ge gsum dang ldan pa rnams
343a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po 'khor bcas leg par mchod// oM oM mr-i ta kun Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ de la mchod pa'i yi ge ni// so sor legs par sbyar te dbul// spyi gtsug lkog ma snying kha yi// yi ge gsum gyi 'od zer gyis// rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams//
343a5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zhu sa bon rang bzhin bya// de la rang sngags bskor ba dmigs// 'od kyis gdug pa bcom byas te// slar bsdu hA sogs la thim nas// rgyal chen 'khor bcas yongasu rdzogs// de nyid rgyal po chen po ste/ sku mdog sngon po gzi brjid can// zhal
343a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// khro gnyer mche bcung zhig gtsigs// cod pan sbrul mgo mthu rje can// phrag gong gi yos g.yon nyi zlas mtshan// nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid can// seng ge'i la sogs 'jigs pas mtshan// sku las na mkha' gang bar
343b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phro 'a g.yas ni rdo rje rab mtshan pa'i// dbyug pa ba dan parla ba 'dzin// g.yon pa phyag na sku gdung 'dzin// klu rnams gdug pa'i rang lus 'chang // gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs rnams ni// na mkha'i sbyin tshogs bzhin du bsam// thugs ka'i sa
343b2(rgyud 'grel): bon las 'phros pa'i// 'od kyi rgyal po rnam thos sras// 'khor dang bcas pa bkug nas ni// mdun nas dkyil 'khor dag la bstim// de nas bsang grato ro nas btsams te// gong gi sngags kyis mchod pa dbul// gong gi gtor ma'i bzhin//
343b3(rgyud 'grel): legs par byin gyis brlabs nas ni// oM badz+ra bi ru DA ga ku be ra// ad ma ka/ ma hA yak+Sha rA dza/ eSh+Ta nA ga bi ga bi ra bai sha sarbaM yak+Sha ba ri/ b+ha ra i daM ba ling gri h+Na dA/ saM ma ya ra k+Sha d+ha/ ma ma sid d+hi pra ya ts+tsha/ ma ma sarba karma sa da a mo ka ma ra ya
343b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swA hA// yi ge bcwa lnga sngags la ni// brtags te gtor ma dbul bar bya// de nas bdag nyid bsrung bar bya// gser la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams la// hUM ngaM wa~M gyi phyi rol du// yi g+he bcu gsum bskor bar bya// yungs dkar dang bcas spyi
343b5(rgyud 'grel): bor bzhag/ bla rtsi ba'i rnam lde le// gos sngon can gyi sngags bzlas te// mgo lus khyab par byugs la bsrung // de nas rten 'brel sngags kyis ni// lus la go cha dgod par bya// spyi bo lkog ma snying kha ru// kha dog gsum ldan yi ge bsam
343b6(rgyud 'grel): so sor sngags kyis bskor ba bya// thugs kher zla ba la gnas hUM// de la sngags kyis yongs bskor te// lce la rdo rje sbu gu bsam// spro bsdu'i sngags kyi bzlas pa ni// rgyal po'i thugs kar dmigs la bzlas// ngal min myer ba ma yin dang /
344a1(rgyud 'grel): gsal min mi gsal ma yin par// rtse gcig sems kyi bzlas par bya// rtse gcag sems kyi bzlos par bya// oM ni laM bur d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ne ma hA ya kA rA dza ku be ra be ru ra ba ga sid d+ha me pra ya ts+tsha hUM hUM hUM phaT/ 'di rjod bsnyen pa 'bum
344a2(rgyud 'grel): phrag gcig/ rdzogs nas rmi ltas 'byung ba ste/ chu bo skams dang sgrub mthong ngam// dgra khyim nugs la me mched mthong // sog po srin pos bskor ba yi// dbus na gnas pa mthong ba 'am// seng ge'i la sogs gcan zan tshogs mdun
344a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dus par mthong ba na// de nas las sbyor brtsam par bya// gnas gsum thig le byas nA so// gong gi bsrung ba'i cho ga rnams// bsrungs te byin gyis brlab par bya'o// dur khod b+ho leb thog tu ni// sna tshogs rdo rje bris byas la// steng du drag dang
344a4(rgyud 'grel): lan tshwa dang // khrag dang chu 'gram gnyis kyis// rkang rjes sa la sogs pa la// bsgrub bya'i gzugs sam gdug pa'i gzugs// rang gzugs mtshan nyid ldan par bya// dgug dang bcing Ta la sogs pa yi// bsod pa'i cho ga byas nas
344a5(rgyud 'grel): de la sbyin bsreg brtsam par bya// me thab gru gsum thab khung la// zur khru re'i tshad yod de// zabs su khru phyed la sogs la// sbyin sreg cho gar gsungs pa bzhin// thab kyis mtshan nyid shes par bya// de'i dbus su mchod rten ni//
344a6(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod mtshon ni nag pos bris// de'i dbus rdo rje dbyug pa ni// ba dan rtse lngas mtshan par bya// de'i phyi rol phyogs mtshams// kha dog nag po sbrul brkyang bri// gzhan dag dkyil 'khor phyag mtshan rnams// sbyin sreg cho gar shes par bya//
344b1(rgyud 'grel): tsher ma dug shing khru gang la// dbus su zur gsum brtsig byas te// mi skra'i skud pas bcings bya yi// tsher ma khru gang dbus su bzhag/ de nas mngon spyod rdzas rnams bzhag/ bsreg rdzas ling+ga gnyisu bya// dug dang khrag dang ske tshe dang // yungs dkar
344b2(rgyud 'grel): chu 'gram gnyis kyis// rkang rjes sa dang da du ra// prA bo sran ma mi rus phyed// byed du mgo bstan shi ba'i sgras// kun la sreg pa byas nas ni// dug shing tsher ma sor brgyad la// khrag dang dug chus sbags pa yi// de yi yam shing dbul bar bya// rus phye
344b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs mchod pa rnams// gong du gsungs pa bzhin du bya// de nas mau ni sngar bya ste// dbus rgyal po chen po ni// klu dang gnod sbyin tshogs bskor ba'i// thams cad rdzogs par bsam byar bya// rang bzhin rgyal po bkug la bstim// sku bstod khwa dang
344b4(rgyud 'grel): 'ug pa dang // gcan zan 'jig tshogs spro bar bya// rkyed par gnod spyi 'jigs pa'i gzugs// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa spro// sgo smad seng ge'i la sogs pa/ gcan zan 'jigs pa'i tshogs su spro// de dag gzugs kyi bsgrub bya dang // bgegs
344b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshogs rnams bkug byas te// gong gi ling gA bstim pa dang // na mkha'i bum bur gtubs nas ni// gnod sbyin rgyal po'i zhal du dbul// dug dang khrag la sogs pa ni// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig par// gong gis rdzas rnams dbul bar bya//
344b6(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra bai ru ka ku be ra ma hA yak+Sha rA dza/ che ge mo e na la ha na sarba duSh+Ti na sarba b+hasmi ku ru che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ngas ni sbyin sreg dbul bar bya// gnod sbyin rgyal po'i phyag rgya yis// stong phrag cig tu bsreg par bya'o// thal ba lan tshe ske tshe dang /
345a1(rgyud 'grel): dug dang khrigs spras nas ni// bslab bya'i gzugs ni khru gang tshang // legs par byas pa'i snying kha ru// 'khor lo'i rtsibs ni bcu gnyis pa// 'khor lo ra'i yi lte bar ni// hUM gnyis bA du ming bkod de// de yi lte ba'i mu khyud
345a2(rgyud 'grel): la// yi ge bcu gsum dgod par bya// phyi rol rtsibs ni bcu gnyis la// badz+ra bai ru Da ka ma hA yak+Sha ku be ra/ yi ge de la bsgrub bya dang / bsad pa'i yi ge gda' bya zhing // mchod pa snying khar gdags par bya// dug la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis//
345a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la legs par byug par bya// de yi steng du rdo leb la// rdo rje rgya gram bris nas ni// ling ga'i snying khar gzhugs par bya// de yi steng du mchod rten ni// sngon po khru gang tshad du brtsig/ bum par rgyal po chen po yis// bsad pa'i sngags ni bris
345a4(rgyud 'grel): te gzhug/ slob dpon chen po 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa'i rnam thos sras kyi drag byed kyi cho ga rdzog s+ho// rgya gar dbus kyi paN+Di ta chen po te tsa de ba dang bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//
345a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ yak+Sha rA dza sA d+ha ni// bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabs// dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam ngag ye shes dngos rang bzhin// skyob pa'i stobs chen la phyag 'tshal// bstan pa dam po'i gnas
345a6(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba'i / de yi dgos pa bsgrub pa'i phyir// gnod sbyin kun bdag sgrub thabs bri// de la dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i// gnas su sdig bshags lan chags sbyangs// de nas phan gnod gang gi las kyang grub cing bdag gir sgrub ste/ stegs
345b1(rgyud 'grel): bu khru gang ba la rin chen gzhal yas khang bris te/ de ru rgyal po sku dmar nag/ g.yas pa na mdung dmar ram/ dbyug to g.yon pa dbyig gi rkyal ba// dbu cod pan gyi dbus na rin po che yod pa/ seng ge'i dang spyan gyi gdan la bzhugs pa/
345b2(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i phreng bas phyag dang zhabs brgyan pa/ g.yas kyi dpung rgyan rin po che dang seng thos kyis rgyan pa'o// g.yas g.yon du dung sa rna buM rna rna gsum/ rna ba che ser ljang dmar ljang / ljang nag/ dkar ljang gsus pa ldir ba mdung dmar dang rgyal
345b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan dang mdung dang dbyig tho bcas pa dang ne'u le'o// mdun du yum rgyal po dang 'thun pa la phyag g.yas pa bum pa/ g.yon brkyang bskam mo// de lta bu'i legs par bris pa bzhugs par bya'o// de la dar ser po'i 'ogi gdugs dar dmar po'i yol ba/
345b4(rgyud 'grel): dkar po'i rgyal mtshan ljang khu dang mthing khro'i ru mtshon blo bar bya'o// spros dang me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa dgram par bya'o// de nas dri dang ldan pa'i steng du mchod yon dang me tog dang / spos dang mar me dang dri chub dang lha bshos khru gang ba
345b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig la sgrog ma gtsang ma la rtse mo la rtsi kra ka dang / snying zho sha/ de'i 'og tu chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan/ de'i 'og tu rin po che sna lnga/ spos lnga za 'ig dang dar swA dang stag ras dang bso'i me long de'i steng du bu mar dang sman sna tshogs dang mar dang
345b6(rgyud 'grel): thung dang luge dang galag snying dang // dkor cha rnams kyis brgyan te thad du gzhag/ de'i rtsa ro chad la rin po che dang ldan par bya'o// de nas byang du kha bltas te stan la 'dug la/ bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje'i sku gsung thug su bskyed do// mchod pa rnam
346a1(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab te/ spros la sogs pa rang rang gi sngags kyis rgya che bar byin gyis brlab bo// rten gyi dkor cha sogs yongasu gyur pa las rten rnams mang zhing mdzes par bya'o// cha a yongs su gyur pa las bdud
346a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsir bya'o// de nas rang gi mchod pa dang bstod pa yan chad yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// de nas nyams dag la nyid kyis chos skyong ba mnyes par bya ba'i phyir bsnyen pa byas te/ de la 'jug pa ni/ oM sarba de wa da la ye dzaHhUM baM hoHe ma ho
346a3(rgyud 'grel): sa na kaM ga nan ta pa ka ra sle dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya swA hA/ mchod pa'i dus su gdog so zhes brjod pa'i don no// thugs ka'o hUM las brjod pa'i nyi zer ltar 'thon nas rgyal po'i thugs kar thim pa bas// des chos skyong ba'i thugs sngon
346a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du g.yos nas gdan seng ge'i shugs kyis rin po 'i khang pa dang nyid la so sor thim par bsams te stong brjod do// dang nas mchod pa dbul te rtsa ba'i sngags sbyar ba dang bcas pas dbul te/ oM ni ri s+t+waM hUM khaM zhel
346a5(rgyud 'grel): du'o// badz+ra puSh+pe hUM swA hA/ me tog spyi byor ro// oM badz+ra d+hU be hUM swA hA/ dri thugs ka ro// oM badz+ra dI pe hUM swA hA mar me mdun du'o// oM badz+ra gan d+he hUM swA hA/ dri chab mdun du'o// oM badz+ra nai bai te hUM swAhA/ lU bshos phyag rgya'o// dkor tshe dang
346a6(rgyud 'grel): thogs te sngags kyi tshig brjod/ rang gi lus zhing gi rdul snyed du sprul te nyes pa ma lus pa dang bas ma thol zhing rdzas gcig kyang 'jig rten gang bar sprul te/ nyes pa byang zhing rjesu 'thun pa'i tshigis gsol ba gad po// de nas
346b1(rgyud 'grel): bstod cing bskul ba ni/ sngon tshe gsang bdag spyan snga ru// dam chos bsrung bar zhal bzhe sa bzhin// sku gsung thugs kyi gdung 'tshob pa'i// sems bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i// gnod pa'i bar tshad mang po rnams// stobs ldan rgyal chen
346b2(rgyud 'grel): yab yum dang // gnod sbyin pho mo sde brgyad bcos// bstan pa bsrung bar gnyer gtad bzhin// rdzu 'phrul bye ba sna tshogs kyis / gnod pa thams cad rdul du lhogs// dam bcas las la ma brtson na// sangs rgyas kun gyis sems gyur pa'i
346b3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi byang sems gnyen por 'gyur// de dran byos la las rnams kyis zhes brjod la// dam tshig rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bdud rtsi zhal du dbul lo// de nas dgongs sngags zhal du thim pas nyid kyis dam tshig de thugs ka nas phyung la
346b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag la thim pas rgyal po dang dbyer med par bsgom pas brtan par bya'o// mchod pa rnams stong dam lnga stong zhing dbulo// de ltar byas pas nyes pa byang pa'i rtags rim par 'byung ste// 'khru ba dang / bkur ba dang dbang bskur ba dang / sems
346b5(rgyud 'grel): la dogs pa med pa la sogs pa 'byung ngo // de ltar 'bum tsho gcig bzlas par bya'o// de de la yid brten pa dang / chang gi nang du sha dang bdud rtsi dang ma rta dngas ma'i khrag blugs la sgrub par bya ste// nye bar dgug pa la na mo rad na tra ya yA/ nA
346b6(rgyud 'grel): mo bAM sha ra ma na ye ma hA yak+Sha dku be pa ra mArta ni dzaHdzaHdza hi dza hi zhes brjod pa'i don ni bdag la rgyal po bstims la/ 'khor gnod sbyin po mo sde brgyad khugs par bkug la drang / rgyal po yang mdun bzhugs te 'khor dang bcas pa'i
347a1(rgyud 'grel): dkrug pa gnyis ni bsnyen pa'i nyams las rigs par bya'o// dgongs pa ni sngags nyid dgug bya'i sgrog yin pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir 'khol lo phreng ba lta bu so sor bstim par rab tu dang pas mang po dbul zhing gus pas bdag
347a2(rgyud 'grel): gir gyur pa'i rtse gcig pa'i bsam gtan gyis bzlas te/ de la mya brten na nus pa 'ga' byung yang dbang du mi 'gyu ro// mchod pa sngags dang sdom la la dbu lo// bzlas pa drug 'bum du bya'o// rtags rab sku 'byung ba dang / 'brings dang bar snang la sgra
347a3(rgyud 'grel): dang 'od 'byung // tha ma dmag tshogs dang 'gro ba la dbang byed pa'o// tsheng 'phrul ni tha dad do// phan pa ni bzlas pa 'di rdzogs pa dang rdzas ci 'byor pa phul la gshegasu gsol// rdzas ri rtse la bskyalo// dus kyi mchod pa bya'o// des ni chang pa dang bral
347a4(rgyud 'grel): bar chad pas gnod pa'i byor pa ni sbyor ba'i rim pa nus pa rdzogs pa dang // khru gang ba'i 'byung khung gyen thur du phyed phyed brtsig/ gcig byung la ri khya phag gi bris pa dur khrod kyi sol bas byugaso la/ de'i nang du 'bru sna lnga'i ling ga byas la ming
347a5(rgyud 'grel): rus pa ma chad pa'i rgyu gro ga la bris la snying khang bcug la/ ma ra gas gdab sha'i gtor ma dang / rag ta dang bdud rtsi dang lha bshos drug gsum mthing nA go/ a nu ru ki pi khi ha sA ru pa na khA hi/ ku ba ra tsan tra khA hai/ de ku pa ra ma ta khA hi zhes
347a6(rgyud 'grel): dbul zhing btab bo// de nas khrag gsum dang tsha ba gsum dang pad+ma'i sha khrag la thun sngags la/ dun dun mugs shing ha la ha laM/ tsa la tsa la/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ho hi/ rbad na rbang na/ rnang pu li rAng/ me sha ya mA ra ya mA ra ya phaT/ zhes zhag bdun par
347b1(rgyud 'grel): du ma chang par rdog// tha ma po tshon dang gres btub cing brdung ngo // de'i don ni rlung la sngags zhon nas srog gi gnas su thim pas sems 'khrul nas/ gnod sbyin po mos sna tshogs bcud bsreg cing bzhib par bya'o// de nas gzugs kyang mchod par
347b2(rgyud 'grel): dbul zhing bstabs la gtor ma dug bor du phang bar bya'o// de nas mchod pa'i ring lus kyis bshags pa phul la gshegasu gsol// las rjes snang ba med par bya/ 'grub na ming dang rjes la btab pa 'byung ngo // rgyun du mchod cing bsnyen pa
347b3(rgyud 'grel): byas na ci yang 'grub nges pas dral bar mi gnas so// rnal 'byor dge sbyong brtan pa yi// dngos grub brtan pa'i rgyas bstan phyir// stobs ldan rgyal chen nyer sgrub byas// mi thun kun gyi gnyen por shog/ rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi gsang ba'i
347b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs sngon po dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzog s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA rA dza ku bai ra sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ rgyal po chen po lus ngan po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ ngas sos rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// dang por snod
347b5(rgyud 'grel): ljon gang zag gis// gnas rnams shin tu dben pa ru// rdo rje 'chang ba bsgrub par bya// de nas las rnams myur 'dod nas// bka' yi pho nya bsgrub par bya// de yang rang rgyud dag dang ni// gtso bo 'khor du gnas pa'o// thabs ni chog
347b6(rgyud 'grel): bsags tshad med bsgom// bsrung ba stong nyid dang nas byA/ pad+ma'i gdan steng hU~M las ni mchod rten la ni sku bskyed do// ljang gus la gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas na mchod rten gdug pa sel// g.yon na nor ldan me'u le 'dzin//
348a1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gnas pa spyan drangs la// dbang sgyur byin brlabs tshul bzhin bya// mchod pa rnam lnga phul nas ni// bstod pa 'di dag brjod par bya// bstan bsrungs rgyal po chen po ni// mchod rten gyis ni don rnams bsgrub// rin chen
348a2(rgyud 'grel): ne'u le bsnams nas ni// dgos 'dod ster ba'i ljang khu bstod// bskyed rims rdzogs nas bzlas pa bya// sems dpa' sum brtseg ldan pa la// 'od zer spro bsdu 'khor lo'i tshul// sgrub pa'i dusu spro bsdu spang // dgug sogs man ngag bzhin
348a3(rgyud 'grel): du byad/ rtags ma byung bar 'phro mi sacad/ sngags ni oM nI laM ba ra d+ha ro badz+ra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT/ oM baM shra nA ma ye yak+Sha d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ a mu kaM mA ra ya phaT/ dam tshig brtan zhing gter mo sbyin// de nas rang rgyud sgrub 'dod na// gtso bo 'khor du ba
348a4(rgyud 'grel): ba yang // tshogs bsags la sogs gong ma ltar// 'khor lo chen po'i lte bar gtso// mdun du rgyal po bskyed par bya// bka' sgo la sogs las dang sbyar// dgug dang bsang la sogs pa yi// bsgrub pa ci rigs shes bya ste// 'khrul
348a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sbyor ba dag tu shes// rnal 'byor sgrub par byed 'dod na// gnod sbyin g.yas su bskyed byas la bka' bsgo rgyal pos bya bar rigs// klu rgyal g.yon du bkol ba'i phyir// bde gshegs sprul pa sgrub 'dod na// mdun nam g.yon du
348a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la/ ni cho ga gsum mam skad cig las// sku mdog dkar po sbrul zhags can// de 'dri'o klu rgyal spyan drangs bstim// mchod bstod gang 'dod bzlas pa bya// dam la ma thogs klu rnams ni// sgrub pa pi la bar chod byed// dang po zhi bas
348b1(rgyud 'grel): gdul bar bya// mnyan drag po'i las rnams brtsam// bsad na dngo su gzugs brnyan gzhug/ dgug la bsang sngags shes par bya// khro bo 'am yang na mchod cha yis// lus rnams gtub cing bsad par bya// yang na sbyin sreg rnams kyang bya// 2
348b2(rgyud 'grel): na 'khrul 'khor sbyor bar bya// yang nu ma mo rnams kyang bskul// gnod na gro ga rnams la ni gzugs bri 'od zer rnams kyis dgug/ de nas zhing chen nang du gzhug/ kha dag pa mtshon bcing thal bas dgang // yang na po bong dug la sogs// gong
348b3(rgyud 'grel): ma bzhin du shes par bya// bskrad sogs gzhan yang man dgu sbyar// rgyal po chen po lhas ngan po'i bsgrub thabs/ grub pa brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po dpa' bo rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / smra ba chen po rgyal ba'i snyan
348b4(rgyud 'grel): legs par zhus zhing / bstan bcos kyi skad rung zad shes pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du legs par bsgyur ba'o// sa steng nyi zla ltar gyur gcig/
348b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bai shra pA Ni sA d+hA naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnam thos sras kyi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mang // 'gro ba kun gyi don gzigs nas// drang srong
348b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam meng thos pa dang // lha mi dpal tshul bcing ma yo// sras su ni lam btab pa yis// 'gro ba'i bsem pa yongs rdzogs mdzod// lha rnams 'byor po'i 'dod pa yis lha rnams kyis ni phyag byas pa'i// bcom ldan lha'i lha zhes
349a1(rgyud 'grel): bstod// de'i bsgrub thabs brtsam par bya// bum las skyed pa'i 'khor lo las// drod mtha' nga ro lnga pas brgyan// steng du rjes 'jug dbyangs dang ldan// 'od zer 'phro 'dus 'gro don mdzad pa yi// rang gi phyag mtshan las skyes
349a2(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo ni// phyag na rdo rje ljang ser 'gying bcas bri// bsod nams tshogs bdun dam stong nyid las// skyes pa'i rang sku gsung thugs po bo// ye shes sems dpa' gzhug dang dbang bskur dang // gnas gsum byin brlabs dbang drug rdo rje oM
349a3(rgyud 'grel): dril bu rgyan rnams bcu dang ldan// 'od zer spro bsdus khams gsum ltar bskyed nas// gsal byed oM dang chu'i yi ge dang / gsum pa me'i bu dang yang dag ldan// lnga pa'i thog ma bzhi pa'i tha ma nA// nga ro bzhi pa yis ni mnan pa la/ gtum po chen po
349a4(rgyud 'grel): rungs tshigs mnan// hUM gnyis phaT dang ldan pa'i sngags kyis ni// duso rnams kun tu gtso bo'i thugs kar bkor// rgyun mi 'chad par rtse gcig yid kyi bzlas// de'i mdun du b+h+rUM las ni// rin chen khang pa brtsegs pa bsgom// shar du shel
349a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis ka bas brgyan// lho ru rin chen bai DUr+ya// nub tu pad+ma ra ga ste// byang du gser gyi ka ba mdzes// zur bzhi rim gsum khang brtsegs dgu// dbus ma'i pho brang sum rtseg ni// rtse mo rin chen nor bu bzang // rnam pa bcu yis spras pa po//
349a6(rgyud 'grel): de dbus 'jigs byed yi gaM las// seng ge'i stan la logs bzhugs pa/ ngal so dge ba'i lag pa na// g.yas na rin chen rgyal mtshan 'dzin// g.yon na gter gyi ne'u le bsnam// rin chen cod pan rna rgyan dang // mgul brgyan no ngo shal dang da pung
349b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyun dang ni las gdub cas/ ska rags phreng ba do shal can// nying lag rgyun gyis rnam par mdzes// gsus khyim che ba skyil krungs bzhugs// bum pa bzang po rnam brgyud dang // dpag bsam shing dang rin chen shing // rdzid bu bzang po brgyan
349b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa// yid bzhin nor bu'i ra bas bskor// de'i dbus na mgon po ni// na mkha' mdzod kyis ting 'dzin gyis// rin chen bdun gyi char pa 'bebs// de nas rgyal po spyan drangs te// mgon po kun gshegs thugs rje can// da lta snyigs
349b3(rgyud 'grel): ma lha'i dus thams cad nyon mongs 'dam bying bar// gzigs shing gshegs pa'i gnas ngan yang // shAkya seng ge'i spyan sngar khyed// thugs dam gang bzhes de dgongs la// 'dren pa'i snyan pa bsrung ba dang // sems can kun la phan
349b4(rgyud 'grel): smad dud/ byang phyogs gnas na bzhugs pa rnams// sems can don phyir gshegasu gsol// spyan drangs nus ni mchod pa dbul// dbang bskur nas ni nAm bza' gasnol// rin chen bdun dang bkra shis brgyud// phyag tu phul la
349b5(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub blang // bza' btung 'dod yon la sogs pa// rtag rten lha laM dbul bar bgyi// snying po chu'i yi ge la// dbyangs yig bcu gnyis pa yis brgyan// mig btsums sumA cu rtsa gnyis bsring // nye bo'i snying po ni//
349b6(rgyud 'grel): oM bai shra ba na ye swA hA/ 'bum phrag gcig gis mkha' la g.yo// 'bum phrag gnyis kyis sa rnams g.yo// 'bum phrag gsum gyis phyogs rnams bsregs/ 'bum phrag bzhi yis bza' btung 'thob// 'bum phrag lnga
350a1(rgyud 'grel): yis nor dang ldan// 'bum phrag drug gis 'khor mang snyed// 'bum phrag bdun gyis rigs rgyud 'phel// 'bum phrag brgyad kyi tshe 'phel zhing // dgus ni bcud len sman rnams rnyed// bcu yis mngon par shes pa 'thob//
350a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol che bzod par gsol// smon lam gdab cing 'phrin las btso la// yang phyis 'byon par gsol ba gdab// sna tshogs rab tu sgrub rgyud dang / gir mkhan mchog gis rgyud las ni// phan pa'i yan lag
350a3(rgyud 'grel): gces pa bsdus// 'gro kun gnas srung thob par shog/ slob dpon shu ram ga bar mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / paN+Di ta te dza da po dang lo ts+tsha ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// dang por bdag
350a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid yi dam gyi lhar bskyed la// bcom ldan 'das rnam thos sras seng ge la bcibs pa/ mdog ser po lag na rin po che'i rgyul mtshan 'bar ba thogs pa/ gnod sbyin gyi bdag po brgyad kyis po skor ba/ mdun na rmugs 'dzin
350a5(rgyud 'grel): rin po che thogs pa ser po// g.yas su geng pa bzang po bum pa thogs pa ser po// rgyab tu nor bu bzang po rin po chen po 'bar ba thogs pa dkar po// g.yon du rta bdag ku be ra lag nA ral gri thogs pa nag po gos sngon po can/
350a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bzhir yang dag shes ser po lag na ral gri thogs pa/ 'brog gnas lag na mdung thogs pa nag po// lnga rtsen ser skya la ga na khang bu brtsegs pa bsnams pa/ tsi pi kun d+ha li lag na ral gri dang phub thogs pa dkar po/
350b1(rgyud 'grel): de rnams rta la bcibs pa/ 'khor bye ba bye bas bskor ba lag nA mtshon cha phya ra ba bsams te/ gu gul gyi dud pa 'am/ 'bras kyi phye'i dud pa gtang la/ dung dang rnga brdungs te spyan drang par bya'o// oM bai shra ba Na sa pa ri ba ra badz+ras sam
350b2(rgyud 'grel): ya dzaHhUM baM hoHoM bai swA hA/ de mdun du byon pa'i rtags snying 'dar ba dang mag sprad pa dang grogs la babs pa dang / mthong ba na 'dug pa dang / me tog dang / gtor ma byin la/ 'phrin las bcol nas/ gshegs su gsol bar
350b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// sgrol ma'i phyag rgya bcas la/ oM swa b+ha ba bi shud d+haHsarba d+ha rmA swa b+hA ba bi shud d+ho haM zhes brjod pas stong par bsam/ de la gtor ma'i snod rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam bsams la/ de'i
350b4(rgyud 'grel): nang du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya pa bsams te/ oM AM hUM/ gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la/ oM A ka ro zhes bya ba'i sngags lan bdun bzlas la/ kha dog bzang po'i 'od kyis bcus par bsams par bya'o// de la bsngo
350b5(rgyud 'grel): bani/ oM bai shra ba nA ye swAhA/ oM dzaM b+hA lA ye swA hU~M/ oM pur+yA b+hA dza ye swA hA/ oM ma Ni b+ha dra ye swA hA/ A~M ku be rA yai swAhA/ oM sa~M pyA dza na ye swAhA/ oM gu ha tA nA ye swAhA/ oM pa na tse kA ye swAhA/ oM tsi hri~M
350b6(rgyud 'grel): kun DA lI ye swA hA/ de rnams la zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi 'phrin las bcol la// snying kha'i lcags kyu dkyil/ oM baM zhes yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshad du gdoni/ ner b+ha ra tsa na bsreg pa bsreg bar bar du gtor ma rgya chen po gtang / bai
351a1(rgyud 'grel): ba na ba'i rtog pa rdzogs s+ho// / bstod pa ni byang phyogs sbyong ba'i rgyal chen rnam thos skyes// gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol// 'jig rten skyong bya glags dang ldan// sra bo che la stobs pa/
351a2(rgyud 'grel): tshe pha rol dgra rnams 'joms bar byed// gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan// bdag nyid chen po de dag la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// byang
351a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs skyong ba'i rgyal chen rnam thos sras// phyag na rdo rje'i bka' nyan dam tshig can// rig pas byin brlabs na mkha'i mthes klas pa'i// 'dod yon lnga bcas gtor ma phul ba bzhes// sras dang btsun mo gnyen dang dmag dpung bcas//
351a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag dgongs shing 'gro bar gyur nas kyang // sngon gyi thugs dam 'phrin las ma bsnyel bar// bdag gi 'phrin las 'bras bu mdzod// / dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gsang ba bshad par bya// zla ba
351a5(rgyud 'grel): yar ngo'i bcwa lnga la// dam tshig ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// thun mong ma yin mchod pa ste// gang gis bdug pa tsam gyis ni// dngos grub myur du thob byed pa'i// sgrub bos bdug spos bdug pa ni// brtul shugs 'dzin pas 'di ltar bya/ 'bras
351a6(rgyud 'grel): dkar btags pa'i phye ma ni// sardze ra rdza dag dang ni// ga pur tsAn dkar dmar dang // cha ma nyams nas ni de dag bsres// a ka ru nag gis bsgos nas// 'be ti dkar mo'i char rgyan gyis// rnam par spras nas rab sngags te// rtsa ba'i rig pa
351b1(rgyud 'grel): gang de la/ dbab pa'i gsang sngags rab tu sbyar// stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni// dngos grub phyir ni rdzas de yis// de nas mkhas pas ri lu bya// gang zhig mchod pa'i dus su ni// sems kyi dbang phyug ting 'dzin gyis// rnam par sbyangs pa'i sa
351b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhi la rten sogs dgram par byas nas ni// tsho gas gter bdag mdun bkug nas// rdo rje can gyi bdug pa dbul// ser sgo mdzes pa'i snod du ni// tsan dan la sogs 'dag me la// sngar bshad pa'i ri lu bsreg/ des ni rten la 'dus par bya//
351b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor des skyob pa mnyes gyur nas/ gter rnams de'i mod la ster// gal te de ltar ma gyur na// gter bdag nyams par gdon mi za// 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste// gsang ba'i gnas su spyad par bya// bdug spos kyi sbyor ba'o// de nas dam tshig
351b4(rgyud 'grel): bshad bya ba// rtug par khrus dang gtsang sbra bya// rgyal dril la sogs rol mo'i sgra// tsAn+do gA ma tos rje ldan dang // sna tshogs 'bru'i chan dang bshos// mdzes pa'i ngar snas btags mchod bya// chang rnams dbul bar mi bya ste// sha ni brtags te dbul bar
351b5(rgyud 'grel): bya rtag tu sngon po'i gos 'chang zhing // lung thang 'bras bu'i bgrang phreng bgrang // myur 'gro sha ya bza' ba spang // nyams shing chag pa'i snod mi bza'// rtsub cing nag po'i stan mi 'dug/ gza' bral mas bstab bza' btung
351b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams rnam pa kun du mi spyad do// srog bral ba la reg pa spang / bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig go// de nas rten ni bshad par bya/ byi nang gsang ba'i bye brag gis// gter bdag rten pa'i rten yang ni// rnam pa gsum du mkhas
352a1(rgyud 'grel): pas brtag/ phyi rten rgya mchog rab sngol// mdzes pa'i rgyan brtags mgon la dmigs// rtag tu yang ni banang bar bya// yang na gzugs legs rab tu 'azung // gsang rten gro ga'i shun sogs la// kur kum dri bzangs rab
352a2(rgyud 'grel): ser bas// bAM yig bris la sngags kyis bskor// rin chen dang bcas rin chen gzugs// 'bru mchog btags nas bsnos byas la/ mkhas pas byas te snying po gzhug/ tshon byugs nas ni mdun bzhag go// gnyis pa bram ze'i rig dag
352a3(rgyud 'grel): gam// gzhon nu ma yis legs bkal ba'i// ras la dri yis rab bskor nas// gter bdag sku mdog phyag char ldan lags nas 'byung ba'i rim pa yis// dam tshig ldan pas myur bris la// phyi rol shing sogs rgyan gyis mdzes//
352a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags rigs pas ni mdun dgram bya// rten gzugs pa'i rim pa'o// de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste// sgrub po gsang med po phyogs ltas te/ gtor ma'ang de nyid phyogs byin// gsang rten ne'u le'i glu dbur gzhug/ sngon dmar kha spro rgyun
352a5(rgyud 'grel): 'chang zhing // 'bras sogs 'bru rnams 'dor gzhug bya// gzhan gyis mthong na dngos grub nyams// gtor sgrib pa la gsang ba shes// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// namakha'i mdzod la rnam par rol// rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi rtog pa
352a6(rgyud 'grel): bde byed kyi cho ga sna tshogs pa'i mdzod ces bya ba rdzogas+ho// pan+di ta te dza de ba dang / lots+tsha ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//
353a1(rgyud 'grel): chos skyong ba'i rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la bstod pa bzhug s+ho// /
353b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA rA dzA d+harmA mA la b+h+rUM shra ba Na stod tra/ bod skad du/ chos skyong ba'i rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la stod pa// dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang phyug chen po 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha// bskal pa
353b2(rgyud 'grel): mang por rgyal ba'i lam sgrubs nas// srid shing drung phyung nyes brgya rtsad bcad de// 'jig rten 'das pa'i phun tshogs kun brnyes kyang // smon lam stobs kyis gnod sbyin tshul 'dzin pa// / drang srong rnam mdo thos pa sras gyur nas//
353b3(rgyud 'grel): phongs pa'i ngal bso dbul ba dbugs 'byin pa// stobs tshan rgyal ba'i sras la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dbang drang srong tshogs dang grub pa dang // 'jig rten mes po seng ge 'phyog byed dang // snang byed la sogs lha tshogs thams cad
353b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang // 'jig rten bla ma khyod zhabs rtag tu bdud// lha yul dang ni sa stengs thams cad tu// lha'i lha khyod bstod pa mang mod kyang // bdag kyang mgon po khyod la klas pa yis// yon tan phyogs tsam bstod cing gsol 'debs na// gzhan
353b5(rgyud 'grel): don lhur len sbyo la med pa yi// sgrib med ye shes snyun gyis gsan du gsol// gnas rabs lcang lo can gyi pho brang na// rgyal chen rnam thos sras de gser gyi mdog/ dpal ldan rnam mang gtor tshogs zu sa pa ga/ thub mchog bsdu
353b6(rgyud 'grel): ba skyong la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod sku gser sogs rin chen rgyan gyis phyog// bzhin 'dzum spyan tsu Tag 'dra ga// seng ge'i gdan bzhugs mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs// lazi brjid mtha' yas sku la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs la
354a1(rgyud 'grel): dang sdug bsngal bud shing rnams// drang srong mchog gi sngags kyis sreg par byed/ theg chen gsung rab seng ge'i sgra dbyangs sgrogs// bdag med gnyis ston gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// lta ba ngan pa'i khri shing dra ba rnams// dri med ye
354a2(rgyud 'grel): shes blo gros rdo rje yis// spros pa kun bcang shes bya kun rtogs pa'i// chags thogs mi mnga'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin dbang po'i phyag gong g.yas g.yon no// thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i 'od shar bas// 'jig rten gsum
354a3(rgyud 'grel): dang dus gsum sa ler gzigs// shes rab spyan ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal srid 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbu rgyan mtho// thams cad zil gnon mdzes pa'i dar dbyangs 'dzin// yon tan rgyas mdzad na bza' ser khwa gsol// chos kyi
354a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal srid brnyes la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag yas rin chen dbyug pas dbul ba 'joms// dgos pa kun bsgrib g.yo ne'u le 'dzin// spyi gtsug nor bus nor gyi char 'bebs pa// dpal ldan bkra shis khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten
354a5(rgyud 'grel): 'as kyapara'ajig rten tshul ston pa// gnod sbyin dbang po 'khor lo sgyur ba'i gzugs// ting 'dzin na mkha'i mdzod kyis 'gro ba kun// ci 'dod ro bskod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba gcig kyang yel bar mi 'dor mod // nad kyis nyen pa'i bu sdug ma
354a6(rgyud 'grel): dman la rjes brtsi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster// phongs po bzlog mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sring na bdag cag nyon mongs chom rkun gyis// bcom nas 'phags nor phrogs te sdug bsngal ba// mgon po khyod dran tsam gyis ni
354b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa/ pha rol dpung 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam myang yon tan ldan pa'i sras rnams dang // pheM nya las mkhan sprulta pa'i tshogs rnams no// sna tshogs gzugs ldan sna tshogs mtshan ma 'dzin// sna tshogs 'phrin las mdzad la/
354b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po yon tan dran tsam gyis mnyes pa// khyod ltar gzhan la brtse ba 'di na med// de phyir bsod nams mi ldan rab bkren pa// bdag gis sgo gsum spyod pa gzhan spangs nas// bcom ldan 'bad pa'i sgo nas btsal
354b3(rgyud 'grel): btsal nas// sgo gsum dang bas rtag tu dran byed cing // mchod pa sbyar bas lus kyang dus pa dang // rtag par dag tu khyod sngags brtson par zlas// skad cig kyang ni khyod su brjed mi 'gyur// sdom gnas dam tshig tshogs dang 'gal
354b4(rgyud 'grel): ma bgyis// de ltar byang chub grogs su khyod bsten na// tshe rabs kun du thugs rjes bzung du gsol// bdag bkren 'bad pas mchod pa bshams byas pas// bdag gi don slad 'di dag mi bezhes sam// mgon po'i thugs dang
354b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gal ba bshags bgyid na// thugs rje can khyod tshad pa mi stsol lam// kho bo dbul phongs sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa// pad ltar yangs pa'i spyan gyis mi gzigs sam// phongs pas 'o dod 'bod cing gsol 'debs na/
354b6(rgyud 'grel): kun mkhyen sgrib med snyan gyis mi gsan nam// bdag gdong mtshams g.yogs shing sdug bsngal ba// brtser ljon shes rab spyan gyis mi gzigs sam// sdug bsngal sna tshogs me yis rgyud bsregs pa// sbron bral das/
355a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thugs kyis ma dgongs sam// bar chang bgegs dang dgra tshogs 'di dag kun// bde chen dpa' ba'i stobs kyis mi 'joms sam+b+ha// byang chub sgrub pa'i phyogs su gsol 'dabs na// thar lumA dren pa'i drid dpo
355a2(rgyud 'grel): mi mdzad dam// tshul bzhin bsgrubs kyang grub pa mi ster na// sngon gyi dam bcus blo de ma nyams sam// gal te mgon khyod tshe 'dir 'grub gyur pa 'i/ bdag la sngon gyi smon lam 'brel med pas// de phyir nyid kyis bdag la mi
355a3(rgyud 'grel): dgongs na// thugs rjes dgongs pa'i lha gzhan gang la smos// kye ma'o bcom ldan srid 'joms thugs rje yi// sprin chen mnga' ba khyod la rten gyur kyang // sdug phongs bzod dka'i tsha bas gdungs gyur kyang // zhi ma gyur na 'di
355a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyu ci zhig lags// sems can rnam pa sna tshogs gang dang gang // de kun sman sladade nor bu rin po che// sna tshogs gter gyi char pa 'bebs zhes kyang // phongs pa bdag la thigs tsam bab ma myong // nyi ma'i 'od dang lhan cig
355a5(rgyud 'grel): mun 'khyams bzhin// thugs rje'i bdag nyid mgon khyod brten bzhin du// sdug phongs me yis bdag gi rgyud gdungs na// khyod kyi thugs rje che ba gang du thal// 'jig rten skyong ba khyod zhal blto 'dod pas// 'khor bcas rtag
355a6(rgyud 'grel): bar mngon du bsgoms byas kyang // khyod sku phyogs gcig kyang ni mngon ma gyur// 'gro don mdzad pa'i sku mchog ming dam ci// bumi bzong yid bzhin nor dang dpag bsams shing // de dag gis kyang 'gro ba'i re skong na/
355b1(rgyud 'grel): la pa mang bar smrad spya pa// gzhan da rgyams n+ya dag d+hA la// jig rten skyong ba dbang phyug nam thos rba// da sa dag pa'i byas zhes/ da brnyan// das b+hasam+b+ha m+b+ham skad cig d+hAn pas kyang // sa bkun
355b2(rgyud 'grel): bod dpal rgyas 'gyur ni// bdag gis yun+ta ring khyod mtshan brjod byas kyang // mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras kyi thob ma gyur// gang tshe bdag cag 'dod ldan nyon myo swA bAHsa// de phyir khyod kyis grub pa ma~M stu na// nyon mongs pa
355b3(rgyud 'grel): tshe longs spyod ci zhig gos// kun mkhyen thob na gzhan la gsol ci 'tshal// gal te bdag mthus dbul phongs 'dor nus na// bcom ldan snyan la bzan bgyid mi rigs mod// bdag la yus med mgon khyod skyon bral bas//
355b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khrug med snying rje'i stobs la gsol ba 'debs// nad kyis dal gyur phongs pas sems brgyal nas// rmi lam tsam du mgon pos cing zhig bsten// rab tu skyo bas bla bcol 'di dag rdol// bcom ldan thugs rjes zhigs bas gzung
355b5(rgyud 'grel): du gsol// bdag cag rtsod ldan sems can skyon myang bas// skyon bral khyod la smra bar mi rigs kyang // skyabs su chags sdang bral dang mgon khyod la// nyams thag dus na 'bod cing gnas me mchos// brel zhing phongs
355b6(rgyud 'grel): pas cho ngas btab byas kyang // 'di na bdag lo gdong sdebs ga' ro ma mchis// sdug phongs dus na mgon po khyod 'bod na// sngon gyi dam bcas blo de rjes dran nas// ma byams bu sdug bzhin du 'dir gshegs la// mdzes pa'i
356a1(rgyud 'grel): sku mchog bdag la bstan du gsol// dbul phongs sdug bsngal nyes pa'i bud shing rnams// khyod sngags bzlas pa'i mes ni bsreg par mdzod// rtse gcig thugs rjes brtse gdung shugs phyung ste// nor gyi
356a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug gter gyi dngos grub stsol// bsod nams bar du gcod pa'i bgegs rnams dang // rnam par snang bas yog zhugs dgra tshogs kun// sde chen 'khor mang g.yog dang po nyar bcas// gnod sbyin dbang po'i stobs kyis bzlog tu gsol//
356a3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar mgon po nyes pa'i tshogs 'joms lnga// bstod cing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams des// gnod pa'i rkyen bral 'dod pa'i 'bras smin nas// khyod bzhin phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas thob shog/ chos skyong ba'i rgyal po rnam thos
356a4(rgyud 'grel): sras la bstod cing gnang nA bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa thugs rje'i ba 'jo zhes bya ba'i snyan sngags kyi phreng ba slob dpon nag po zhabs kyi mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho//
356a5(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di tA te dza de ba dang / lo tsA ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// /
357a1(rgyud 'grel): u tsu kya klub pa'i thabs thun tsha ma yin pa slo dpan med pa rdzu dpa ca pa/
357b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ u ts+ya sh+tsa sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'chol ba'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags pa 'dzam b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo// mi bskyod pa 'am tha mal snying khar ni/ A las zla stong nag po gser 'od can// las byung rdo rje rtse dku'i lte ba
357b2(rgyud 'grel): lar zla steng hUM gis 'od kyis lha spyan drangs// mchod pas mnyes te rang gi snying khar zhugs// tshad med bzhi dang byang chub sems bskyed la// rdo rje 'od kyis dngos kun lhar bsgyur thim// oM AHsa spyan drangs der bstim lhar gsal bya// pad ma nyi
357b3(rgyud 'grel): mar nor bdag rgyan spras pa// nor skyug mgo rkang gnon pa khro bo'i gzugs// mi bskyod dbu mdzes thod khrag ne'u le 'dzin// klus brgyan thugs khar zla ba sngar bzhin bsamo// dbu zhal dpung pa g.yon dang thugs kha dang // g.yas g.yon brla
357b4(rgyud 'grel): dang gsang gnas byin gnyis la// zla bar yi ge bcu pa gser 'od 'phro// 'od kyi mchod dong lhar bsgyur nor bsdus skyug/ lag mthil baM las gser bum rin chen skyug/ mdzub mo gung mo ming med mthe'u chung dang // mthe bong nor 'chang g.yas
357b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon yi ge bcu// oM in+d+ra ni mu khaM b+h+ra ma ri swA hA/ oM dz+wa luM swA hA/ rim bzhin byin gyis brlab dang dbul sngags so// phyag dang zhal dang gsang gnas nas phyag/ de nas zhal bu mar ser chu rgyun 'jug/ na mo rad na tra lA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha dra ya/
357b6(rgyud 'grel): ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ oM dza~M b+ha la dza len dra ye swA hA/ lo phyed thun drug chu phul 'byor chen 'grub// spogs na hUM mdzad khros pas dug khrag dang // tsha ba ske tshe mar khu byugs te skam// raM las khang par gru gsum me bsams dbus// sa 'am rngo
358a1(rgyud 'grel): las 'khyid gang sku gzugs bya// lha bstim thab khung gzhug ste mchod par bya/ rtsibs brgyad 'khor lor sku 'am sngags bris te// lha bstim dril te rin chen 'bar gzugs bcas// sna tshogs rgyun tu zhabs nas chu 'dzag pa'i// 'og tu
358a2(rgyud 'grel): lha sku ye shes bstim pa bzhugs// mal logs sngags sam sku bri ye shes gzhug/ gzugs brnyan snod nang 'char byas chu dbul lo// u tsu sh+ma sgrub pa'i thabs thun mong yin pa// slob dpon sgeg pa rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs ste//
358a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po da na shi las bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ u tsu sh+le dzaM b+ha la sA d+hA na nA ma/ bod skad du/ rmugs 'dzin 'tshol ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal ldan rmugs 'dzin 'chol pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
358a4(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig spyan gsum grags pa'i gtsug phud kyi// rgyan gyi nor bu la reg zhabs ldan pa// thub pa'i gzhon nu des ni thub dbang sras// rnams kyi phun tshogs mchog mong rgyas mdzad gyur// bla med yon tan gnyis med pa'i// rin chen grong khyer
358a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dren pa ste// 'gro ba rang gi phun tshogs la// myur du len 'dod 'di bsten bya// de la dang po re shig bdag gis dzam b+ha la mnyes par byas nas// sa rtogs pa'i de'i bdag nyid du gyur te// 'gro rnams mngon par mtho ba dang // nges par
358a6(rgyud 'grel): legs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o// zhes bya'i bsam pa dang ldan pas snying gi nang gis bu gar thig le dang bral ba'i yi ge A dkar po 'od zer 'phro ba de las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// der hUM yig da
358b1(rgyud 'grel): sngo ba phyi rol kun+da nas cung zad ser ba/ 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phro ba mgon gyen du bstan pa ste// de las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ kha dog dang bya ba hUM yig dang 'dra ba ste/ lte ba'i nang du son pa'i zla ba la gnas pa'i hUM de lta bu dang ldan pa bsgom par
358b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ de nas oM AHzhes bya ba'i sngags brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas hUM yig dang rdo rje dag las 'od zer 'phros te/ phyogs bcu nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i dzam b+ha la'i gzugs mtha' yas po rnams mar me blang ba'i tshul
358b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis spyan drangs nas mdun du de'i sku gcig tu rnam par bsgoms la 'od zer rnams kyis mchod pa lngas mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa nas btang snyoms kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o// de'i rje su hUM dang rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams la lus
358b4(rgyud 'grel): mtha' dag bstims la spros pa thams cad khrel ba nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyis rang bzhin zla ba dang / rdo rje dang / sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams la oM AHzhes bya ba 'di dang 'od zer spros pas bcom ldan 'ongs spyan drangs la gzhug par
358b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// gzhug pa'i mjug thogs su skad cig gis zla ba la sogs pa rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rmugs 'dzin 'chol pa gzhon nu lo lde lon pa lta bu/ mi'u thung gis rnam pa can/ sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i steng du nor
358b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin ser po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ zhal nas rin po che skyug cing gan rkyal du nyal ba'i dpral bar zhabs g.yas pa dang / rkang pa gnyis kyi steng du g.yon pas mnan pa/ g.yon brkyang gi gom stabs can/ gtsor
359a1(rgyud 'grel): bu rtags mdze gyen du 'greng ba/ gsus pa 'phyang ba thugs kar phyag yas na thod pa khrag gi bkang ba bsnams pa la g.yon du phyogs nas gzigs pa brla g.yon pa la brten pa'i phyag g.yon pas ne'u le kha nas 'og tu rin
359a2(rgyud 'grel): po che'i tshogs skyugs pa bsnams pa snyan ma bug cing gug pa zhal mche ba zla ba lta bu gtsigs pa// spyan dmar la zlum pa/ dpral ba'i dbyes su khro gnyer byas pa// dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'greng ba/ dbu la thub pa mi bskyod pa sngon pos
359a3(rgyud 'grel): gnon gyi phyag rgya can gyis rgyas btab pa/ mtha' ldan po tam la'i lo ma lta bus dbu skra bcings pa// 'jog po dmar pos rna ba dkris pa/ pad+ma chen po pad+ma'i rtsa bo ltar dkar bas do shal byas pa/ stobs kyi rgyu ljang khu dur ba lta bus tshangs skud byas
359a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ nor rgyas dkar pos ske rags byas pa/ pad+ma me tog kun d+ha ltar mdzes pas rkang gdub byas pa/ dung skyong ser pos lag gdub byas pa/ rigs ldan du ba'i mdog can khra bos dpung rgyan byas pa/ sku mdog sngon po 'od zer ser po'i tshogs 'phro
359a5(rgyud 'grel): ba bsgom nas dpral ba dang kha dang dpung pa g.yas g.yon dang snying kha dang rdo rje'i steng dang brla g.yas g.yon dang / zhabs g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i nang gis rtsa bu gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu rnams la// oM dzaM b+he la dza len dra ye swA hA zhes bya ba'i
359a6(rgyud 'grel): yi ge ser po rnams ni 'od ser po can du blta bar bya'o// de'i rjes la sna'i rlung phyir 'byung ba'i dus su oM yig la sogs pa'i 'od zer rnams dang / thugs kha'i hUM dang / rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams phyogs thams cad du spros te reg pa tsam gyis sems
359b1(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad kyi sems dang se/ mas las byung ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo bor gyur pa rnams rlung 'jug pa'i dus su hUM yig la bcug la sems brtan par byed pa yis brtan par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa rin po che sna tshogs
359b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyang klu dang ne'u le dang nor sbyin gyi kha rnamasu gzhug par bya'o// slar rlung 'byung bya na klu la sogs pa rnams kyis med pa'i rin po che rnams mdun du spyug par bsgom par bya'o// de ltar yang dang yang du spro ba dang bsdu ba la sogs pa byed do// de'i rjesu
359b3(rgyud 'grel): dal bar gyur na/ na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha dra ya ma hA yak+Sha sa nA pa ta ye/ oM dza b+ha la dza len dra ye swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags sam/ yang na gong gis sngags yi ge bcu pa bzlas par bya'o// chu sbyin pa'i dus su ni lag pa g.yas pa gan rkyal
359b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi dbus su bam yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis lag pa bum pa bzang po lta bur byas la/ lag pa'i rtsa bar+ya oM yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis gdubu'i rnam pa dang ldan pa dang / bam yig dbusu dzo ma dang mdzub mo dang gung mo dang ming med dang / mthe'u chung
359b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / mthe bong rnams kyi rtse mo la b+ha la dza len dra ye zhes bya ba'i yi ge rnams rim pa ji lta bar dang / oM dang baM yig dge bar du ya yig dang / ya yig gi g.yon dang g.yas ngos dag tu swA hA zhes bya ba'i yi ge dag ste/ oM yig la sogs pa 'od
359b6(rgyud 'grel): rnas rang rang gi gnas kyi bug rnams su zla ba la gnas pa ser po can du bsgoms nas/ lag pa'i nang du me tog chu dang bcas pa kha dang nye bar byas la/ oM in+d+ra ni mu khaM b+ha ma ri swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lan bdun du mngon par bsngags
360a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de'i rjes la lag pa brkyang bas sbyin par bya ba'i chu rang gi kha nas zhugs pa dza ma yig 'od zer rnams dang / thugs kar gnas pa'i rdo rje dang / hUM yig 'od zer rnams kyis kha dog ser po byas pa rdo rje'i kha nas
360a2(rgyud 'grel): thon nas lag pa g.yon pa skad cig gis bcom ldan 'dan la mngon du phyogs par bsgom pa 'am/ sku gzugs kyi zhal gyi nang du oM dz+nyA swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad dang / na mo rad na tra yA ya zhes bya ba la sogs kyi
360a3(rgyud 'grel): lan bdun du dbul bar bya'o// na mo rang na tra yA ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa lan gcig brjod pas 'bras rdos pa bu ram dang bsres pa la sogs po rnams kyi gtor ma bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o// de ltar ji ltar nus pa
360a4(rgyud 'grel): thun gsum mAm/ thun gcig la rjes su bsgrubs te/ bstod pa dang / smon lam gdab par bya'o// de'i rjes la bsgoms pa'i bcom ldan 'das oM badz+ra muHzhes bya bas gshegs gsol bar bya'o// gzhan yang sbyin drug
360a5(rgyud 'grel): gi zla ba dang dpyid zla ra ba dang / dpyid zla tha chungs dang / dbyar zla 'bring po rnams gang yang rung ba'i nya 'am dge ba'i nyi ma gzhan la yang rngo ma gas pa la skad cig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo bor bsgrubs te yang dag par mchid nas
360a6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// bzo bo bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa bzung bas nyin zhag gcig nyis la dpa' bo'i yon gyis sku gzugs byed du gzhug go/ byas pa la yang bdag nyid la bkod pa bzhin du rim pa ji lta bar bcom ldan
360b1(rgyud 'grel): 'das gzugs yi ge dgod pa dang bcas pa rnam par sgoms nas chu sbyin pa la sogs pas mnyes par bya'o// zhes bya ba ni man ngag go/ de'i tshe ni gshegasu gsol bar mi bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das sku gzugs kyi rnam par rtag tu bzhugs pa la bskur sti dang
360b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod par bya'o// paN+Di ta a b+hu ka ra gu btas mdzad pa'i u tsush+ma dzaM b+ho la sgrub pa'i thabs rdzog s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bar+t+ti ta a lang ka de ba dang // lo tsA ba shakyi'i dge slong tshul khrims 'byung gnas sbas pas/ chos 'khor shongs ma'i gtsug lag khang du
360b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur+ya te gtan la bab pa'o// slad kyis paN+Di tA ma hA baM b+hU tI tsin dra dang / tshigr-i lod+b+ha ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur tsong dag par bgyiso// // rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya dza b+hA la stod tra/ bod skadadu/ 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa// bcom
360b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das dzaM b+ha la la phyag 'tshalo// mchod sbyin brgya pa me lha gdong bzhi dang // seng ge 'phrog byed nyin mor byed rnams kyis// zhabs gnyis la btung bcom ldan sdug bsngal ba// bdag la pad ltar yangs pa'i spyan ras gzigs// bcom ldan chab
360b5(rgyud 'grel): khyikhyer gang gis mnyes 'gyur na// thugs rje mnga' ba gzhan gang lags pa gsungs// de phyir mchod pa bshams la mo rtsi zhing // khyod dang 'dra ba phal cher snyed pa dka'// brtse bas 'bad pa'i sgo nas btsal btsal nas// phongs par gyur pa dag la bde
360b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad nas/ kho bo mchi ma dag gis gdong sbags pa// spyan sngar mchis kyang ci ste gzigs ma lags// e ma ho rab tu rgyas pa thugs rje yi// gzu mo mnga' ga khyod lta bzhugs gyur kyang // skyo tshogs bzlog dkara' sdug bsngal chom rkun gyi// sde yis rnam par
361a1(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa ji ltar lags// sems can sman slad nor bu rin po che// rnam pa sna tshogs dgung 'char 'bebs grags na// kho bo khyod nyid gcig pu'i mthar thug pa// ci ste thigs spangs yang ni 'babs ma lags// khyod bzhugs bzhin du me yis 'bar bltar//
361a2(rgyud 'grel): kho bo phongs pas shin tu cher sreg nang // khyod kyi lta zhig thugs rje 'jo ba'i ba// sa gsum khur du khur ba gang du thal// bum pa dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi// nor bu sems pa dang ldan ma lags pa// de dag gis kyang sems can phan bgyid8// thugs rje'i/
361a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag can bcom ldan smos ci 'tshal/ gang zhig rmugs 'dzin chu yi bdag po zhes// skad cig kyang ni khyod kyi mtshan smos pa// de la pad+ma'i 'byung gnas legs bzhin du// pad rgyas dpal ni 'jug par bgyis pa lags// de ltar bcom lan sred 'jems khyod spya
361a4(rgyud 'grel): snga / chongs btab nas bsod nams 'byam klas pa// gang yang de yis skye bo khyod bzhin du// mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byin par shog/ bcom ldan 'das dzaM b+ha la bstod pa// slob dpon chen po btsun pa zla bas mdzad pa rdzogaste// ra gyi mkhan pa mI te/
361a5(rgyud 'grel): shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas/ bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tsha ba nyi ma grags kyis legs par bsgyur ba'o// // na mo u tsush+ma dzaM b+ha la ba oM A zhes bya bas spyan drangs la// rang gi snying khur A yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil khor gyi dbus su// de yig
361a6(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse dgu po de'i dbus su in+d+ra ga ba dang mnyam pa'i dza yig las/ sngar brjod pa'i spyan 'dren pa'i sngags kyis/ dzo b+ha la'i mgon po rang gis snying khar gzhug ste/ u rbu sh+ma byis pa'i gzug rnab ma phug pa/ sku mdog
361b1(rgyud 'grel): dus sug sa ga u gan b+h+ya/ na ldan rgyun // drug ga na sgyug pa ma dzin pa/ gams byas/ gags / ba da 'dzin pa// rdzogs su mastan par gyur/
361b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdog can/ rgyun sna tshogs kyis btsun pa'o// nor gter gan stsal du bsgyele baM/ zhabs gnyis kyis mnan pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba skrag pa'i bdag nyid las/ 'od zer gyi phreng ba'i tshogs 'phro bar bsam/ uts+tshu sh+ma ri phrug g.yas oM yig
361b3(rgyud 'grel): skyes skyes pa'i g-i d+ha'i// baM yig lus skyes pa'i bum pa bzang po dang 'dri ba 'gro bzhin po lhag pa'i dbus su dzA yig go// mdzub mo la bam+ba yig go// gung mo la la log go// sbyin lag la dzA yig go// ma chung la in yig go// ma
361b4(rgyud 'grel): bong la tra yig go// khrig ma la ya yon/ de nas swAn+d+ha yig go// 'di ni sngags pa'i rim pa'o// kha sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la chu spyor sbyin no// oM hU~M swAhA chu byor byin pa'i sngags so// oM a an+d+ra ya ni mu khaM b+h+ra ma ri swA hA/ yal
361b5(rgyud 'grel): bAnas khanas lag pa dben par sbyin no// 'di ltar snying rjes sems can thams cad phyongs pa'i snag bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i don pong stso la bsgom par bya'o// u tsa shrI dze b+ha la zhes bya ba'i sgrib thabs rgyal po a h+yem
361b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzog // dan grong dang ma grags kyis bsgyur ro//
362a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gags badrugs dzin tshal bdan pa sgru sa bcu /
362b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya Ats+tshany+dza dzam+b+ha la kri ShA sA d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin 'chol pa nag po'i sgrub thabs// rje btsun dzam+b+ha la'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal gyi dbang phyug dbang chen bcu gnas rinam
362b2(rgyud 'grel): chen rnam pa mang ldan pa// thabs mang stobs chen dri med thugs rje drang srong lha mo'i sras gyur de'i// sras gcig mtshungs med ma lus srid dang zhi ba'i nor bdag gtor chen ni// mi'u thung cha byad thod khrag ne le 'dzin mdzad khyod kyis bdag la
362b3(rgyud 'grel): bsrungs// re shi ge bsgrub pa po dam tshig can gzhan la phan par brtson pas 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la mi phyed pa'i dang ba thob pas skyabs su song la// pad ma'i mdab ma mchog gi snod dang // gnod sbyin mo kun tu rgyug gi lus ling
362b4(rgyud 'grel): ga chen po'i rdzas dang ldan pas nor bu brtsegs pa lta bu'i gnas su 'dug ste/ thog ma kho nar mi bskyod pa'i rgyal po'i cho gu ji lta po bzhin mnyes par bya'o// de'i 'og tu de'i nga rgyal gyis bdag dang gnas dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba byas
362b5(rgyud 'grel): la/ rang gi snying khar A las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa la gnas pa'i hUM yig nag po gser gyi mdangs can las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse dgu pa gyen du langs shing rnam par 'gyur ba'i ngang tshul can// dbus kyi ra rtse rnam par dkar
362b6(rgyud 'grel): bo nor bu'i to gri mtshan pa dang ra gzhan gnag cing kun nas dgrang pa'i bar byed pa de nyid kyi lte bar dri ma med pa la hUM yig bai DUr+ya'i 'od 'bar bas mtshan pa blta bar bya'o// yi ge de'i 'od kyis na mkha'i dbyings khyab par bkang nas zhing
