363a1(rgyud 'grel): gi dkyil 'khor yongasu spyong bas don gnyis byas te// tshur 'dus pa las rje btsun rmugs 'dzin nag po sras dang bcas pa rdul phra rab kyi grangs mnyam pa spyan drangs la// khrus gsol ba sngon du 'gro bas mchod par
363a2(rgyud 'grel): yan lag bcu gsum yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// mnyes pa'i 'od kyis phreng ba bdag gi snying la zhug te bskul ba'i yid kyis tshad med pa bzhi spel zhes// byang chub kyi sems brtan pa yang dag bgos bskyed par bya'o// de nas rdo rje'i 'od zer
363a3(rgyud 'grel): chen pos brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po mtha' rnam par bzhu nas rdo rje sems dpa' ngo bor thim pa dang yang ches 'bas rang gi lus kyang nye bar bsreg nas gzi brjid kyi phung po sgyu ma lta bu'i bdag nyid du bsam mo// de'i 'og tu oM A
363a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes skad gsang stong de bskrun pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi mgon po byang phyogs kyi mgon tshe la rdo rje ri bo'i zom nas spyan drangs ste// kun nas dang zhing sim la gdung ba'i yid kyi rgyu'i sems dpa' 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba 'bar
363a5(rgyud 'grel): bA la bstim par bya'o// de dag yongasu gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das nor gyi dbang phyug// lha dang klu dang mi'i nor thams cad 'dzin pa mthing nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mi'u thung gi cha byad rigs ngan gyi rnam pa rna ba ma phug pa lhag ma za
363a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing mi srun pa gsus pa cher 'phyang zhing // rab tu brjid po'i bdag nyid// khye'u lo drug lon pa'i ni tshad can// gcer bu mtshan ma 'greng pa// zhabs gnyis dor stabasu nye bar gnas pas nor 'dzin ser po kha nas nor bu spyug pa'i mgo/
363b1(rgyud 'grel): g.ya su rnam par mnan pa// mche ba cung zad gtsigs shing // ljags rkan phugasu nye bar 'dril ba zhal dang spyan tha me'i phung po ltar 'bar zhing // spyan kun nas zla zhing zlog la rnam par gyur pa can/ dmyal ba la rin po che'i mig gsum pa'i
363b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can gyi khro gnyer gyi rim pa dang ldan pa dbu skra dang smin ma rnams kyi sku kham pa re re nas gyen du langs shing 'od zer 'phro ba'i me stag thur du 'jug pa phyag g.yas dang g.yon gyis pad ma'i snod ru ti ras bkang ba dang // ne'u le'i rkyal
363b3(rgyud 'grel): pa lha dang klu dang mi'i nor bu rin po che'i rigs mi 'dra ba du mas khengs par byas pa kha na re chen po'i rgyan snod skyug pa 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i cod pan gyi rgyan can/ klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang // 'jog po dang pad+ma chen po dang stobs
363b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan dang dung skyong dang nor rgyas dang pad+ma rnams nag po dang dkar po dang ser po dang sngon po dang khra bo dang ser po dang dmar po rnam pa brgyad kyi go rims ltar thor tshugs dang rna ba dang do shal dang tshangs sku dang dpung pa dang lag
363b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang rked pa rkang pa rnams la brgyan pa'o// thugs khor zla ba la ji skad bshad pa'i snying po can gyis mtshan ma bsgom par bya'o// de nas rdo rje'i yi ge bcu'i go cha bgo bar bya ste/ dpral ba dang zhal dang dpung pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dang
363b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs kha dang zhabs der g.yas dang // g.yon dang chu so dang 'bas po la gong g.yas dang g.yon dang grangs bzhin du/ oM dang dza dang b+ha dang la dang dza dang len dang dra dang ye dang sA dang hA rnams kyi yig 'bru rnams zla ba'i gdan dang // rdo rje phyed pa la
364a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa nyi ma'i snying po 'bar ba 'am gser gyi mchod sdong rnam par dag pa ltar bsam par bya'o// thugs ka'i mi phyed yi ge las 'phros phyogs bcu'i 'dren pa kun mchod cing // go cha bcur bcas skyob dbang nyid 'phros ma lus 'gro
364a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams rang 'drar byas// ne'u le klu dbang nor bdag 'od ldan lha klu mi yi nor rnams bsdus// zos cing zos te 'grangs gyur btsiro bas de skyugs dngos grub yang yang blang // de nas chu sbyin par bya ste// lag pa'i mthilo du bam ser po las gser gyi bum pa
364a3(rgyud 'grel): bzang po rin chen sna tshogs skyug pa kha phyir bsgyel bas yi ge ba ma de nyid kyis mtshan pa blta ba'o// ba ma gi nang du dza yig go// khrig ma la ni oM mo// 'dzub mo la ni b+ha'o// gung mo la nau la'o// srin lag la ni dza'o// mthe'u chung la le no// mthe bong la dra'o//
364a4(rgyud 'grel): nor bu 'ching ba'i gnas su ye'o// lago mthil gyi lto g.yon du swA de'i g.yas su hA'o// thas cad kyang zla ba gang ba gnas shing // gser 'od dri ma dang bral ba lhag par 'tsher ba ltar/ bsam mo// de nas yang chu khyor ba gang kha la nye bar gtugs
364a5(rgyud 'grel): oM I dra ni mu khaM b+hU ma ri swA hA zhes bya bas sor mo lnga la lan re re dang // khwa dang lag pa byin gyis brlabs pa la gnyis te/ bdun gyis byin gyis brla'o// de'i 'og tu nag po chen po mdzes pa'i sku yongasu rdzogs pa zhig mdun gyi pad+ma rin chen rgyan snod
364a6(rgyud 'grel): dubazhugs te rang gi thugs khe nas ci 'dri ba'i gzugs phyung ste bstims la// rin po che'i bum pa rgyan thams cad kyis spras pa yongasu gang ba rgyun mi 'chad pas chu sbyin par bya'o// 'di ltar bya ste oM hUM swA hA zhes bya ba rin po ches brgya ni
364b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lag pa nas zhal du'o// zhal nas rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo ru'o// des nas slar lag mthil du 'bab pa'i rim pas mthar chu'i bdag po zhal du 'jug par bsam te cho ga de nyid kyis khyor pa brgya rtsa brgyad 'khrul pa med par sbyin par bya'o// de'i tshe
364b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag gis mthil gyi bum pa dang ne'u le dang ltos 'gro rnams kyi kha dang sna'i sgo la sogs pa bu ga'i rnam pa thabs cad las rin po che'i rigs mi 'dra ba sdug cing yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma'i char chen po phab pas gnas khang lo sogs pa mtha'
364b3(rgyud 'grel): dag g.yogs cing nor par gyur par bas mo// de'i rjes la yi ge bcu pa la mchod pa lnga'i sngags sbyar bas mchod cing / thun mong dang khyad par gyi sgo nas bstod ngo // sngags de dag nyid kyis gtor ma byin gyis brlabs te dbul bar bya'o// na mo
364b4(rgyud 'grel): rad na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha drA yA/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye swA hA/ oM dzaM b+ha la dz+wa len tre ye swA hA/ zhes lan bdun nam brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du zlas te ji ltar 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab po// de nas yang mchod pas gtang rag phul
364b5(rgyud 'grel): te me tog dbul bzhag nas yi ge brgya pas lhag chung kha bskangs la rten sbyin po dang chu'i phud srin lag gis reg ste lce la bzhag cing / tshul tshogs rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i ngongasu dor bar bya'o// de ltar zla ba drug la sogs par nyin lan gsum
364b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan lan gsum du bar ma chad par mu sbyin pa la brtson par byed na/ des ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i 'byor pa thams cad gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyu ro// dbang phyug snying po gter bum las// lcags kyus lhag btab zas nor ster// bram ze'i
365a1(rgyud 'grel): tshangs sgyogs lnga tshan lngas// bskangs te bcud bsdus dngos grub len// rin chen snying po nyi zla dang // pad+ma rab sbyangs pade chen thob// rim bzhin gnod sbyin ne'u le mo// thong khrag pur ling sbyor bar bshad// dbyar dgun ston zla tha chungs
365a2(rgyud 'grel): dang dpyid zla 'bring po rten bzhengs nas// 'di nyid rgyal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig ye shes mnyam sbyor bya// rna ba mnan dang mdangs 'phrog dang // dgra bo byis pa'o gzugs 'jigs pas// rigs ngan gdug pa'i las gsum byed// khro zhal phrin
365a3(rgyud 'grel): las bgegs spyod yin// klu rgyal gdon 'grol char 'bebs byed// nor bdag gzir bas nor rnams 'phrog/ rig 'dzin dgug dang gter 'byed dang // 'jigs skyob rkun po bsrung ba nyid/ bu ster tshe ni bsrid pa dang / phyugs skyod shing gzugs pa dang //
365a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bkra shis gsol ba dang / rim bzhin oM nas swA hA'i bar// 'od dang lhan cig rjes 'gro dang // slar bzlogs yi ge bcu yis so// rdo rje hUM mdzad khros pa yis// tsha ba drug dang khrag ske tshe/ mar khu lus byugs pur ling gdung // bdun phrag
365a5(rgyud 'grel): gcig gis dpogs na 'grub// ye ya d+ha bam swA hA/ snyigs dus sgrubs rnams rab dbul nyen rnams kyis// phan 'dod bzhin yang rang gzhan don nyams par// mthong nas rmugs 'dzin cho ga tshul bzhin bris// dge bas kun la 'dod sbyin gter gyur
365a6(rgyud 'grel): cigs dpal rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba nag po'i sgrub thabs// gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba sbas pa'i bum pa zhes bya ba slob dpon nor sbyin gyis mdzad pa rdzogas+ho// dpal chos kyi rje sa'i ster na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya b+ha dra dang
365b1(rgyud 'grel): bod kyi lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bod yul dbus kyi bsam yas kyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// dge'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la kriSh+Na sAd+ya daM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dzam+b+ha la nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ 'phags pa 'dzam+b+ha la la
365b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa dzam+b+ha la bsgrub par 'dod pas// yid dang mthun pa'i gnas/ stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i go 'phang thob par byas te sems can thams cad mtho ris dang thar pa'i bde ba la/
365b3(rgyud 'grel): dgod par bya// de'i ched du dzam+b+ha ya la mchod par bya snyam du sems bskyed la// gnas dang bdag dang // rnal 'byor bsrung ba ni gzhan dang 'thun/ rang gi snying khar yi ge A dkar po 'od zer 'phro ba dang ces pa yongasu gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyi
365b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor/ de'i steng du yi ge hUM nang gnag la phyir ser ba 'od zer ser po 'phro ba bsams la// de yongasu gyur pa las// rdo rje rtse dgu pa hUM dang kha dog mtshungs pa bsgom// de'i lte ba'i nang du bsams// hUM de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros
365b5(rgyud 'grel): shing ngag tu oM AHzhes brjod pas phyogs mtshams thams cad nas sems can gyi don byed pa'i u tsusma bsam gyis mi khyab pa spyan drangs nas mdun gyi na mkha' la bzhugs pa la// dad cing gus pas phyag btsal dngosu 'byor pa dang /
365b6(rgyud 'grel): yid las byung ba'i mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i bdun rnam dag bya/ tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa ni bsod nams kyi tshog sog pa yin/ de nas yang rdo rje hUM zla ba rnams la 'phros pas snod bcud la phog/ de 'od du zhu slar 'od kyi gnas la thim
366a1(rgyud 'grel): mdun gyi 'phags pa'ang oM AHzhes brjod pas rdo rje dang hUM dang tha mi dad du gyur rang lus kyang 'od du zhu nas rdo rje la sogs pa la thim de rnams rmi lam sgyu ma ltar bsam de ye shes kyi tsho 'dzin pa phe rdo trUM zla ba u
366a2(rgyud 'grel): tsusma hUM gis 'od zer// de lnga po yongasu gyur pa las sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du rnam thos kyi bu sku mdog ser po mgo g.ya su bstan pa gAn rgyal du nyal ba kha nas rin po che sna tshogs skyug pa dbu rgyan la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs
366a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis spros pas brgyan pa de'i mgo thur du mnan pa/ 'od zer gyi phreng ba 'khrug cing 'phro ba'i gdan gyi lte bar/ dbang po sbas pa ltar gnag pa'i dza yig yongasu gyur pa las u tsu sma byis po'i gzugs can shin tu gnag pa// rna ba ma
366a4(rgyud 'grel): phug parasna thung pa// sgra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa// lus thung ba mthug pa// gsus pa che ba 'a sa macigs pa// spyan dmar ba/ khro nyer gnyer ba/ spyan zlum pa/ phyag gnyis kyi g.yas pa na khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa nu ma g.yas pa la
366a5(rgyud 'grel): bsten cing / sil du gsol ba'i tshul gyis bsnams pa// g.yon pa na rin po che sna tshogs skyug pa'i ne'u la bris mo g.yon gyis steng du bzung po// zhabs g.yas bskum pas gdan gyi mgo bo mnan pa// g.yon brkyang bas rkang pa
366a6(rgyud 'grel): mnan par mi bskyod pas dpa brgyan pa// cerari bu thor tshugs la klu mtha' yas nag pos dkris pa// rna go ngo shal/ tshangs spud/ dpung pa lag pa/ rkang pa/ rkang po rnams la rim pa ltar/ 'jog po dmar po/ pad+ma chen po dkar
366b1(rgyud 'grel): bopo stobs kyis rgyu sngon po rigs ldan khro bo/ dung skyong ser po/ ba su ki dkar po/ pad+ma dkar po ste klu chen brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// de'i thugs khar zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ de'i lte bar zla ba'i gdan la hUM/ dpral bar oM lce la
366b2(rgyud 'grel): dpung pa g.yas la b+he/ g.yon la le/ thugs kha ra dzaSh+Talte ba len/ dar gdod g.yas la tra/ g.yon la ye/ bol gong g.yas la swA g.yon la hA// yi ge de rnams zla ba'i gdan dang bcas pa'o// kha dog nag cing / 'od ser po
366b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phro ba'o// yi ge de rnams dang / thugs ka'i rdo rje'i lte ba'i nang gi hUM zla ba'i gdan rnams las 'od 'phros te/ sems can la reg pas thams cad dzam+b+ha lar gyur nas yid kyis hUM la bsdu/ yang de rnams las 'od 'phros pas/ rin
366b4(rgyud 'grel): po che thams cad bsdus te rlung nang du rngubs pas/ klu chen brgyad dang rnam thos bu dang ne'u le'i kha nang du song / phyir rngubs pas de rnams kyi kha nas skyugs/ rin po che'i phung po chen po byung yang zos yang skyugs pa lan mang du bsgom/ de rjes su
366b5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lag pa g.yas pa oM las dA ka'i gzugs kyi lag pa'i mthil du bam yig las 'od zer 'phros pa las skyes pa'i bum pa'i lag pa bsam pa'i/ bum nang du dzaM/ khrig ma la oM/ mdzub mo la b+ha/ gung mong lA la/ srin lag la dza
366b6(rgyud 'grel): mthe chung la len/ mthe bong la dra/ khrig ma'i mtsham su ye/ g.yon la swA/ g.yas la hA re re la zla ba'i gdan re'o// de nas zang gi zhong pa'i nang du rten yod na bzhugs/ med na rang dang 'dra ba'i rten du bskyed la chu khyor gang / oM ain+d+ra Ni mu khaM b+ha ma
367a1(rgyud 'grel): ri swA hA/ ces pa lan bdun gyis byin gyis brlabs la chu khyor ba gang khar blugs par bsams te phul ba khar song bas kha nang gi dzaM gyis ser por gyur/ snying kha'i hUM la sogs pa'i nus pas bdud rtsir gyur pa slar gyen du
367a2(rgyud 'grel): log ste rang gi lag pa'i mthil du byung ba/ mdun gyi dzam+b+ha la'i zhal du phul bar bsam zhing // oM hUM swA hA// ces pa lan re dang chu khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad rim pa 'di nyid kyis so// mjug tu/ na mo ma Ni b+ha dra yA ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ oM dzaH
367a3(rgyud 'grel): la dza len dra ye swA hA/ zhes lan bdun brjod la chu khyor baM bdun dbul/ 'di nyid gtor ma'i sngags kyang yin/ de nas rten chu nang nas bton te/ logs su bzhugs/ bskyed pa yin na badz+ra muHsa gshegs su gsol/ gtor ma gtsang
367a4(rgyud 'grel): sar gtang / rgyun du sngags bzlos na/ oM dzam+b+ha la dzaM len dra ye swA hA/ zhes pa dang na mo rang na tra ye la sogs sngags phreng 'dam kha yin gsung zla ba drug gis nges par 'grub par the tshomi dgos gsung // rjesu bdag gzhan thams cad kyi
367a5(rgyud 'grel): tshe dang / bsod nams 'phel ba dang dpal 'byor rgyas pa dang 'khor dang chab srid 'phel ba dang / 'dod pa'i don ci dang ci bsam pa thams cad myur du 'grub par mdzad du gsol/ zhes gsol ba gdag/ bsngo ba dang smon lam gdab po//
367a6(rgyud 'grel): dzas+tha la nag po'i sgrub thabs bsdus pa paN chen shAkya shri'i zhal nas gsung ba/ bsgrubs lo tsA b+ha byams pa'i dpal gyi bsgyur ba'o// sa brgyad dbang phyug lha yi lha/ mgon po 'gro kun phongs pa sel// mi'u thung gzugs can nag po che/
367b1(rgyud 'grel): umrat+pal phyag 'tshal lo// skyes bya'i bstod pas bstod par bya'o// dge'o// rgyu gar skad du/ Ar+yAHm+b+ha la dza lon dra yo bi wi shwa stong dran ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags brlags 'dzin chu'i dbang po lnga khyud par gyis bstod pa zhes byu gul
367b2(rgyud 'grel): nin+ya dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// nor gyi dang phyug na chen gtor mnga' ba// lcags rgyas ljags pa tab 'dod dgu sbyin par byed/ ni shrI drug ldan pa/ sang sngags yi ga yis// lha min lha dang mi 'o marje dung rtu laM// ny+tsi shU lho'i spyan
367b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gis gang po'i// tshangs sgrogs las bsgrib dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rgyun// rab 'bab bcud kyi ril bu sbyin mdzad gang // nor rgyun lha mos legs bsten khyod la 'dud// thabs chen shes rab zab rgyas rin chen gyis// snying gi zla'i sbyor
367b4(rgyud 'grel): ba las byung ba// dga' chen ye shes bzhin sa ma bu te// mchog bAn+d+he swAr+m+ma gas 'dzin khyed zhabs rtag tu drung // dzA yig lus skyes lha chen yi ge bzhis// legs drangs rdo rje'i thugs gsung skur ldan pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan
367b5(rgyud 'grel): bdU ba ldan pa// nyams dgra'i gar gyis brgyan la phyag 'tshalo// bi Ni ro d+ha lis rna ba mnas// gru brgyad kha yis dgra bo'i mdongs 'phrog byed// sngags bzlogs lugs 'byung bzhi gnyis yo gI yis// byis pa'i sogs nga
367b6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs 'jog mngang la 'dung/ klu brgyang rgya myos nor bu'i gdon 'tshul zhing // chu 'dzini sprin 'dra'i lus la char men 'bebs// khyod ni nor bdog gabor bsas gsum gyi/ narari 'brog 'al ba'i bgegs 'joms mdzang la brjod
368a1(rgyud 'grel): stobs brgya mnga' ba khyed kyi ye shes yi ge bAr+tha// rig 'dzin dgug dang gter 'byed 'jigs las skyob// rkun po bsrung dang bu ster che bsnying dang // phyugs skyong skyed shing dbang bskur shis mdzad 'dud// gang phyir sags
368a2(rgyud 'grel): skye bo rmugs byed pa'i// nor 'dzin sa brgyad dbang phyug yud tsam zhig/ mthong nas gus 'phel nyi shus bstod bgyis pas// sgrub rnams 'phrin las nyi shus rgyal gyur cig/ 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po la phrin las /
368a3(rgyud 'grel): shu'i sgo nas khyad par gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba// slob dpon chen po nor 'dzin dpal gyi zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// paN+Di ta chen po bud d+ha shrI dz+nyA na dang lots+tsha ba byams pa'i dpal gyis/ mang yul gyi grong du 'phags pa wa rti'i pho brang du
368a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur ba'o// dge'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA dza~Mm+b+ha la sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das dzim+b+ha lnga la phyag 'tshal lo// mchod sbyin brgya pa me lha gdong bzhi dang / seng ge 'phrog byed nyin mor byed rnams kyis/
368a5(rgyud 'grel): nono sa gnyis la btung bcom ldan sdug bsngal ba bdag la pad ltar yangs pa'i spyan ras gzigs// bcom ldan che ba khyor gang gis mnyes 'gyur na/ thugs rjes mnga' ba gzhan gang lags pa gsungs// de phyir mchod pa bshams la
368a6(rgyud 'grel): mi rtsi zhing // khyod dang 'dra ba phal cher rnying par dka'// brtse bas 'bad pa'i sgo nas brtsal brtsal nas// phongs par gyur pa dag la bde mdzad na// kho bo mchi ma dag gis gdong sbags pa// spyan sngar mchis kyang ci ste gzigs ma lags// e ma'o
368b1(rgyud 'grel): shAtu rgya pa zugs dz+re ste// g+hanu mo mdu' ba khyod lta bzhums gyur byung // sgra tshogs bzlog dka' sdug bsngal ma tan gyi// snga lus rnam par 'jams pa ji ltar lags// sams can sman snga nar bu rin po ni// rnam pa sna tshogs dkyu n+d+har+ya
368b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bebs grags na// kha bo khyod nyid gcig pu'i mthar thug pA// tsi sne TIg+sa pA yang hU~M 'gas mi lags// khyod ba zhugs bzhin du ste yis dbarang bsgyur// khaM mos pas shin du tshor bsregs nA// khyod kyi skye zhig stegs d+d+hi 'dzi ba sa
368b3(rgyud 'grel): sa gsum khur du gyur ba gang du thul/ bum pa dpag pas m+b+ha shing dang yid bzhin gyi// nor bu sems pa dang ldan ma lags pa// de dag gis kyang sems can phan bgyid na// thugs rje'i bdag can bcom ldan smros ci 'tshal// gang zhig rmugs
368b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin chu yis dbang po zhes// skad cig kyang ni khyed kyi mtshan smos pa/ de la pad mI 'byung gnas legs bzhin du// pang rgyas dpal ni 'jug par dgyes pa lags// de ltar bcom ldan srid 'joms khyod spyan sngarare// cho nges btab pa'i bsod nams
368b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byams klas pa/ gang yin de'i skye bo khyod bzhin du// mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byin par shog/ bcom ldan rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa slob dpon chen po brgyan pa zla byas mdzad pa rdzog s+ho// // rgyu gar gyi mkhan po mA tI ta shrI dz+nyA na'i
368b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba po tsha ba nyi ma grags kyis legs par bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dze sta li sto rnga khod skad du/ 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa/ 'phags paM dzam+b+ha la la phyog 'tsha lo// dpal ldan chung
369a1(rgyud 'grel): mgon po ni// zhal gcig phyag nyis brjid pa'i sku// sku mdog sngo nag 'od zer 'phro// mi bskyod sangs rgyas dbu la bzhugs// klu chen brgyad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan// dgos 'dod 'byung la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyag g.yas thod pa khrag
369a2(rgyud 'grel): bkang bsnams// g.yon pa gter gyi ne'u le 'dzin// 'gro ba dbul bas rab gdungs pa'i// re 'dod bskong la phyag 'tshal bstod// khro bo'i tshe lugs dbu skra gyen du rjes// me'u thung byis pa gzhon po'i sha rgyas pa// nor bdag gdan la rkyang bsku
369a3(rgyud 'grel): tshul du bzhugs// dgos 'dod ma lus 'byung la phyag 'tshal bstod// mche ba rab gcig hUM sbrus ma rungs 'dul// dran pa tsam gyis ci bsam 'grub pa mdzad// yid bzhin nor bu yon tan kun ldan pa// dpal ldan chung bang khyod la phyag
369a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstod// u tshASh+mA la gus pas bstod pa yi// bsod nams mtha' yas dam pa gang thob nges// bdag dang sems can ma lus thams cad kyi// dbul phongs sdug bsngal 'ching las grol bar shog/ 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la
369a5(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa// paN+Di ta dz+nyA na badz+ris mdzad pa rdzog s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ dzam+b+ha la stotra// bod skad du/ 'dzam+b+ha la'i bstod pa// dzam+b+ha la la phyag 'tshalo// lha dang lha min dri za mi'am ci rnams kyi// cod pan 'od kyis zhabs kyi khri ni gsal mdzad pa//
369a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub mchog du nges mdzad gnod sbyin dbang phyug la// sems can rnams la sman pa'i bsam pas bdag gis gsol// gang zhig brtse ba'i bdag nyid byang chub sbyin mdzad khyod// snying rje'i rtsa ba sems can don du rab tu grags// mgon
369b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod sems can rnams la rtse bar mi mdzad na// khyod kyis sangs rgyas dran par gang gis 'gyur te mtshar// shin tu mi zad dbul ba'i rgya mtsho'i nang du ni// 'gro rnams lhung ba khyod kyis mthong bar ma gyur tam// rin chen gter chen rnams ni mtshan
369b2(rgyud 'grel): noni bzung byas nas// khyod kyis chu bo yang ni rdzing gis bcing bar mdzod// shin tu dbul ba'i byin za mi bzang drag po yis// 'gro ba gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du bsreg par byed// rtse bo nyid kyis ser sna rnam par spongs mdzad la// rin chen bdud rtsi'i char
369b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis char rgyun drag du phob// khyed ni bsgom pas brgya byin gyi ni rgyal srid dang // spyan zur tsam gyis khyab 'jug gis ni dpal mo dang // mnyes pas dbang phyug gis ni ri'i gnas kyang thob// mgon po sdug phongs 'gron bu tsam yang mi ster na// 'gro
369b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbang phyug rnams la dpag med bde ba rnams// rtag tu khyod ster sdug bsngal can la de lta mi ni// khyod kyis sngon ma mthong ba snying rje'i yul gyur pa'o// dbul ba'i sdug bsngal can la ji ltar khyod 'jigs sam// nor gyis nor slong grub ldan
369b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams la khyod 'gengs kyi// yang dag sbrul med sdig byas rnams la khyod min zhing // nor gtor nor gyis nor ldan par ni 'dzin gyur te// mgon po smod pa'i tshogs rnams nges par spong byed dam// gal te khyod kyis nor gtong rnams la khyod kyis
369b6(rgyud 'grel): ster rang skye bo'i tshig ngan rnams la ji ltar khyod 'jigs sam// rab tu 'bad pas nges par smra ba de yis mchog/ gnod sbyin rgyal po bdag gis gsol ba gsan du gsol// rab tu 'bang byas de 'dra'i nor dang ldan gyur na// ji ltar dbul po'i sgra
370a1(rgyud 'grel): ni thos par ma gyur cig/ dbul ba'i me ni rab tu 'bar bas 'gro ba rnams// bsreg par ngas mthong yid kyis de mtshar nyid du 'gyur// gang zhig bdag gis smras pa'i tshig rtsub tshig rnams ni// chu'i dbang
370a2(rgyud 'grel): po brtse phyir 'di rnams bzod// gang zhig bstod pa 'di yis ni/ rtag tu 'bad pas dzam lnga bstod// de ni dbul por mi 'gyur zhing // shin tu mi g.yo'i dpal thob shog/ mi'i dbang po nyi ma rnam par gnon pas dzam+b+ha la la
370a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / ka l+yA Na mi traM gzhon nu shes rab kyis bskul nas// rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har+m+ma d+hA ra dang // yar lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dpal ldan sa sgyu'i gtsug lag
370a4(rgyud 'grel): khang du bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du// u ts+tsha b+hU dza ma b+ha u pa di sha stotra// bod skad du// rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba'i man ngag gi bstod pa// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po na mkha'i mdog
370a5(rgyud 'grel): can nor gyi char 'bebs pa/ ma skyes rang bzhin dag pis su mdog nag por bzhugs// khyod ni rdo rje snyems dpa' nyid de bdag dran na// khyod la 'dud kyis thugs rjes ci'i phyir mi gzigs/ lo drug byis pa'i gzugs la gzhom
370a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sha rgyas pa// 'dzum zhing khrol byams pa'i mche ba kar po gtsigs// khro gnyer dpral por bsnyer zhing ral pa dmar ser langs// dbul ba sel mdzad sun yangs snying rje can la 'dud// mo bskyod dbul bzhugs pas
370b1(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rigs 'dzin cing // byams pas kun la khros te gcer bu sbrul gyi brgyan// oM a las skyes nor sbyin gdan la bzhugs shing 'gying // re ba bskong mdzad dpag bsam shing 'dra khyod la 'dud// phyag g.yas snying rje don mdzad
370b2(rgyud 'grel): thong ba khrag gis bkang // phyag g.yon nor sprin ma bzung ne'u les rin chen 'bebs// g.yas g.yono zhabs kyi rnam// thos sras kyi rkang pa brdzis// nor bdag gan rkyal gnon cing brkyang bskum bzhugs la 'dud// rnab ma
370b3(rgyud 'grel): phugs rigs ngan cha lug du ma bzung // lag nos kha ru 'o ma'i bdud rtsi rtsa lam rdo rje nas byung ste// gur kum mdog 'dra zhal du phul bas mnyes mdzod la// nyid kyis bdag gis bsam mkhyen raM ba myur du bskongs// yi ge
370b4(rgyud 'grel): bcu pas byin brlabs mye tog drang bcas pas// oM las 'od 'phros gdub bu rin chen spras pas brgyan// oM las byung ba'i bum pa bzang pos chu phul nas// bcom ldan mgon po ci phyi re re ba mi bsgong lags/
370b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro drug kun la re bskor nor gyis char pa dag/ ci 'dod mang po 'bebs pa'i thugs rjer grags lags na// bdag gis mos pas khyod kyi yon tan rtag tu brjod// thigs pa gcig kyang mi gsol skal ba med dam ci//
370b6(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma re re bzhin du rtag tu khyod 'bod na// bdag ni yid chang sgyid lug gdong pa dag mod kyang // khyod kyi sngon gyi dam bcas thugs rje gang du thal// gter chen skal ba med kyang log 'tsho med tsam byin// bdag gi
371a1(rgyud 'grel): snying nas smos kyang da dung ma gzigs na// sa gsum kun la snyoms par dam ni ma bcas sam// bdag la skal ba med kyang thugs rjes ci mi gzigs// sems can min nam dbul ba'i sdug bsngal
371a2(rgyud 'grel): bral bar mdzod// bdag gis bos pas khyod kyi thugs rje'i zhags pa yis// srid 'dir dbul phongs sol la bde chen gnasu drongs// 'jigs 'jigs 'jigs par mi byed khyod kyis byin brlabs te// 'di dang pha rol gnyis
371a3(rgyud 'grel): kar rtag tu sgrub par mdzod// rmugs 'dzin 'chol pa'i man ngag gi bstod pa// bla ma d+ha byang chub sems dpas mdzad pa rdzogas+ho// / khu tsog slob dpon nyi ma smras pas mdzad zhes kyang zer ro//
371a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ de bi ba su d+ha rI stodr-i// bod skad du// lha mo nor rgyun ma la bstod pa// lha mo nor rgyu ma la phyag 'tshal lo// oM mi bum pa rin chen gter ldan ste// de steng skyon bral nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// gdod nas
371a5(rgyud 'grel): dag pas sku mdog ser lta bu// ma bcos rang bzhin byis pa'i gzugs 'dra ba// snyen mgur phyag zhabaso rin chen phreng bas brgyan// zla rgyas ltar mdzes 'phags ma'i sku la 'dud// brtse ldan sbyin pa grub pa'i tshul
371a6(rgyud 'grel): mnga' ba/ pad ma'i zhabs mda' 'gag med seng ge'i sbas// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus sel byed ma// dpal ldan lha mo khyod 'dra'i gsung la 'dud// tshogs gnyis mthar phyin sa bcu rim 'grod nas/
371b1(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i dbang gri saM sems can re 'dod bskor // spros pa'i mtha' bral bde ba chen po'i dang // yang dag don rtogs lha mo'i thugs la 'dud// phyag g.yas mchod sbyin bi dza pha la yis// 'jigs pa brgyad skyob 'gro rnams dbang du
371b2(rgyud 'grel): bsdud dbul ba sel zhing mkha' spyod 'dren mdzad gi/ g.yon pa thugs kar rin chen snye ma 'dzin// dgos 'dod re skong dpag bsam shing lta bu// yid bzhin nor 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// bad gis khyod lo rtag tu mchod byed cing //
371b3(rgyud 'grel): gus dang bcas pa'i sems kyis rab bstod na// gdong la mtshams rab tu gos gyur kyang // dbul ba'i sdug bsngal skad cig ma 'dor na// sngon gyi thugs rje'i smon lam gang du thal// las kyis 'phro med sbyin shugs zad pa yin// phu
371b4(rgyud 'grel): sum tshogs pa'i skal ba med gyur kyang // tshe 'dir phongs pas log 'tsho spyong tsam gyi// thugs rje'i thigs pa 'ga' tsam ces mi sbyin// dus 'di nas bzung tshe rabs thams cad du// 'phags ma nor rgyun ma la/ mchod byed cing // theg chen
371b5(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags chos la spyod pa dang // bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' nyan cing // dbyer med phyag rgya chen po'i don rtogs shog/ rta dang glang po rin chen gos rnams 'grub pa dang // khrus kyi rdzing bu rin chen pong mdzod dang // 'dod 'jo'i ba dang ma rmos
371b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bru rnams la// rtag tu chos dang ldan pa'i longs spyod shog/ paN+DiHdza mA ris lha mo nor rgyun ma la bstod pa rdzog s+ho// / rnga ma ris rang 'gyuraro//
372a1(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgru zhu/
372b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du// ma hA yak+Sha a pa ra dzI ta sA d+ha nA~M tan tra/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rgyud// dpal phyug na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor bdagi sgrub thubs
372b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di gsungs so// nor rgyas pa 'dod pa gang dag gis gnas dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i sar mon Dal legs par byas te/ der me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / byug pa dang / bshos dang / sil snyan dgod pa'i dbus su bum po mdzes pa
372b3(rgyud 'grel): ma dang / sman dang / 'bru dang / rin po che dang / spos dang / snying po dang / chus bkang ste/ lce sdug dang bcas pa snam bu gtsang mas dkris te/ srang bu sngon po btags la phyag na rdo rje'i bsnyen pa byas te/ yid bzhin nor bu 'bum du bzlas la bdag nyid la
372b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM tsa na Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ de nas nor lha nyid bsgrub pa ni khang bu shin tu dben par dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la ba'i rnam lngas byugs te/ de la pad+ma 'dab ma rgyang lte ba dang bcas pa bri/ lte ba dkar po 'dab ma brgyad ser por
372b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ de la rin po che dang me tog dgum/ dbus su bum pa dgong steng du sru bzhig/ mdun du zas dkar gsum dang / dngar gsum dang / tsheng ma sna tsheg dang / dri dang rtsi sman gyis brgyan te gzhago/ mchod pa'i rdzas dag kyang bkod la/ dang po byang
372b6(rgyud 'grel): chub tu sems bskyed de/ dpal phyag na rdo rje bskyed rims ji lta ba bzhini bsgoms pa'i mdun du pa las rin po che'i pad ma'i lte ba la hUM dkar dmir las skyes pa'i nor lci zhal cig phyag gnyis pa/ dkar zhing dmar ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa phyag
373a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ g.yon gyis rin chen bai DUr+ya'o// rin po che'i gdan la 'bab bzhugs kyi dkyil krung du bzhugs pa/ gsu lo che byis pa'i gzugs lta bu can/ bzhin mdzes pa spyan 'bor la che ba/ rin
373a2(rgyud 'grel): po che'i rgyan gyis kun tu klubs pa'i dam tshig gi gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub po bsams la/ bdag dang g.yog pa'i dpral bar oM/ mgrin par hrI/ snying khar phri ma/ lte bar hUM/ gsang bar phaT kyis bsrungs te/ ye shes dgug
373a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhug bya'o// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po kun gyis rgyal// gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ gnas 'dir mchod pa dbul gyis myur du spyon// bdag la zas nor gsol zhing bzhugs su spyan/ e h+ye hi yak+Sha a pa
373a4(rgyud 'grel): radzI ta sa pa ri wa ra a kad dzi ya hUM dzAM/ de nas ni mdun du byon par bltas te/ bdud bsal ba'i phyir rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i sha rgya'am yungs dkar 'phangs zhing oM A~MHbig+ha na Na ta krid nI hUM phaT/ ces pas rnam par phye nas mchod yon phul te/
373a5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig la mngon par gtsug la mchod pa phul nas bstod pa bya ste/ oM gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ zhal gcig phyug gnyis byis pa'i gzugs 'dra can/ phyag g.yon yid bzhin rin chen bai DUr+ya// thugs kar 'dzin mdzas
373a6(rgyud 'grel): mi zad nor gyi bdag/ phyag g.yas lcags kyu 'dzin zhing rgyal po dang // btsun mo lo sogs dgug dang dbang du mdzad// dung mdog 'od 'phro rin chen rgyan mdzes ldan// rin chen gdan la rgyal sras skyil krung bzhugs// 'jig rten zas nor
373b1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis bdag po ste// gang gis khyod bsgrub 'phongs pa'i 'jig sel mdzad// nor lha'i rgyal po bkra shis 'byung ba'i gnas// 'jam pa'i rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de'i rjes la rgyal ba sras bcas mchod la/ de dag gis lha mo mngon
373b2(rgyud 'grel): par sprul te/ bum pa lha'i bdud rtsis bkang bas mngon par bkrus bkrus pa bsamo// spyi bor dpal phyag na rdo rjes rgyas gdab po de nas snying po'i sngags 'odi/ skad che bar ma yin/ chung bar ma yin/ myur bar ma yin/ bul bar ma yin par
373b3(rgyud 'grel): smra ba bcad cing rnam par g.yengs pa la sogs pa spangs te bzlas so// oM hUM phye oM pa ra dzI ta dza dza hUM phaT/ bzlas pa gtong ba'i dus su mchod pa phul la/ gtor ma yang sbyin te/ gtor snod brum las rin po cher bsam/ gtor ma oM
373b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis sbyangs/ AHyis sbyar/ hU~M gis bdud rtsir bsgyur te phyag na rdo rje la rang sngags kyis dbul/ gnod sbyin lha la sngags oM hr-i dza yak+Sha a pa ra dzI ta sa pa ri wa ra a mr-i ta bA long kha ga khA hI khA hi i dam pa lim bak+Sha ya ma/ ma ma ba su
373b5(rgyud 'grel): puSh+TiM ku ru sarba dza ga b+hA sha~M ku ru mi da swAhUM/ oM a ki Do mu khaM sarba d+har+m+ma NaM e d+ha nung pan na tAd oM AHhUM phaT swAhA zhes pa dang / tshigs su bcad pas kyang bsngos la/ bstod pa bya/ chos bshad de phrin las bcol/ oM b+hu ta tri a
373b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ra dzi ta ra na ma sarba ti sam pa ti swAt+ma/ zhes pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te bsku'o// de nas dge pa bsngos la a pa re dzI ta badz+ra mu zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo// thun gnyis pa la sogs pa la dam tshig cheg rdzogs su bskyed
374a1(rgyud 'grel): la ye shes dgu ba la sogs ba sdur bzhin du b+ha'o// tshes gcig nas bcwa lnga'i bar du sgrub bo// bcwa lnga'i zhag gi dang po nas tho rangs kyis ba du sngags rgyun ma chang bar bzlas// lce pog dkar po'i bdug pa dbul/
374a2(rgyud 'grel): tho rangs grub pa'i rtags snang ba ni rab gzugs mngon sum du ston te bdag gis ji ltar bya zer te/ sgrub pa pos bdag gis bka' nyon cig bya'o// mna' bsgag dam chu klud ci 'dod bcol/ rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya bstan/ de phan chad
374a3(rgyud 'grel): bka' nyan te de la zhon nas chings pa'i 'jig rten mthong ngo // lha'i gnas su bskyal nas lha'i dbang pos dbang bskur bar byed do// 'bri sgra dang tug che ma 'ongs/ gzugs sgra gang byung yang skrag par mi bya'o// de lta bu'i mtshan ma ma byung
374a4(rgyud 'grel): nam langs pa'i dus su rmi lam brtag/ des ma grub na phyi ma'i zla ba la de bzhin du bsgrub/ des kyang ma grub na yang phyi ma'i zla ba la sgrub bo// de nas dngos grub ni rab rig pa'i rgyal po'i dbang 'thob bo// lha dang mi dang / gnod sbyin thams
374a5(rgyud 'grel): cad dbang du 'gyur/ dgra dang nad thams cad zhi bar byed do// tshe ring ba bskal pa bdun thub par 'gyur/ nor 'dzad pa med cing dpag tu med pa brjod kyis mi langs pa 'byung ngo // gal te gnod par byed pa byung na yang khros pa tsam gyis de
374a6(rgyud 'grel): ma thag tu 'tsho bar byed do// 'bring ni lta sgom gyis nyams myong skye/ bud med thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing nor gyis dbang phyug thob par 'gyur bkra shis par byed pa dang / dgra 'chi bar yang byed do// tha ma yang nor 'phel bar byed cing
374b1(rgyud 'grel): dgra 'chi bar 'gyur ro// grub nas rtag tu bsten pa ni zla ba nya gang pa thams cad la gtor ma gtang bar bya'o// dngos grub gang byung ba de cha drug tu bgos te/ bla ma dang dkon mchog gsum spyi dang / sems can dag la cha re re sbyin/ phyed
374b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis sgrub pa po'i 'tsho ba bya'o// sgrub pa'i dus su zas dkar gsum bza' zhing gtsang sbra dang ldan par bya'o// rtag tu khrus la brtson par bya'o// 'di 'grub na yon tan dpag tu med do// 'di la gdeng bzhi dang ldan pas 'grub
374b3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ 'og gnon ye shes bsnyen pa'i gdong / yang dag lta ba'i gdeng / mi nyams pa dam tshig gi gdeng / the tshom med pa nges pa'i gding // de la lta ba ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rmi lam lta bur shes par bya'o// dam
374b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig ni bla ma mnyes par bya zhing / gsang la sgrub ste// gzhan la thabs 'di bstan par mi bya'o// gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rgyud rdzogs s+ho// /
374b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi ma dza mA ris bsgyur ba'o// // dge'o//
375a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor 'dun pa'i rim pa rnam pa bye ba'i sgrub thabs bzhugs s+ho//
375b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya ga smad du/ bad+hA kun la tan tra kAr ma ma d+h+ya la sa twa ka ma a d+hi swA dz+nyA na nu ma// bod srung+yas// rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor bdun pa'i rim pa rnam pa bye ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba// bcom ldan
375b2(rgyud 'grel): 'das dpal sgrol byed thugs rje'i rgyal po shin tu rnam par grol ba nyid du la phyag 'a tshal lo// hUM lA khros pa'i rgyal po yis// khro bo nye bar zhi mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi mdzod// khro zhi che la phyag 'tshal te/
375b3(rgyud 'grel): dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud dag la// dkyil 'khor bdun pa'i rim pa dag/ sems can ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir// legs par bsdus te bstan par bya// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas na// nyan
375b4(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// yi ge'i sgras btags ming tshogs la// brten pa'i tshig gis rab mchog ste// khongs nas gab rdzus don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje thugs la gnas// 'di ni gas
375b5(rgyud 'grel): rkyechen nges pa yin// 'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// 'di las gsang ba'i des don med// kun gyis phyag rgya rdzogs chen mchog/ snod ldan dang tshul bzung la sbyin// gzhan du rnams kyang
375b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin mi bya// rmongs la 'phyar bas gzhon du min// dus min par ni srog zad nas// bsreg dang sgrib la yun ring gnas// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen bi rtage pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/
376a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon 'byung ba// dri tshe sems can thams cad ni// sbyong nyid ther zug 'gog pa dang // khro gtum log lnga bkam zhong 'dzum// lI l-i gaN+DI mug chags sogs pas// log lta dgu pas de myos 'gyur/
376a2(rgyud 'grel): de dag rnam par grol bya'i phyir// rgyal bas dkyil 'khor bdun du gsungs// de rtsom gang zag lngar 'dod do// bdun pa dang ni rigs chen byed// dbyugs chen 'byin dang lung chen thob// rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor bri//
376a3(rgyud 'grel): drag shul can zhes bya ba'i gnas// dgon pa chen po'i gnas tshen ni// yoM shes snying po can rnams kyi// thub chen gsang ba 'byung bas na// dam pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin// de gnas nges don dgod pa ni// ji bzhin nyid kyi dkyil
376a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor las// phyag rgya dngos grub dkyil 'khor dang // byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ bsod nams tshegs kyi dkyil 'khor sprin// bka' stong pho nya'i dkyil 'khor drag/ 'brub khung las kyi dkyil 'khor che// gtad
376a5(rgyud 'grel): gnan pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// don dbye ba'i sgo nas gsungs// mi bskyod zhing khams mngon dga' na// dge slong thub dka' gzhon nu yis// khyim bdag kau shI ka'i bu// dge slong thar pa nag po dang // g.yog po dan 'phags gnyis po la// ji
376a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs// ji bzhin nyid de ma bcos na// dngos po bzhi la gnas spyad kyang // na mkha' la ni sprin bzhin du// 'di ni rnal 'byor dam pa'i lam// ji bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro// phyag rgya dngos grub dkyil 'khor ni// mi
376b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khrugs pa'i zhing khams na// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud drug las// drag pa rdo rje sems dpa' yis// mi 'khrugs rgyal po nyid la gsungs// gnas chen dam pa dag tu ni// tshul dang ldan pa'i rdzas bsogs nas// maN+Dal la sogs mdzes byas la// khrun
376b2(rgyud 'grel): byas snying gar nyi dkyil hUM// 'od kyi snang bya dkon mchog rnams// spyan drangs dkon mchog bskor phyag 'tshal// de nus mchod pa dbul ba ni// oM na maHla thA ga tas te bu khadzad ri me hA dz+nyA na maN+Dal badz+ra a ha ra pU dza hUM swA hA/ de bzhin du badz+ra d+hU pa/
376b3(rgyud 'grel): puSh+pe A lo// gan+d+he/ nai bi d+ya pU dza hUM swA hA/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ zhes byin gyis brlab/ de nas rag+na sbreng zhing bdud rtsi yis tshogs mchod de rag+na khA hi/ Sha lo ha k+Sha hi / a mri ta khA hi/ gau ro tsan khA hi/ ba su ta khA hi/ tsi ta khA hi zhes brjod de/ thugs ka nas byung lha mos mtsho/
376b4(rgyud 'grel): rjes las hUM bdag 'dra log pa'i stobs ldan pas// thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas// srid pa'o 'khor bar 'khyams par nges// skye ba mang por lus blangs pa// sus kyang ma byas rang gi las// de tsam cha gcig don spyad na// nga tsam don gyi sangs rgyas
376b5(rgyud 'grel): zin na rang lus gtong bar ma phod cing // tshegs pa'i mtha' la mngon zhen pas// zug rngu nad kyis zin pa yin// srid pa'i btson ror chud pa 'di// mkha' la 'dud pas nyes par nges// 'khor ba'i rlung sgor ltung ba 'ong // las kyi rlung gis nyes par nges
376b6(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum rgyal po ma lus la// 'di dag mi 'chab mthol lo bshags// rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig rjes su srung // ye shes sems dpa' nye ba nyid du spyon// rig pa'i rgyal po bdag la rtag par dgongs// gsang ba'i dbang phyug bdag
377a1(rgyud 'grel): la dgongs par gsol// rtogs pa mchog sbyin bdag la dgyes par dgongs// 'dod pa kun byed bdag la chags par dgongs// dang po mnyam nyid sangs rgyas thugs rje can// las rnams kun byed bdag sems dge 'gyur ba// dus
377a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum dge ba shes dag dang thams cad// rdo rje can dang dam tshig sems dpar bsgrub// bdag kyang rdo rje sems dpa' gtan du mi stong na// rdo rje sems dpas gtan du bdag ma btang // rjesu yi rang bskul dang skyabs 'gro dang // lam rten bsngo dang sems
377a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed dang // tshangs par gyur pa'i las rnams kyis// 'gro ba kun bral bzhin du smon taM ke ma ta ke ma phaT/ ha la ha la raM/ tig sU tig sU khaM/ kro ta kro ta ya ma zhes/ dngos po thams cad stong par sbyangs// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs
377a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi gsang // skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid nas skye ba med// stong nyid rab tu bsal ba yi// snying rje yum ni bsgom par bya'o// nges pa las ni rdo rje gur// bruM bi sha tsa shud de zhes bzlas// dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pa'i
377a5(rgyud 'grel): khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrug cing 'khyil// keng rus chen po ri rab kyi// steng gi 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // phyogs bcur rgya yongs ma chad pa// phyi dang nad med kun du snang // 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// glu
377a6(rgyud 'grel): tshad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// gru bzhi sgo khyad bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar 'khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid// 'bar ba'i khro bo mang po 'khrug/ khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag/ gtum pa dom gyis yar pab ni//
377b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug lha chen la sogs gzung // dbus kyi nyi ma'i snying po la// hUM las ri lu'i sgra grags pas// sems dpa'i sku ru gyur pa yis// rang gi ngang tshul de gzung la// lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i phyir// khro rgyal rnams la bskul bar bya// bdag 'dra se
377b2(rgyud 'grel): can ma lus ku na// mchog nyid sgrub par sbyor bas na// rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun 'dus pas// sku'i dbyib tu bdag spyod cig/ de nas phyogs 'dus khro rgyal gyis// sems dpa' bdag la der dbang bskur// rim pa gsum gyis sku ru bskyed// de nas
377b3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan dgyes chen po// dbu dang phyag zhabs stong khams kyis// rdul snyed mtshon cha 'dzin pa ste// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rje kha Tang rje chung g.yas// g.yon dril dung dmar rgyu zhags 'dzin// 'bar chen klong
377b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor lo'i dkyil// dbang phyug che dang dur khrod kyi// steng na zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum bzhugs// dur khrod rgyan can gar gyis rol// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bdag/ khro rgyal ye nas yin pa'i phyir
377b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings las ni// khro mo dbang phyug mngon phyung ste/ he hi dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis// rin chen pad+ma rgyas mdzad de// hUM hUM rol pa'i 'od zer gyis// bde chen thugs mtshon byin brlabs nas// gnyis med dgyes pa 'khril pas
377b6(rgyud 'grel): thimad/ rdo rje lam byung yum gyi mkha'// chos spyi byang chub semasu gnas// lha rnams so so'i snying po'i sgra// hUM dang he haM phaT byung nas// gsung gi phyag rgya nyid rdzogs te// 'od zer spro bsdu'i sbyor ba yis// thugs kyi phyag rgya rab tu 'bar// de las
378a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam / u brdzug// shAb rgyan pa ma rdzogs sa// phyogs cu'i rdul skyed 'dzin par 'gyur// sem sa sa rtul ba'i sras byas nas// slar ba m+WA rang g-i gnas la khyod bya// sa m+b+ha n+d+ha bA dang/ dU byung /
378a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang // las su gyur te so sor bzhugs// de kun 'jigs byeng chen po yis// cha lugs rngam pa'i nga ro yis// 'bar ba'i klong na dbu gsum pa// phyag drug zhabs bzhis dri za dang // gnod sbyin chu bdag gshin rje sogs// dregs pa khyo
378a3(rgyud 'grel): shug stan la bzhugs// btsun mo khrug 'thung chen mo rnams// so so'i sku la 'khril de 'khod// dkar mo tshogs dang rkun mo dang // rmongs pa dang ni thal byed ma// ltob mo dang ni gtum mo dang // smr-i shA tsan+da dang tsan d+ha li// sgo'i khyams kyi nang
378a4(rgyud 'grel): du 'khod// seng+ge gdong chen ma mo'i tshogs// stag dang rtse dang khyi dang gzhang// kang ka dur bya 'ug gdong che// 'khor bar rngam pa'i mdangs dkyil 'khor// rdo rje sring 'gro ma tshogs dang // gdong mi 'jig rten ro langs ma'i// sgo bzhir
378a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzugs kyis gnas// srin po smug nag la sogs pa'i// 'jig rten ma mo nyi shu brgyad// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol na// bran gyi tshul du gnas shing 'khod// de ltar gsal bar dgod pa'i sngags/ oM sarba ta thA pa
378a6(rgyud 'grel): tam hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sa dur tan+ta ka ha~M na da ha pa tsa hU~M hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+De sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM rat+na ma hA shrA he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba puSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka
378b1(rgyud 'grel): NA sArba duSh+TAn+ta kA ha na dah+NA pa tsa ts+tshe hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM kar+m+ma ma hA shrI hUM ru ka man+tats+tshar+N+Na sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha nu da ha ba tsa n+taM hU~M phU phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kro ti shwa ri sarba duSh+TAn hUM/ oM badz+ra dar mahA kr-i ti shwa ri dz+wa la hUM phaT/ oM man+ta sur+ya rat+na mahArbo
378b2(rgyud 'grel): tishwa ri bi da ma / oM d+hi shwa bi mu ka ma hA kr-i ti kA ri kha'i hUM phaT/ oM sarba a mo kaM ma hA kro ti shwa ri hUM phuT/ badz+ra ki ri ta/ badz+ra tsa ri ha/ badz+ra pra mo ha/ badz+ra pa ta li ha/ badz+ra pu sa ha/ badz+ra kasma ri ha/ badz+ra sma sha ni haM/ badz+ra tsaN+Da li ha/ badz+ri sing mu
378b3(rgyud 'grel): kha he/ badz+ra byA kri mu ka he/ badz+ra sri la mu kha hi/ badz+ra sho na pu khA he/ badz+ra kri ta mu ka he/ badz+ra kang ka mu ka ha~M/ badz+ra khA kha su kha he/ badz+ra hu lu mu kha he/ badz+ra aR+Ya te dza te nga dza/ badz+ra u mu ka hU~M/ badz+ra lo ka paM/ badz+ra pa sme pa laM ya ba de ho/ badz+ra
378b4(rgyud 'grel): ma nu rak+kA si b+h+yo/ pra mo ni b+h+yo/ ro 'u tri b+h+r-i/ pe sA pi b+h+yo/ ko ma ri b+h+yo/ oM na tra yo b+h+yAM/ badz+ra bing ga laM b+h+yo// a mri ta b+h+yo/ saM me b+h+r-i/ da na taM b+h+yo/ bag rakra si b+h+yo/ bkr-i si b+h+r-i/ ra ti badz+ra haM b+h+yo/ e ka tsa re b+ho/ si ti ka b+h+yo/ ba ya b+ha b+h+yo/ ma hA ma ra na b+h+yo/ ag+ne ye
378b5(rgyud 'grel): b+h+yoHpa ra he g+h+r-i tsa mun+thi b+hU/ pu ta ma b+h+yAM/ ba ra nA b+h+yo/ badz+rA mahA ka ha la b+h+yo/ badz+ra tsa kr-i sus ga ra na b+h+yo/ badz+ra laM po da ro b+h+yo// de dgAM gis ni dkyil 'khor bskyod// dam tshig dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs// da ni ye shes 'khor lo ni// rang gi snying gi nas
378b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'phros// dbyangs dang ldan pa'i lha mo yis// phyogs bsdus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid cheka/ mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo // dmigs med mkha' ltar dag pas khyab pa'i sku//
379a1(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs gshegs su gsol par mi dmigs kyang // thugs rje'i ngang gis chos sku dag pa las// ye shes sgyu mas rol cing gshegasu gsol// ru rlung lu hUM ye h+ye hi badz+ra dza dza/ badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya hUM zhes brjod nas phyag
379a2(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ bdag med phyogs bral don dam thugs chud cing // byams dang snying rjes 'gron zur mi mnga' yang // thugs rje chen pos gdug po 'dul mdzad pa// 'jigs med he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// nA mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med
379a3(rgyud 'grel): cing 'a 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che// ma snying byams pa'i tshul gyis grogs mdzad ma// phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug ma// ci bgyi bka' nyan yang
379a4(rgyud 'grel): sbrul bsam mi khyab// ba dud 'dul ye shes pho nya drug cu'i tshogs// 'khor bcas rab 'bar kun la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho pra ti pu ho sarba ta thA ga ta b+han+d+ha naM ka ro mi/ i daM d+hU pa puSh+paM b+ha liM pra tits+tsha ho/ grI panA yo ki ni ho/ ta kri
379a5(rgyud 'grel): no ho zhes gus byas/ hUM khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa// thugs rje khros pas rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che// de nyid du ni bdag la stsol// badz+ri kro ta sa ma ya hU~M/ badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya phaT/ badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya ho//
379a6(rgyud 'grel): der bstim lus kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar ldan// so so rigs kyi 'bras bur 'gyur// snying gar mi skyod rdo rjes mtshan// de las ma mo brgyad spros te// phyi rol mchod pa byin gyis brlab// dbyangs
379b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas dbul byas te// dang la thun mong rdzas lngas mchod// de nas khyad par rdzas kyis mchod// bdud rtsi sman gyis mchod rjes la// sbreng zhing brtags pa bya ba ni// bla med mchog gi mchod pa dam pa sbyar ba 'di// ye
379b2(rgyud 'grel): shes lnga'i 'od zer rnam par 'phro// 'dod pa'i yon tan lde yis rab brgyan te// dam tshos gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis su gsol// he ru ka'i gnas bcu dang // dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas// dpal chen 'khor bcas spyan drangs
379b3(rgyud 'grel): te dur khrod mchog gi gnas chen 'dir// zhing chen g.yeng gzhi sti rar bcas// dmar gyi arga rgya mtshor 'khyil// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas kyis// ma lus bzhes nas bsnams su gsol// hUM mnyam pa'i grub rdzas
379b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po 'di// bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la dbul// bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/ longs spyod lngar ldan mchod pa 'di// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim// mchod pa dmi pa bzhes su gsol// kha hi ma hA ma~M sa kha
379b5(rgyud 'grel): ma hA rag tA kha hi// de nas 'khril te snyoms zhugs pas// dgyes mnyam mchog gi mchod pas ro la// mi dmigs thugs kyis mchod pa 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis dang // dA nas phyi rol 'thon po las// ma mo rnams
379b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis bstod pa ni// hUM gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyur ba bzhin// mche bzang yang za byed che ho// hUM rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong di ri ri// thugs chen ri rab 'bum snyil skad//
380a1(rgyud 'grel): ha ha hu la gad rgyangs che// skyugs pa 'khor lo g.yeng ba che ho// hUM khro bo shes rab 'od po che// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun la gsal// 'bar ba'i ye shes kun la 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes thig le che ho// hUM khro bo rgyal po sprin chen
380a2(rgyud 'grel): bodo khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'babs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gtar// sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che ho// hUM bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po// bdud kyi bdud ste bdud rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs par byed// 'jig
380a3(rgyud 'grel): byed chen po thig le che ho// hUM rdo rje brag chen sra ba che// rdo rje chu bo sud chen po// rdo rje me ste kun char tshe// rdo rje rlung 'thor g.yeng ba che ho/ hU~M sgeg po dpa'o 'jig su rung ba dang // rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed pa dang // snying rje rngam dang zhi ba la sogs pa// spu'i
380a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos po shin tu bsgyur ba yin// gar gyi phyag rgya 'bar ba'i dbang phyug gnon// hri mos byed stong pas lhag par 'dod pa'i gzugs// gdul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong pas lhag par 'jigs tshul ston// zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs pa stong pas lhag pa
380a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad de dkyil 'khor gsum du snang bar mdzod// hri rnam par 'dul ba'i ngo mthon thabs kyis non pas gnon// ho ho ha ha he he hi hi// dgyes pa'i gad mo khong // dbang phyug thams cad rab bshig rab tu bshig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis ngo mtshar rmad byung ba
380a6(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa mang po rgyud kyi gdul bya ma lus pa// ye shes sgyu ma ma 'dres yong su rdzogs par bstod// de rjes sngon gyi gnas su bzhugs thim nas// rang gi phyag rgya nga rgyal ni// sngon du gsungs pa'i khro bo 'am// yang na spyan ras gzigs sprul pa'i// khro bo 'bor
380b1(rgyud 'grel): bdabu dgu pa// phyag ni bco brgyad lta bu yi// snying gar drag por 'khor lo bsam// r+ya lnga rtsa ba'i sngags dag ni// 'bum ma ma bye ba'i bar du bzlas// phyag rgya dngos grub dkyil 'khor ro// thun mtshams mnyam par bzhag pa dang // rang gi nor du rin po cha// yod/
380b2(rgyud 'grel): par ma shes stor bar dran// tshol bar 'dod na 'di ltar bsam// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor ni// chos 'dzin rigs kyi grub gnas// thugs rjes sa la mngon sprul gshegs// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ byams mgon dam pa zhi
380b3(rgyud 'grel): gis bstan// e ma byed kyis ma shes sam// mthun yun kun tu bde ba yin// sgron mas mun kun gser tshol ltar// gsang ba'i snying po mdzod brtol te// thig le gcig gis kun la khyab// thams cad lung chen nges par bstan// 'jig rten g.yo rdul
380b4(rgyud 'grel): mi'i rang bzhin rnams// 'bar ba lnga bcu'i khro bro dang du snang // mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i rang bzhin rnams// btsal med ma bcos de nyid rnam dag nas// thig le yungs kar tsam zhig gsal bar bsgom// de las 'od zer rdul snyed spros// mun
380b5(rgyud 'grel): gsal dngos po kun sbyangs te// thams cad ma bcos spu ru gsal// slar 'dus thig le la thim nas// 'od du zhu nas rim gyis bsdus// rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi nang // a gzugs pad+ma 'dra ba bzhir gnas// de steng gsang ba nang gnas sa rlung dang //
380b6(rgyud 'grel): snying ga nang gnas chu rlung gnyis// rnam par dge las zla ba ste// rdo rje rin gnyis rang bzhin// de steng rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ thig le 'od zer lnga ldan pas// de steng mgrin pa gnas me rlung dag/ mgo bo'i nang gnas rlung dkyil gnyis// dag pa
381a1(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng // pad+ma'i rigs dang las rigs so// kha sbyar dbus su thig le bsam// yang dang yang du 'dris bsams pas// mar 'gro mar 'gro gnyis 'bog go// 'gog pa bzhin du mtshan ma ste// lam skye
381a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gag med pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i spyi'o// ma mi zad pa chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// paM gnyis skyon med pa chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// ta thogs pa med pa chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// mu brjod pa las 'das pa'i chos
381a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// hUM mi g.yo ba'i chos nyid yongs su snang ba'i sgo'o// oM cir yang snang ba'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// sa ni chu la thim pas ni// kun tu mnyam blos zag med pa'i// las kyi ye shes dang por skye// chu ni me la thim
381a4(rgyud 'grel): bas nas sems la dbang thob du ba 'dra// me ni rlung la thim pas na// ting 'dzin 'ba' zhig ldan pa ste// rlung gi rnam pa lta bur mithong // rlung ni rnam par rig pa la// thim pas 'dod pa rnam bral te// mar me lta bur mthong ba'o// rnam par rig pa'i 'od
381a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal la// thim pa thams cad snang ba ni// phyi nang mun pa thams cad sbyangs// na mkha' lta bur mthong ba'o// e ma'o dngos po med pa las// smon dang snying rje'i dbang gis ni// ji ltar snang ba ma bkag pa'o// 'dun pa'i dus na rigs kyi bu// yid la byed
381a6(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes thob ste// sems gsum bskyed cing mtha' bcu grol// brten po sa gzhi yis par gnas// rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor la// 'bri 'du cig pa'i ting 'dzin thob// sems gzhi rdzogs te mtha' bcu shes// bdag nyid yi ge'i phreng bar ni
381b1(rgyud 'grel): snang ba'i ltas mthong bsod nams gter// dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor la// sems cig rdzogs te mtha' chub nas// 'jig pa lnga yangs khyad par sa// yongasu mi ldog ting 'dzin sa// 'jig rten nor bu rin chen gyis// gang bar spyod pa'i ltas
381b2(rgyud 'grel): mthong 'gyur// sgyum sbyor ba'i skyes bu ste// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i cha byad du// rin chen bdun dang dpung tshogs kyis// dbang sgyur thabs kyi theg pa ston// lung chen thob pa'i skabs ni// seng ge dag la zhon nas ni// thams cad gnon pa'i ltos mthong 'gyur/
381b3(rgyud 'grel): sems bdun rdzogs pa'i sa phar gnas// 'bras bu nyid la lam shes pas// lam gyi yan lag bde rdzogs te// gzhan dag smin par bya ba'i phyir// ji ltar 'dod ltar thabs mchog sbyor// rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i skabs su ni// kun snang ting 'dzin
381b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid thob ste// des ni nyi zla'i chad bskor bas// thabs dang gsal bar byed ltas mthong // sems gsum bskyed cing mtha' drug chub// gdeng du gyur pa'i ngo bo las// de nas rgyal mtshan skyes bu de// chos kyi rgyal po gang de yi// / gdung 'tsho ba dga' ldan
381b5(rgyud 'grel): theg chen ston// mi gnas bcu dus cho 'phrul snang // bshes gnyen dam pas bka' stsal pa// sa bcu pa la gnas pa yang // chos nyid du 'jog spyod par byed// ma rtog dang du mo gnas te// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi byed do// e ma skyes bu
381b6(rgyud 'grel): dam pa glong // gang gi ngo bo ci phyir lags// skyes bu dam pas bka' stsal pa// gsang sngags dngos po brgyad kyis bcings// mnyam par ma bzhag par du ni// sangs rgyas dgongs pa myong ma yin// skyes bu dam pa khyod ci gu/ gang zhig mo
382a1(rgyud 'grel): ba su zhig gis// ji ltar grol 'gyur ngo bo ci// skyes bu dam pas bka' stsal pa// grol bar 'dod pas bla ma bsten// rig pa rang 'byung rang bzhin ni// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor ro// bsod nams tshogs kyi dkyil
382a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ni// zhing khams rin chen yod pa ni// rgyal ba kun tu bzang po yis// sras mchog 'jam dpal chen po la// ji ltar rims kyis brgyud pa bzhin// de bzhin 'byor pa'i yo byad la// rnam gsum tshul du nan tan bya// bsod nams tshog
382a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor ro// bka' bstod pho nya'i dkyil 'khor ni// sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa yi ni// zhing khams mngon par dga' ba na// rgyal tshab skyes bu kun gyis gsungs// de'i gdam ngag mdor bkod pa'o// rtag dang rten ni gzhung
382a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar bsham// dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pa'i// mtsho ni rkong rkang thang dmar na// ri ni byin lag mchongs kyi rtse// steng na 'dab chags rgyal po gnas// keng rus thod pa mkhar du brtsigs// ru las tshogs bdag bskyed nas nI// nyin
382a5(rgyud 'grel): kro ti bu ri maM// rang gi 'khor tshogs ldan pa bskyed// de nas dpa' bo chen po'i ru lu hUM gI 'od zer spros// drag pos gnas nas gdug pa dgug/ zhal du rngubs te sna nus bton// gzhon nu sme brtsegs zhes gyur te// bskyod dang gnyis su
382a6(rgyud 'grel): med par byas// de la ming dang mtshan btags pa// gang gi rgyal po zhes kyang bya// lha chen legs ldan nag po ste// lha'i sde dpon ka ru na ga/ tshogs bdag tshon po bdud kyi rje// dge slong thar pa nag po yin// tshogs bdag chen po de gsol
382b1(rgyud 'grel): las dpa' bo chen po gshegs su gsol// bdag cag skal ldan 'dus pa'i tshogs// sgo 'dir 'jug par 'tshal lags na// rgyal ba'i sras su bzung du gsol// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa// hUM hUM hUM/ byi sha badz+ra kro ta/ badz+ra la maN+Dal
382b2(rgyud 'grel): phaTaTaHta kau ta kaM phaT/ ha la ha laM/ tag sU tig sA khaM/ kra ta kro ta yaM// oM haM muM/ skal ldan 'dus pa'i tshogs chen khyed // bde bar 'ong so legs par 'ongs// grub pa'i rlung sgo gsung sgo 'dir// su dag 'ongs paM slar mi ldog/ tshogs bdag tshen blo
382b3(rgyud 'grel): yang gsol pa// bdag cag mtha' yas sems can rnams// don gyis sangs rgyas yin mod kyang // rtog pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba la// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa la// mun pas bsgribs pas
382b4(rgyud 'grel): de mi shes// byang chub sems kyi lam 'di nas// sangs rgyas sa la 'jug par bgyi// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa// rdo rje can gyi rnal 'byor khyer// rdo rje can du cig nges na// gsang ba gsum du mnyam pa nyid// mi phyed rdo rje dam tshig sbyin
382b5(rgyud 'grel): mi phyed rdo rje dam tshig ni// gsang ba gsum gyi dbyings nas byung // dkyil 'khor gsum gyi dam tshig ni// grub na 'jigs pa'i dus med do// nag po chen pos yang gsol pa// ye shes rin chen dbu rgyan mchog/ gzi brjid phung po bla na med// sangs
382b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rin chen kun 'dus pa// rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyig gi ye shes gtso mchog nyid// rdo rje dam pa mchog 'dzin pa'i// khyod ni dam tshig gtso lags kyis// dbang phyug rgyal pos bdag dbang bskur// dpa' bo chen po des gnang
383a1(rgyud 'grel): bas// oM badz+ra a mr-i ta a hi ha sarba maN+Da la hUM/ e be she ka hri ta/ nag po chen pos yang gsol pa/ bdag ni skyes bu khyod kyis dbang bskur bas// sangs rgyas kun gyis de nyid bdag dbang bskur// bcom ldan thams cad mchog nyid bdas
383a2(rgyud 'grel): lags te// mchog nyid bsgrub phyir dbang rnams blang bar bgyi// de'i rjes su 'khor rnams kyis// mos dang snyan pa'i tshig gsol te// seng ger sprul te gdon du phul// la las lus kyis rgyun du phul// la las sham thabs dag tu phul// la
383a3(rgyud 'grel): las thig ler phul byas shing // la las byug par mnyes byas nas// la las phreng bar mdzes pa'i rgyan// la las phyag mtshan phul te gnas// de nas ging gi rgyal po la// mnga' gsol mchod pa'i tshul du bstab// nye bar spyod pa lnga yang bzhin/
383a4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig dam rdzas bsngo ba ni// dka' thub chen po tshur gson cig/ legs ldan nag po ma rungs pa// rang gi rgyal srid la gnas te// khram la btab pa'i dgra bgegs rnams// rol cig dgongs shig dam tshig gtso// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la
383a5(rgyud 'grel): bab de bas byang khram le btab pa yi// ma dang sring mo bud med la// dpa' bo khyod kyi rol mdzod cig/ dam tshig chen pos ma btang cig/ zhe sdang can gyi bdag po rnams// sems can kun gyi srog 'phrog pa// bas byang khram la btab pa yi// sha dang
383a6(rgyud 'grel): khrag la longs spyod kyis// gnod sbyin chen po ma rungs rnams// bas byang khram la btab pa yis// gser sogs yul 'khor blangs nas ni// rang gi 'dod pas longs spyod kyis// rtog pa'i rgyal po rnams gson cig/ bse byang khram
383b1(rgyud 'grel): la btab pa yis// mgo thong bcad nas rdugs rten dang // dge mtshan rnal 'byor ngas 'dod na// yid bzhin lta bu'i dngos grub gsol// rigs ngan sgra sha can gyi tshogs// ba lang gi shaN+Da sha dang // mi sha glang chen sha sogs bzhes// sbyin mo khrag
383b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog ma lus la// bsad ba'i khrag ni dron mo dag/ bzhes shig dgra bo'i khrag la rol// sprul pa'i 'phra min chen mo rnams// thod rus rkang dang 'bru mar khrag/ chang dang a mr-i tar sbyar ba yang // rdzu 'phrul sgrub pa'i dam rdzas bzhes// rigs nga
383b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po ma rungs pa// sha chen bshang gci khu ba khrag/ dam rdzas 'bar ba 'di bzhes la// bdog gi nang rnams bzlog tu gsol// dmigs bya 'di la rims nad thong // srid pa'i bud med ma rungs khyed// bro gar glu tshig mchod pa bzhes// dmigs
383b4(rgyud 'grel): bya 'jo tshul stobs kyis 'phrogs// shor pa gzhon nu bdud mo'i tshogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i bka' 'byung gis// sngags sgra rang gi mchod pa bzhes// dmigs bya'i phung po rdul du rnyogs// log 'dren can gyi gdon rnams nyon// yang dag nang du kun
383b5(rgyud 'grel): rig na 'tsho chub las ni gang byas kyang // gnyis kyi dbang du mi 'gyur gyis// rnal 'byor nga'i las 'di sgrubs// gsang tshig sten pa'i tshogs rnams zhon// bshang gtso khrag dang stsol khu'i gos// brgya'am stong du gon nas ni// ling ga bcad na sangs rgyas
383b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig dam rdzas mchod pa 'di bzhes la// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par gyis// mnga' bdag chen po ma rungs pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa ste// khro bo chen po ging chen po// mnga' bdag bdud kyi rgyal po bzhengs// rnal 'byor chen po ngas bstod
384a1(rgyud 'grel): cing 'khyod kyis mthun pa'i rdzas phul bas// sngon gyi bskal pa bzang po la// khas blangs dam bcas mna' bor ba'i// sngon du rigs 'dzin gong mas bsgrubs// da lta rnal 'byor bdag bsgrub na// baM ri thod pa mkhar gyi rtser
384a2(rgyud 'grel): ru mtshon nag po pu ru ru// mtshon cha nag po char du phab// bdud bya nag po lding zhing 'dzums// dur khrod mang po rgyan rnams rdzogs// mche gtsigs rngam pa'i zhal gdangs nas// khro bo khro mo'i sprul par khyims// srin po srin mo rkan sgra rdebs// gnod sbyin
384a3(rgyud 'grel): pho mo 'brug ltar sgrog/ za byed pho mo glog ltar 'gyur// so so mos pa tha dad pa'i// yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ni// yongasu rdzogs pas blang bar byos// de ltar mchod bstod byas rjes la// rang rgyud dam tshig gis gnas te// de dag rnams la mthun
384a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzas bsngo// de nas gong chen 'khor bcas kyis// 'byangs su mchi'o bdag lus 'bul// 'brangs la nan tan ma chung zhig/ de nas slan chad bka' bzhin du// bka' lung bzhin du rjes su bsgrubs// gal te bka' bzhin ma bgyis na// dam pa'i lung
384a5(rgyud 'grel): las 'grel 'gyur bas// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying // rul myags skams nas tshig par 'gyur// ma snying bu mo chung ma rnams// 'brangasu dbul lo tshig ma chung // dbus su mchis skal mi ldan gyis// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' la
384a6(rgyud 'grel): zhogang phud la 'tshal skal mi ldan gyis// lhag ma khal che ba bron la gsol// nye gnas gdung mo ma sring rnams// deng nas rgyal ba'i 'bangs yin gyis// khyed kyi che 'gyi los mkhan to// bka'i las byung rtog par myur du sbubs// ru lu ru lu b+h+yo zhes pa/
384b1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi srog la tshang du bzhag// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa// brtse bar byed na mar bya'o// gdung bar byed na sring mo ste// brtson par byed na ban du bya// byang chub dag ni bur bya'o// bdud bral med na slob mar bya'o// bskul pa mgyogs na pho nya bya'o// bka'
384b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin byed na bka' la gdags// rdo rje ljags kyi 'od zer lngas// rug sha shriM ri he ru kA/ ru tra ma tri ha haM zhes bsdus te bzlas pa bya// bsnyen pa bzlos pa 'bum byas la// don chen brtsal ba zhes su bshang // thun mtshams kun tu mchod pa yang // dud chen
384b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs btang bar bya// don chen rnyed par gyur nas ni// sna'i bu ga'i hUM rings las// khro bo gang gi rgyal po ste// las kyi rgyal po srog bdag ni// ljang sngon drag po gsal zhing can// spros dang gnyis su med par bstim// rgyu zhags khar nag skud pa'am/
384b4(rgyud 'grel): mthing nag dar chen 'char ba la// phye ma'i ri lu gsum sbrus te// rang gi lag pa g.yon par bzung // gzung thag blangs te sngags bzlas pa// nye ba'i bsnyen pa 'bum du bzlas// don chen bsnyen par gyur pa yi// de nas don la 'jug par bya// rang gi lag
384b5(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yon pa yi// thum po bar pa kha phye nas// mkhar gyi nang du pho nyas bskul// 'bum du sgrub pa dag ni bzlas// de nas tshogs kyi mchod pa ni// gsum du byas te dbul byas nas// gdeng du gyur pa'i gsang sngags mchod// bsgrub pa chen po 'bum
384b6(rgyud 'grel): du bzlas// pho nya mnga' gzhug bdag dkyil 'khor// 'brub khung las kyi dkyil 'khor no// stug po bkod pa'i zhing khams na// rnam dag lam gshegs rgyal la rnams// rkong rkang thang mor rgya mtsho'i de// 'brub khung drag shul can gyi gnas// rdzo
385a1(rgyud 'grel): rje thabs kyis blta ba'i yul// dur khrod bdag po tshogs dang bcas// bdag ni bka'i las mkhan te// bka' yi las kyi dus byung bas// sangs rgyas kun gyis gdul dka' ba// de dag ma lus bdag gis gdul// dka
385a2(rgyud 'grel): las de dag mdor bkong ba'o// lho phyogs las kyi maN+Dal sum rtseg la// dang po thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan// de 'og mtshon cha'i char gyis spras// de 'og mo re 'bar bas spras/ nang du rgyal sol nag pos byugs// de'i nang du ling ka ni// ji lta ba'i
385a3(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis bzhag/ yan lag phyag rgya bzhi yis brgyang // kha ran dang por 'phra men ma// bar ma la ni mgo mnyan te/ tha ma la ni srin mo tshogs// gdug pa'i tsher ma'i phur bu la// mtshon par byas te rnam par bkod// mgul nas gdags shing
385a4(rgyud 'grel): rten la 'dud // de ni las la sbyar ba yi// gtor ma la sogs mchod pa rnams// mnyes shing mgu ba gzhung bzhin bya// ji srid mtshan ma rnyed kyi bar// las la sbyor ba drug pa'i sngags// rngam pa'i nga ros gdon par bya// mnyes la sogs pa
385a5(rgyud 'grel): gzu dbang gsol// de nas pho nya mngag par bya// 'bar ba drag po mi bzang ba'i// rtog pa med pa'i rgyal po las// rdo rje lcags kyi 'od zer gyis// badz+ra kro ti la sa ma ya// khro bo rgyal po sprin phung po// mngag gzhug pho nyar spro bar bya//
385a6(rgyud 'grel): rag sha dz+wa la sa ma ya/ sngon po mngag pa'i drag sngags so// gnod sbyin rbang pa'i drag sngags so// tsit+ta dz+wa la sa ma ya// zang byed bskul ba'i pho nya'o// sngags dang ming du spel nas ni// khros pas khri 'am 'bum du bzlas// dung chen btang
385b1(rgyud 'grel): la bskul ba ni// sngon tshe dpal chen nyid kyi bka'// de nas rnal 'byor rig rgyud bka'// da lta rnal 'byor bdag sgrub kyis// khas blangs dam bcas brjed dam ci// dam bcas bzhin du phrin las mdzod// ji ltar ma byams bu la gdung
385b2(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhin dang dam tshig can la dung dung gdung bar gyis// gang du srid byams ming la gdud pa bzhin// dam tshig can la lteng ltang brtse bar gyis// mdza' bo grogs la ji ltar gdung tshul bzhin// rnal 'byor can la kril kr-il brtse bar gyis//
385b3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar g.yog byams dpon la snying brtse bzhin// dam pa rnams la mnyes par nye bar gyis// rgyal ba kun gyi chos sku pad+ma'i gdung // chos rje 'od dpag med la rdo rje chos// spyan ras gzigs sprul hri las rngam tshul ston// dag gi
385b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug rta gdong zhabs kyis gnon// 'jigs byed chen po 'bar ba la// sngo nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad pa// rdo rje gshog pas bar snang khebs// ba spu lcags kyu bsreg 'dra yi// sdom dang sdig da
385b5(rgyud 'grel): smig pa sprul// 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis gzhi khebs// thogs skyobs stir rgyu zhags dang // nyi zla khyud dang 'ug pa khra// rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dang // za ma tog dang rdul yab rnga// ri rab phyi bskor stong gsum 'phen// klu dbang
385b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bum gyis brgyan gyis klubs// dus mtha' bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar// khro gnyer sdang mig 'bar ba ni// nyi shu rtsa bdu na spyan ras gzigs// zhabs kyis 'bar ba'i lha brgyad gnon// rdo rje srin po khro bor gyur// lha dang bdud lnga
386a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par grags// me mchog thugs kyi sprul pa las// lha chen nag po mi bzad pa// mtsho ni rkong rkang thang dmar na// ri bo byan lag mchongs kyi rtse// ma la ya'i rtse la lcags// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// sprul pa'i sras
386a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog rdo rje 'dzin// gzhon nu bye ba sa yar mdzad// bai ri thod pa mkhar gyi rtsa ra// mgon po thugs kyi sprul pa ni// bdud kyi spyod yul kun mdzad de// drag tu mdag cing bskul ba'i tshe// 'jig rten khams kun 'phung bar byed// thams cad
386a3(rgyud 'grel): dbyar gyi sprin phung bzhin// na mokha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par// ba ri thod pa'i rtse la ljags// mthun 'jug thabs kyi cha byang du// ba ri thod pa mkhar gyi rtsar// khrag dang bshang gci sha chen dang // rkang dang klang bgrang rgyas dang // rnag dang
386a4(rgyud 'grel): chu ser la sogs pa'i// 'bu dang shin tu 'bu chen po// spang ma sbrang rgod bung ba dang // sbrul dang sdig pa sdom la sogs// tso spyang stag seng la sogs pa'i// gdug pa can gyi 'khor gyis bskor// lha'i sde dpon ka ru na'i// bu mo chung ma ma
386a5(rgyud 'grel): sring dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug lha chen gyi// ma sring bu mo chung ma rnams// phyogs nas dbang du byis pa rnams// zlas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshegs// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad la sogs// ma mo 'phra men gnod sbyin ma// srin mo sha za khrag
386a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog ma// bdud kyi ming 'dzin dri kun ma// dam 'ams 'di'i bla la yang // blon po sde dpon sde dpon mo// ru mtshon nag po phyar nas ni// ru dpon pho nya mngag par bcas// rang rang stan dang lag char chas// ci bgyi bka' nyan bka' stong 'khor
386b1(rgyud 'grel): spyad dang rdum pas dgra snying khos// srid pa'i bu ma dri za brgyad// stag sad ce sbyang bzhad sogs dang // dur bya rog po 'ug pa'i tshogs// bstod tsong rngam pa'i tshul du 'khod// nyams pa 'di'i stong dkyil du// cho 'phrul sna tshogs khyed la bsgrags/
386b2(rgyud 'grel): srin mo'i nye gnas chen mo brgyad// ke ri tse pra mo ha/ be ta li dang pu ka si// g+ha sma ri dang sma shi ni// maN+Dal li la sogs pa yis// srog la hur thums dus la bab// dur khrod sa'i sgo srungs bzhi// brtson mo gdang mo gar log ma// de bzhin 'jug
386b3(rgyud 'grel): mo chen mo bzhi// gsang sgo 'dzin cing bka' sgo srung // rnal 'byor 'khor dang bcas pa la// bar chang bsrung ba'i dus la bab// ngam nyams 'di'i yan lag chings// dur khrod bdag mo grub 'debs ma// rkam ma shin tu rkam ma dang // ra ro ma dang
386b4(rgyud 'grel): khrag mthung ma// chags pas myos pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod// dam nyams 'di'i dbugs long la// smyo 'bogs btang ba'i dus la bab// nyams su myong bar khros dus ni// sngon du sten phul mnga' gsol ba'i// mtshon cha nag po thogs nas ni// skabs
386b5(rgyud 'grel): der thun gzer brdeg par bya// bde gshegs rgyal ba ma lus kyis// mar ku lta bu'i snying po gsungs// de 'dra'i bstan pa dam pa la// sgro skur rnal 'byor yongs la 'tshe// da lta rnal 'byor nga yi dgra/ pho nya ma dag gzhug ma lus kun// 'di la dam tshi
386b6(rgyud 'grel): ma gnas kyis// drag po las kyi thun la bab// rdo rje gzhon nu sme ba brtsegs// mithing nag khro gnyer ral pa can// 'bar ba chen po gar dgu mdzad// dur khrod bdag po ji bzhin du// dbu dang phyag zhabs der mdzad de// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// rdo rje zla
387a1(rgyud 'grel): rtsal gi ma'i mdangs can dang // rdo rje seng ge nAmakha' rdo rje dang // rdo rje spyang ka rdo rje dus mtshams dang // rdo rje phyogs 'dul rdo rje dur khrong bdag/ rdo rje ro langs rdo rje ma rungs pa// legs ldan nag po bdud kyi rje// gsung shing ro drag tha ma bang/
387a2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'ur 'ur che mche ma drag po'i sgra dang ldan// rab tu brtsegs pa'i sku ni mi zad pa// mgul ldeg rab g.yos dgra la thun// dpa'o khyed kyi shes rab ma// ba ri thod pa brtsegs pa'i dbus// gnam lcagase 'bar ba'i gzer chen gyis// brtan par btab pa'i nang
387a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag mo dan nye gnas kro ta shwa ri ma// thod sgyogs khrag gis bkang ba dang // 'bru mar rdzas lnga chang sbyar ba// rtag par rang gi longs spyod 'dzin// chags pas myos shing rkam pa nas// ches 'ga' drag tu bskul ba'i tshe// sngags sgra drag po mi bzad pas// rang
387a4(rgyud 'grel): la rang yang brtsig cing 'dum// srin po srin mo'i tshogs rnams kun// drag por sngags drag nges bzlos shing // gdug pa'i lus can mtshon char bcas// glad pa'i dkyil du rgyab pa yis// rkang pa'i mthil dus ma ya// a bi ra tsa'i gnag pa yin// thun
387a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jug 'khrid pa'i sbyor thabs kyis// bdud rtsi lnga'i mdangs sbyor bas// gshung ba lnga ni bdud rtsir bsgyur// byas la mi rtsogs phrin las dang // spyod la ma chags ye shes kyis// thams cad stong zhing rdo rje sbyangs// sgyu ma'i phung po lhag ma la// khro bo khri
387a6(rgyud 'grel): mos rta bro brdung // / 'dod chags rdo rje zhe sdang gti mug gsum// mnan no mnan no 'og tu mnan// sha khrag rus spungs lhag ma rnams// za byed tshogs kyi zhal du btab// las rnams gzhan yang bstan bya'i phyir// drag po'i las rnams sgrub pa ni//
387b1(rgyud 'grel): nag po phyogs la sbyor goms pas// drag po yi ni sbyin bsreg brgyad// rnal 'byor khros pa'i sems kyis byas// ling ga bcad cing bsnyegs pas na// sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'jig 'gyur na// gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos// 'brug khung las kyi dkyi
387b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rod/ gtad khrom mnan pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// gdug 'dul zhing khams chen po ni// ston pa gsang bdag nyid kyis gsungs// de'i gdams ngag rgyud pa ni// slob dpon hUM kA ra yi ni// de'i gdam ngag mdor bkod pa'o// gong du las la sbyor ba na klas
387b3(rgyud 'grel): sna bdun gyis 'dag pa las// tshad ldan pa'i mkhar byas la// steng du bya khyud rgyal po bya// nang du mgon po nag po ste// mche gtsigs zhabs ni bgrad pa'i 'og/ sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba dang // dri ma la sogs rjes rnams la// ling ga mod byung bris
387b4(rgyud 'grel): tete bzhag/ a ra ma ru sha dang ni// kra sne sku ra bzhi chang yi// thod pa kha sbyar zhags pas gsum// ka ru na'i phyag rgya dang // gnam lcags 'bar ba'i gzer chen gyis// blangs te dur khrod nag po'i tshal// mi mthun 'dus pa'i sar song la// gtor ma
387b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs rngan pas mchod// grug sumi khru do rko byas la// gong gi mkhar chen bcug nas ni// g.yam pa nag pos kha bcad nas// rdo rje rgya gram gyis mnan bya// chu mig nag po ma rungs dang // lha khang mgon po'i zhabs 'og tu// mnan pa byas kyang 'grub
387b6(rgyud 'grel): par gsungs// gtang khram mnan pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de gting sgrub pa'i gnas phyin nas// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// spyan drangs lha rnams ma lus la// mchod bstod bshags pa bya ba dang // btang rag lhag ma'i gtor ma gtang // de nas
388a1(rgyud 'grel): dbying smra ci bder gshegs// bskyed pa'i lha rnams lus la bsdu// mtshams dang phyag rgya la sogs la// ngo bo nyid kyis dgrol bar bya// smon lam gang ba cing spyod lam la// sgyu ma'i tshul gyis ci bder spyad// grub dang lung bstan ma thob kyang //
388a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag pas blo dman ched du ni/ \u0f7fdkyil 'khor bdun pa'i sgrub thabs phye// tshad ma dang ldan mkhas pa rnams// bdag gi blo la mi bya zhing // mkhas pa rnams kyi bzod pa bzhes// 'di brtsams 'di la mos pa rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob shog/ slob
388a3(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po spyir ma tis dgongs pa las rdo rje bkod po'i rgyud bstan pa bsrung ba/ rnal 'byor yongs kyi mgon po legs ldan nag po'i sgrub thabs kyi dkyil 'khor bdun gyi rim pa rnam par phye ba slob dpon snang mdzad myu gus mdzad pa rdzogs//
388a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs kyi rgyud long ba'i yul na dpal 'bras kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i pho brang yod de// de ni chos kyi dbyings ngag gi dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil 'khor mchod rten gyis yongasu g.yogs pa'i rje btsun
388a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs so// der phyin nas rje btsun gyi mchod rten la phyag stong phrag lnga btsal bar bya'o// rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba'i gzungs bzlas par bya'o// de la brjod par bya ste/ na mo b+ha ga wa ti Ar+yA badz+ra shrI kha lA ye.e/ ha na ha naM/ tshin tshin/ bi pa ba Sha
388a6(rgyud 'grel): ka pA ya dAt+yA ra ta ra/ te re ga ba tr-i atsogany+dza badz+ra A ya ti/ badz+ra pra kA re oM na mo b+ha ga wA te/ Ar+ya bidz+ra shr-I kha le pUr+tha ngi shaM badz+dzi/ dak+Shi naM di shaM bam+b+ha/ pi yAm di shaM bar+N+Na/ ud+ha ra di shaM ban+d+ha/ A b+hau di shaM ban+d+hi/ da shaM d+hi sha ban+d+ha/ ma swe pA de ban+d+ha/ yarba
388b1(rgyud 'grel): rak+Sha saM ban+d+ha/ b+ha ta pre taM bi shA tsaM ban+d+ha/ sid+d+ha yo gi DA ki ni ban+d+ha/ e ka pA daM ban+d+ha/ di pa d+l-i ban+d+ha/ tri pA daM ban+d+ha/ tsa tuHbA daM ban+d+ha/ pany+tsa pA daM ban+d+ha/ ShaT pA daM ban+d+ha/ sa ha pra pA daM ban+d+ha/ brik+Sha daM ban mu la bA daM ban+d+ha/ de baM ban+d+ha/ de baM ku laM bar+t+ta/ nA gaM ban+d+ha/ na ga ku laM ban+d+ha/ pa ra
388b2(rgyud 'grel): ku li ban+d+ha/ gu hi na ban+d+ha/ tri kro Na pri thi ba'i na bar+N+Na ban+d+ha hUM/ mAM tsa la mA tsa la/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ si bi dI ban+d+ha/ brah+ma ba tsa ne/ bin+d+ha dan+d+ha/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa t+yai Ar+ya badz+ra shrI kha le pany+tsa kro shi kaM maN+Da laM bin+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ hUM hU~M phaT phaT swAhA/ sdang ba thams cad kyi
388b3(rgyud 'grel): snying rnam par 'joms ma 'phags ma rdo rje lcags sgrog ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// / des gnod spyir bgegs 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas de'i rjes su ma la ya'i yul du 'gro bar bya'o// der phyin nas chos kyi rgyal po
388b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten rje btsun la bskor ba stong phrag gsum bya'o// byas nas sngags khyi phrag drug stong bzlas par bya'o// de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM ma ni badz+rI hUM/ gal te gang zhig skyes bu chen po brtson 'grus chen po rnams kyis 'gro bar 'gyur ba nyid
388b5(rgyud 'grel): du 'dod pas khyim gyi bsam pa dran par mi bya'o// byas na sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'joms par 'gyur ro// dpal ldan po ta la ka'i rje btsun gyi zhal mthong ba don du gnyer ba'i sems can de rnama'i nges par brtson 'grus
388b6(rgyud 'grel): brtan pa de rnams kyis bgrod par bya'o// de'i tshe skyes bu de rnams kyis nges par rang gi lus sems can thams cad la bani pa'i don du bdage nyid kyi lus sbyin pa ro btang bar bya'o// lus sbyin par byin nas phyis dpal po ta la kar bgrod bar byar/
389a1(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad yongasu smangs te 'dod chags la sogs pa'i bsam pa dor nas bgrod par bya'o// spro ba'i sems kyis glu dang gar dang dam pa'i chos kyi yi dam dang bcas pa dang / sngags la sogs pa dang bsgom par bya'o//
389a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yeng ba'i sems kyis 'gro bar mi bya'o// ngos po nyid du rje btsun gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes smras nas spro ba'i sems kyis bgrod par bya'o// sems de nyid kyis 'gro ba na gal te rje btsun gyi zhabs mthong bar ma gyur na// de'i tshe
389a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid 'jam pa'i mgon po mtshams med pa lnga'i las byed par 'gyur ro// de ltar byas nas ma la ya'i ri la bgrod par byas pas ri'i dbus su u dum pa ra'i nags mthong bar 'gyur ro// mthong nas kyang 'bras bu rnams bza' bar bya'o//
389a4(rgyud 'grel): bza' ba byas nas kyang 'bras bu rab tu mang po rnams bzung bar bya'o// bzung nas yang 'gro ba na sum rtsegs ces bya ba'i gnas kyi 'dug sa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshong 'dus kyi dbus su 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas sngags stong phrag gsu
389a5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas par bya'o// de'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM ma Ni pad+mi hUM/ tshong 'dus de la g.yon nas bskor te 'gro ba ni rigs ldan mA zhes bya ba'i dri ma med pa'i chu rgyun mthong bar 'gyur ro// de rnams las rgal te mthong bar 'gyur ba ni shing
389a6(rgyud 'grel): ta la dang shing sa la dang / pi ba la'i shing sa spya ba shul dang / aM bu dang / dzam+bu dang / sha ko sa Ta ka dang / ba ru ra la sogs pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i shing ljon shing du ma mthong nas 'bras bu yang bzung bar mi bya'o// bza' bar yang
389b1(rgyud 'grel): mi bya'o// de rnams la g.yon nas bskor te 'gro bar bya'o// dri med ldan pa zhes bya ba'i chu rgyun mthong bar 'gyur ro// rdo ba'i rang bzhin 'ba' zhig ste/ de mthong bas 'jigs par mi bya'o// rdo dang brag de las 'das te pha rol tu phyin te/ ku she btogs te bsgra
